Power.name: sustain
Power.Invoke: (block Nil (shpAddEnergyField gSource &sfSustain; 500) (objSendMessage gSource Nil "Invoked the powers of Domina!") )

Default.desc: You are inside the main compartment of your ship. A hatch in front of you opens into the cargo hold. To the side there is a small ladder that leads to the reactor and the ship's engines.
You are in your ship's cargo hold.
Default.Initialize:
(block (thisItem desc) (setq thisItem (scrGetItem gScreen)) (switch (not thisItem) (setq gMaxCount 0)
(itmIsInstalled thisItem) (setq gMaxCount 0)
(setq gMaxCount (itmGetCount thisItem)) )
(if thisItem (block Nil (setq desc (cat "\Unit mass: " (intMassString (itmGetMass thisItem)))) (if (gr gMaxCount 1) (setq desc (cat desc " (" gMaxCount " at " (intMassString (multiply (itmGetMass thisItem) gMaxCount)) ")")) ) (scrSetDesc gScreen desc) ) )
; Enable/disable actions (scrEnableAction gScreen 0 (gr gMaxCount 0)) )

Actions.Action:
(switch (gr gMaxCount 1) (scrShowPane gScreen "JettisonQuantity")
(eq gMaxCount 1) (block (itemsToJettison) ; Create cargo crate (if (not gDest) (setq gDest (sysCreateStation &stCargoCrate; (sysVectorPolarOffset gPlayerShip 0 0))) )
; Dump items (setq itemsToJettison (scrRemoveItem gScreen 1)) (objAddItem gDest itemsToJettison) (scrShowPane gScreen "Default") ) )

JettisonQuantity.Initialize: (block Nil (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "How many items do you wish to jettison?")) (scrSetCounter gScreen gMaxCount) )

Actions.Action:
(block (count) (setq count (scrGetCounter gScreen)) (if (gr count gMaxCount) (scrSetCounter gScreen gMaxCount) (block (itemsToJettison) ; Create cargo crate (if (not gDest) (setq gDest (sysCreateStation &stCargoCrate; (sysVectorPolarOffset gPlayerShip 0 0))) )
; Dump items (setq itemsToJettison (scrRemoveItem gScreen count)) (objAddItem gDest itemsToJettison) (scrShowPane gScreen "Default") ) ) )

Default.desc: You are docked with an abandoned cargo crate.
You are docked at the lifeless ruins of a destroyed station. Wrecked machinery and smouldering bodies litter the silent, cavernous bay.
You are docked with the wreck of a ship.
Luminous veils dance in your head as your consciousness strains to hear the distant voice of Domina's mind...

Actions.Action:
(block (roll attitude contemplate) ; consume (setq attitude (objGetData gPlayerShip "sistersAttitude")) (setq contemplate Nil) (if (gr attitude 0) (block Nil (setq attitude (subtract attitude 1)) (objSetData gPlayerShip "sistersAttitude" attitude) (setq contemplate True) ) )
; Random result (setq roll (subtract (random 1 20) gBonus)) (if (gr gBonus 0) (setq gBonus (subtract gBonus 1)) )
(switch (not contemplate) (scrShowPane gScreen "Nothing")
; Gain in relationship (leq roll 2) (block Nil (plyIncreaseDominaRel gPlayer 20) (if (eq (random 1 3) 1) (plyIncreaseDominaRel gPlayer 20) ) (scrShowPane gScreen "Domina") )
; All stations in system mapped (leq roll 4) (block Nil (enum (sysFindObject gPlayerShip "Ts") obj (objSetKnown obj) ) (scrShowPane gScreen "MapSystem") )
; Outbound stargate revealed (leq roll 8) (block Nil (setq gDest (sysGetObjectByName gStation "Outbound")) (if (and gDest (not (objIsKnown gDest))) (block Nil (objSetKnown gDest) (scrShowPane gScreen "RevealStargate") )
(scrShowPane gScreen "Nothing") ) )
(scrShowPane gScreen "Nothing") ) )

Domina.desc: Your disembodied mind hurtles through space in the wake of a photon. Stars dance around you like fireflies. Nebulous veils part before you to reveal a fragment of the Eternal Pattern. You feel the blessing of Domina upon you. She urges you to continue your journey to the Galactic Core.

MapSystem.desc: Images and patterns dance in your head like spinning galaxies. You see with the eyes of Domina but the visions blast your brain like a nova. When you recover from your revery you remember only some mundane information about the position of stations in this star system.

Nothing.desc: Your contemplation ends as your rational mind considers the impossibility of communicating across the light-years.

RevealStargate.Initialize: (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "A connection with Domina is denied to you, but your brief attempt points the way to your destiny's end. Step through the " (objGetName gDest) " to the next system and you will be one step nearer to your goal."))

DockScreen.name: =(objGetName gStation)
DockScreen.desc: Your ship is in dry dock

Default.desc: Your ship is in dry dock.

Actions.Action: (block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "&dsDryDock;") (setq gPrevPane Nil) (setq gCost 20) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsRefuel;") )

(block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "&dsDryDock;") (setq gPrevPane Nil) (setq gTechLevel 7) (setq gArmorSegment 0) (setq gArmorSegmentNames '("forward" "starboard" "aft" "port")) (setq gMargin 100) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsRepairArmor;") )
(block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "&dsDryDock;") (setq gPrevPane Nil) (setq gCheckMilitaryID True) (setq gMargin 100) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsInstallDevice;") )
(block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "&dsDryDock;") (setq gPrevPane Nil) (setq gMargin 100) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsRemoveDevice;") )

Default.Initialize:
(block (type damage desc) (setq gArmorSegment (itmGetArmorInstalledLocation (scrGetItem gScreen))) (setq type (objGetArmorType gPlayerShip gArmorSegment)) (setq damage (objGetArmorDamage gPlayerShip gArmorSegment)) (setq desc (cat "The ship's " (item gArmorSegmentNames gArmorSegment) " " (armGetName type))) (setq maxHP (shpGetArmorMaxHitPoints gPlayerShip gArmorSegment)) (setq gCanRepair True) (setq gCost (multiply damage (armGetRepairCost type))) (setq gCost (divide (multiply gMargin gCost) 100)) (switch (eq damage 0) (block Nil (setq desc (cat desc " is not damaged.")) (setq gCanRepair Nil) ) (gr (armGetRepairTech type) gTechLevel) (block Nil (setq desc (cat desc " cannot be repaired. The technology required is not available at this station.")) (setq gCanRepair Nil) ) (ls (subtract maxHP damage) (divide maxHP 4)) (block Nil (setq desc (cat desc " is heavily damaged and cannot be repaired.")) (setq gCanRepair Nil) ) (ls (plyGetCredits gPlayer) gCost) (block Nil (setq desc (cat desc " can be repaired for " gCost " credits, which, unfortunately, is more than you can afford.")) (setq gCanRepair Nil) ) (eq gCost 0) (setq desc (cat desc " is damaged and can be repaired free of charge."))
(setq desc (cat desc " is damaged and will cost " gCost " credits to repair.")) ) (scrSetDesc gScreen desc)
; Disable actions if we cannot repair (scrEnableAction gScreen 0 gCanRepair) )

Actions.Action: (if gCanRepair (block Nil (objRepairArmor gPlayerShip gArmorSegment) (plyCharge gPlayer gCost) (scrShowPane gScreen "Default") ) )

Default.desc: Pick an armor segment to install.
Default.Initialize:
(block (thisItem canInstall) (setq thisItem (scrGetItem gScreen)) (setq canInstall True) (if thisItem (block (desc) (setq gCost (divide (multiply gMargin (itmGetInstallCost thisItem)) 100))
(switch (gr gCost (plyGetCredits gPlayer)) (block Nil (setq desc (cat "This armor segment can be installed for " gCost " credits. Unfortunately, you cannot afford this cost.")) (setq canInstall Nil) )
(eq gCost 0) (setq desc "This armor segment can be installed free of charge.")
(setq desc (cat "This armor segment can be installed for " gCost " credits.")) )
(scrSetDesc gScreen desc) )
(block Nil (scrSetDesc gScreen "You do not have any armor segments in your cargo hold.") (setq canInstall Nil) ) )
(scrEnableAction gScreen 0 canInstall) )

Default.desc: Your ship cannot support any more devices.
Pick a device to install.
Default.Initialize:
(block (thisItem canInstall) (setq canInstall Nil) (setq thisItem (scrGetItem gScreen)) (if thisItem (block Nil (setq gCost (divide (multiply gMargin (itmGetInstallCost thisItem)) 100)) (setq gResult (shpCanInstallDevice gPlayerShip (scrGetItemListCursor gScreen)))
(switch (and gCheckMilitaryID (itmHasModifier thisItem "Military") (not (objGetItems gPlayerShip "*+MilitaryID")) ) (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "You must have a military ID to to use " (itmGetName thisItem 4) "."))
(eq gResult 4) (scrSetDesc gScreen "You already have a shield generator installed.")
(eq gResult 5) (scrSetDesc gScreen "You already have a propulsion system installed.")
(eq gResult 6) (scrSetDesc gScreen "You already have a missile launcher installed.")
(eq gResult 7) (scrSetDesc gScreen "Your ship's reactor is not powerful enough for this device.")
(eq gResult 8) (scrSetDesc gScreen "You already have a cargo expansion system installed.")
(not (eq gResult 0)) (scrSetDesc gScreen "This device cannot be installed.")
(gr gCost (plyGetCredits gPlayer)) (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "This device can be installed on your ship for " gCost " credits. Unfortunately, you cannot afford the cost."))
(eq gCost 0) (block Nil (scrSetDesc gScreen "This device can be installed on your ship free of charge.") (setq canInstall True) )
(block Nil (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "This device can be installed on your ship for " gCost " credits.") ) (setq canInstall True) ) ) ) (scrSetDesc gScreen "You do not have any devices that can be installed.") )
; Disable actions (scrEnableAction gScreen 0 canInstall) )

(block (desc okToInstall) (setq okToInstall Nil) (setq gResult (shpCanInstallDevice gPlayerShip gItem))
(switch (and gCheckMilitaryID (itmHasModifier gItem "Military") (not (objGetItems gPlayerShip "*+MilitaryID")) ) (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "You must have a military ID to to use " (itmGetName thisItem 4) "."))
(eq gResult 0) (block Nil (if (eq gCost 0) (setq desc (cat "We can install " (itmGetName gItem 4) " on your ship.")) (setq desc (cat "We can install " (itmGetName gItem 4) " on your ship for " gCost " credits.")) ) (setq okToInstall True) )
(eq gResult 4) (block Nil (if (eq gCost 0) (setq desc (cat "We can replace your current shield generator with " (itmGetName gItem 4) ".")) (setq desc (cat "We can replace your current shield generator with " (itmGetName gItem 4) " for " gCost " credits.")) ) (setq okToInstall True) )
(eq gResult 5) (setq desc "You already have a propulsion system installed.")
(eq gResult 6) (block Nil (if (eq gCost 0) (setq desc (cat "We can replace your current launcher with " (itmGetName gItem 4) ".")) (setq desc (cat "We can replace your current launcher with " (itmGetName gItem 4) " for " gCost " credits.")) ) (setq okToInstall True) )
(eq gResult 7) (setq desc (cat "We could install " (itmGetName gItem 4) ", but unfortunately your ship's reactor is not powerful enough to support it."))
(eq gResult 8) (setq desc "You already have a cargo expansion system installed.")
(setq desc (cat "Unfortunately, we cannot install " (itmGetName gItem 4) ".")) )
; See if we can afford it (if (and okToInstall (ls (plyGetCredits gPlayer) gCost)) (block Nil (setq desc (cat desc " Unfortunately, you cannot afford the modification.")) (setq okToInstall Nil) ) )
(scrSetDesc gScreen desc)
; Enable/disable buttons (scrEnableAction gScreen 0 okToInstall) )

Actions.Action:
(block (shieldItem launcherItem) ; Uninstall shields, if already installed (if (eq gResult 4) (objEnumItems gPlayerShip "sI" shieldItem (shpRemoveDevice gPlayerShip shieldItem) ) )
; Uninstall launcher, if already installed (if (eq gResult 6) (objEnumItems gPlayerShip "wI +Launcher;" launcherItem (shpRemoveDevice gPlayerShip launcherItem) ) )
; Install the new items (objAddItem gPlayerShip gItem) (shpInstallDevice gPlayerShip gItem) (plyCharge gPlayer gCost)
(setq gResult True) (scrShowScreen gScreen gPrevScreen gPrevPane) )
(block Nil (setq gResult Nil) (scrShowScreen gScreen gPrevScreen gPrevPane) )

Default.desc: Pick a weapon to install.
Default.Initialize:
(block (thisItem canInstall) (setq canInstall Nil) (setq thisItem (scrGetItem gScreen)) (if thisItem (block Nil (setq gCost (itmGetInstallCost thisItem)) (setq gResult (shpCanInstallDevice gPlayerShip (scrGetItemListCursor gScreen)))
(switch (and gCheckMilitaryID (itmHasModifier thisItem "Military") (not (objGetItems gPlayerShip "*+MilitaryID")) ) (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "You must have a military ID to to use " (itmGetName thisItem 4) "."))
(eq gResult 0) (block Nil (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "This weapon can be installed on your ship for " gCost " credits.") ) (setq canInstall (geq (plyGetCredits gPlayer) gCost)) )
(eq gResult 6) (scrSetDesc gScreen "You already have a missile launcher installed.")
(eq gResult 7) (scrSetDesc gScreen "Your ship's reactor is not powerful enough for this device.")
(scrSetDesc gScreen "This weapon cannot be installed.") ) ) (scrSetDesc gScreen "You do not have any weapons that can be installed.") )
; Disable actions (scrEnableAction gScreen 0 canInstall) )

Default.desc: Pick a device to remove.
Default.Initialize:
(block (thisItem) (setq thisItem (scrGetItem gScreen)) (if thisItem (block Nil ; Half the price of install cost (setq gCost (divide (multiply gMargin (itmGetInstallCost thisItem)) 200))
(switch (ls (plyGetCredits gPlayer) gCost) (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "This device can be removed from your ship for " gCost " credits. Unfortunately, you cannot afford the cost."))
(eq gCost 0) (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "This device can be removed from your ship free of charge."))
(scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "This device can be removed from your ship for " gCost " credits.") ) ) ) (scrSetDesc gScreen "You do not have any devices that can be removed.") )
; Enable/disable actions (scrEnableAction gScreen 0 (and thisItem (geq (plyGetCredits gPlayer) gCost)) ) )

Default.desc: Pick a weapon to remove.

Default.Initialize:
(block (desc missionList) ; Pick a mission (setq missionList (objGetStaticData gStation gMissionListName)) (if (gr (count missionList) 0) (block Nil (setq gMission (random missionList))
; Generate mission description (setq desc (apply (eval (item gMission 1)) Nil))
; If we could not generate a mission, then clear out gMission (if (not desc) (block Nil (setq gMission Nil) (setq desc gMissionNoneText) ) ) )
(block Nil (setq gMission Nil) (setq desc gMissionNoneText) ) )
(scrSetDesc gScreen desc)
; Enable/disable actions (scrEnableAction gScreen 0 gMission) )

Actions.Action:
(if gMission (block Nil ; remember the mission (objSetData gStation "Mission" gMission) (objSetData gStation "MissionID" (item gMission 0)) (objSetData gStation "MissionStatus" "inprogress")
(apply (eval (item gMission 2)) Nil) (scrShowPane gScreen "GoodLuck") ) )

Default.Initialize: (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "You are docked at " (objGetStaticData gStation "LongName") "."))

DockServices.desc: You are at the docking services terminal.

Actions.Action: (block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "&dsArmsDealerSpecial;") (setq gPrevPane "DockServices") (setq gCheckMilitaryID True) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsInstallWeapon;") )

DockScreen.name: =(objGetName gStation)
DockScreen.InitialPane:
(block Nil ; Look for the sung slaver (setq gSlaver (sysFindObject gStation "TN D:sung;")) (if gSlaver (switch ; If the slaver has not been destroyed, then we're not free (not (objIsAbandoned gSlaver)) "NotFree"
; If we have a reward, then the slaver quarters are empty (eq (objGetData gSlaver "sungState") "done") "Empty"
; If we have just taken some coffins, then we're done (eq (objGetData gSlaver "sungState") "coffins") "Done"
; Otherwise, the player may or may not get a reward (block (slaves alive dead) ; Get all the slave quarters (setq slaves (sysFindObject gSlaver "T D:sungSlave; N:10;"))
; Count how many slave quarters are alive vs. dead (setq alive 1) (setq dead 0) (enum slaves obj (if (objIsAbandoned obj) (setq dead (add dead 1)) (setq alive (add alive 1)) ) )
; If there are more dead than alive then the player gets ; nothing. (if (gr dead alive) "NoReward" "Default" ) ) )
; No slaver found "Empty" ) )

Default.desc: As you enter the station you are surrounded by cheering families: "Thank you for freeing us! The Slavers are finally dead! But some of our people are still not liberated. Please take them to a place where they can be free."

Done.desc: "Thank you again for saving us! We will never forget you."

Empty.desc: You are docked at a station once used to house slaves of the Sung Empire. Now abandoned, these living quarters appear no worse than sub-standard Corporate quarters. But a closer look reveals surveillance sensors and discarded docility collars.

NoReward.desc: You are docked at the living quarters of a small slave community. Though free at last, they weep for the hundreds who died in the attack and for the family that the dead have left behind. The piercing wail of the incosolate does not completely mask the anger of those looking for revenge. You are not welcome here.

NotFree.desc: You are docked at a station used to house slaves. Two men meet you at the airlock: "Get out of here! Leave while you can before the Slavers return!"

Default.desc: Pick an item to use as fuel.
Default.Initialize:
(block (thisItem curEngine) (setq thisItem (scrGetItem gScreen)) (setq gMaxCount 0) (setq curEngine (shpGetEngineCore gPlayerShip)) (switch (not thisItem) (scrSetDesc gScreen "You do not have any items that can be used as fuel.")
(or (and (itmHasModifier thisItem "100MW") (ls curEngine 1)) (and (itmHasModifier thisItem "1GW") (ls curEngine 2)) (and (itmHasModifier thisItem "10GW") (ls curEngine 3))) (scrSetDesc gScreen "You cannot use this kind of fuel in your ship's reactor.")
(setq gMaxCount (itmGetCount thisItem)) )
; Enable/disable actions (scrEnableAction gScreen 0 (gr gMaxCount 0)) )

RefuelQuantity.Initialize: (block (thisItem maxNeeded) (setq thisItem (scrGetItem gScreen)) (setq maxNeeded (shpGetFuelNeeded gPlayerShip thisItem)) (if (ls maxNeeded gMaxCount) (setq gMaxCount maxNeeded) ) (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "How many " (itmGetName thisItem 2) " do you wish to use?")) (scrSetCounter gScreen gMaxCount) )

Actions.Action: (block (count) (setq count (scrGetCounter gScreen)) (if (gr count gMaxCount) (scrSetCounter gScreen gMaxCount) (block (itemsToUse) (setq itemsToUse (scrRemoveItem gScreen count)) (shpRefuelFromItem gPlayerShip itemsToUse) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsShipInterior;") ) ) )

Default.Initialize:
(block (curEngine upgradeName) (setq curEngine (shpGetEngineCore gPlayerShip)) (setq gCanUpgrade True) (switch (eq curEngine 0) (block Nil (setq gCost 10000) (setq upgradeName "100 megawatt reactor") )
(eq curEngine 1) (block Nil (setq gCost 50000) (setq upgradeName "1 gigawatt reactor") )
(block Nil (scrSetDesc gScreen "This station cannot upgrade your ship's reactor further.") (setq gCanUpgrade Nil) ) )
(if (and gCanUpgrade (gr gCost (plyGetCredits gPlayer))) (block Nil (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "It will cost " gCost " credits to upgrade to a " upgradeName ". Unfortunately, you do not have enough credits to proceed.")) (setq gCanUpgrade Nil) ) )
(if gCanUpgrade (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "Your ship's reactor can be upgraded to a " upgradeName " for " gCost " credits.")) )
; Enable/disable actions (scrEnableAction gScreen 0 gCanUpgrade) )

Actions.Action: (if gCanUpgrade (block Nil (shpSetEngineCore gPlayerShip (add (shpGetEngineCore gPlayerShip) 1)) (plyCharge gPlayer gCost) (scrShowPane gScreen "Done") ) )

Done.desc: Your ship's reactor has been upgraded.

Default.Initialize: (if (itmIsKnown gItem) (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "What armor segment do you wish to apply the " (itmGetName gItem 0) " to?")) (scrSetDesc gScreen "The barrel seems to contain some kind of armor paste. What armor segment do you wish to apply this paste to?") )

UseArmorCoating.Initialize:
(block (coatingType) ; Apply paste to armor ; ; gItem is the armor paste ; gArmorSegment is the segment to apply to ; (setq coatingType (itmGetTypeData gItem)) (switch (eq coatingType 'ablative) (block (desc result) (setq desc "The paste is an ablative coating that resists laser and particle beam damage.")
(setq result (shpAddArmorSpecialAbility gPlayerShip gArmorSegment 0x01) )
(switch (eq result 0) (setq desc (cat desc " Your armor is now protected."))
(eq result 1) (setq desc (cat desc " Your armor is already protected by an ablative coating so the paste is ineffective."))
(eq result 3) (setq desc (cat desc " Your armor is now protected. Unfortunately, the paste has destroyed your armor's carbon strengthening."))
(eq result 4) (setq desc (cat desc " Your armor is now protected. Unfortunately, the paste has destroyed your armor's impact resistance."))
(eq result 5) (setq desc (cat desc " Your armor is now protected. Unfortunately, the paste has destroyed your armor's reflective coating.")) )
(scrSetDesc gScreen desc) )
(eq coatingType 'acid) (block Nil (shpDamageArmor gPlayerShip gArmorSegment 2 (rollDice 3 6 0)) (scrSetDesc gScreen "Unfortunately, the barrel contained an organic acid that eats through most metals. Your armor has been damaged.") )
(eq coatingType 'carbon-weave) (block (desc result) (setq desc "The coating is composed of nanomachines that strengthen your armor.")
(setq result (shpAddArmorSpecialAbility gPlayerShip gArmorSegment 0x02) ) (objRepairArmor gPlayerShip gArmorSegment 8)
(switch (eq result 0) (setq desc (cat desc " Your armor is now stronger and more resistant to damage."))
(eq result 1) (setq desc (cat desc " Your armor has already been treated by these nanomachines; the paste is ineffective."))
(eq result 2) (setq desc (cat desc " Your armor is now stronger. Unfortunately, the transformation has destroyed your armor's laser resistance."))
(eq result 4) (setq desc (cat desc " Your armor is now stronger. Unfortunately, the transformation has destroyed your armor's impact resistance."))
(eq result 5) (setq desc (cat desc " Your armor is now stronger. Unfortunately, the transformation has destroyed your armor's reflective coating.")) )
(scrSetDesc gScreen desc) )
(eq coatingType 'decon) (block Nil (setq desc "The barrel was filled with a decontamination gel.")
(if (shpIsRadioactive gPlayerShip) (block Nil (shpDecontaminate gPlayerShip) (setq desc (cat desc " Your ship has been decontaminated.")) ) (setq desc (cat desc " Since your ship is not radioactive, the gel has no effect.")) )
(scrSetDesc gScreen desc) )
(eq coatingType 'degenerating) (block Nil (setq desc "The paste is a nanomachine matrix that dissolves metals and composites.")
(setq result (shpAddArmorSpecialAbility gPlayerShip gArmorSegment 0x10) )
(switch (eq result 0) (setq desc (cat desc " The nanomachines penetrate your armor and begin to corrode it."))
(eq result 1) (setq desc (cat desc " Your armor is already infested so the paste cannot make it worse."))
(eq result 7) (setq desc (cat desc " The nanomachines penetrate your armor and begin to corrode it. Unfortunately, this has also destroyed the armor's regenerating nanomachines.")) )
(scrSetDesc gScreen desc) )
(eq coatingType 'extra-repairing) (block (needsRepair desc) (setq desc "The paste contains a colony of nanomachines that can repair your armor.") (setq needsRepair (> (objGetArmorDamage gPlayerShip gArmorSegment) 0))
(objRepairArmor gPlayerShip gArmorSegment (rollDice 4 12))
(if needsRepair (setq desc (cat desc " Your armor has been repaired.")) (setq desc (cat desc " Since your armor is undamaged the paste has no effect.")) ) (scrSetDesc gScreen desc) )
(eq coatingType 'radioactive) (block Nil (setq desc "The barrel contained radioactive waste.")
(switch (shpIsRadioactive gPlayerShip) (setq desc (cat desc " Your ship is already radioactive so the waste has no further effect."))
(armIsRadiationImmune (objGetArmorType gPlayerShip gArmorSegment)) (setq desc (cat desc " Fortunately, your armor is immune to radiation. The waste has no effect."))
(block Nil (shpMakeRadioactive gPlayerShip) (setq desc (cat desc " Your ship has been contaminated.")) ) )
(scrSetDesc gScreen desc) )
(eq coatingType 'reactive) (block (desc result) (setq desc "The paste is a reactive coating that resists kinetic and chemical explosion damage.")
(setq result (shpAddArmorSpecialAbility gPlayerShip gArmorSegment 0x04) )
(switch (eq result 0) (setq desc (cat desc " Your armor is now protected."))
(eq result 1) (setq desc (cat desc " Your armor is already protected by a reactive coating so the paste is ineffective."))
(eq result 2) (setq desc (cat desc " Your armor is now protected. Unfortunately, the paste has destroyed your armor's laser resistance."))
(eq result 3) (setq desc (cat desc " Your armor is now protected. Unfortunately, the paste has destroyed your armor's carbon strengthening."))
(eq result 5) (setq desc (cat desc " Your armor is now protected. Unfortunately, the paste has destroyed your armor's reflective coating.")) )
(scrSetDesc gScreen desc) )
(eq coatingType 'reflective) (block (desc result) (setq desc "The paste is an mirrored coating that reflects laser beams.")
(setq result (shpAddArmorSpecialAbility gPlayerShip gArmorSegment 0x08) )
(switch (eq result 0) (setq desc (cat desc " Your armor now reflects all laser energy."))
(eq result 1) (setq desc (cat desc " Your armor is already protected by a reflective coating so the paste is ineffective."))
(eq result 2) (setq desc (cat desc " Your armor now reflects all laser energy."))
(eq result 3) (setq desc (cat desc " Your armor now reflects all laser energy. Unfortunately, the paste has destroyed your armor's carbon strengthening."))
(eq result 4) (setq desc (cat desc " Your armor now reflects all laser energy. Unfortunately, the paste has destroyed your armor's impact resistance.")) )
(scrSetDesc gScreen desc) )
(eq coatingType 'regenerating) (block Nil (setq desc "The paste is a nanomachine matrix that regenerates the armor segment.")
(setq result (shpAddArmorSpecialAbility gPlayerShip gArmorSegment 0x20) )
(switch (eq result 0) (setq desc (cat desc " The nanomachines penetrate your armor and activate themselves."))
(eq result 1) (setq desc (cat desc " Your armor is already enhanced so the paste is ineffective."))
(eq result 6) (setq desc (cat desc " The nanomachines penetrate your armor and activate themselves. Fortunately, this has destroyed the infestation of degenerating nanos.")) )
(scrSetDesc gScreen desc) )
(eq coatingType 'repairing) (block (needsRepair desc) (setq desc "The paste is a silicon-based compound that patches damaged sections of your armor.") (setq needsRepair (> (objGetArmorDamage gPlayerShip gArmorSegment) 0))
(objRepairArmor gPlayerShip gArmorSegment (rollDice 3 6))
(if needsRepair (setq desc (cat desc " Your armor has been repaired.")) (setq desc (cat desc " Since your armor is undamaged the paste has no effect.")) ) (scrSetDesc gScreen desc) )
(scrSetDesc gScreen "Unknown barrel type") )
; Remove the armor paste from the player's list (objRemoveItem gPlayerShip gItem 1)
; Identify the item (itmSetKnown gItem) )

Default.desc: Which armor segment do you wish to attempt to repair with this patch?

UseArmorPatch.Initialize:
(block (needsRepair) ; Apply patch to armor ; ; gItem is the armor paste ; gArmorSegment is the segment to apply to ; (setq needsRepair (> (objGetArmorDamage gPlayerShip gArmorSegment) 0)) (if needsRepair (block (patchType repair roll) (setq patchType (itmGetTypeData gItem)) (switch (eq patchType 'small) (setq repair 5) (eq patchType 'large) (setq repair 15) )
(setq roll (random 1 20)) (switch (eq roll 1) (block Nil (shpDamageArmor gPlayerShip gArmorSegment 2 (rollDice 2 6 0)) (scrSetDesc gScreen "Unfortunately, your attempt to repair the armor has only damaged it further.") ) (eq roll 2) (block Nil (scrSetDesc gScreen "Unfortunately, your attempt to repair the armor was unsuccessful and the armor patch was ruined in the process.") ) (block Nil (objRepairArmor gPlayerShip gArmorSegment repair) (scrSetDesc gScreen "You have successfully applied the armor patch to your armor.") ) )
(objRemoveItem gPlayerShip gItem 1) ) (scrSetDesc gScreen "That armor segment is not damaged. There is no need to attempt repairs.") ) )

Default.desc: What item do you wish to use the longzhu sphere on?

Actions.Action:
(block (itemType cursor) (setq gItem (scrGetItem gScreen)) (setq itemType (itmGetUNID gItem)) (setq cursor (scrGetItemListCursor gScreen))
(switch (eq itemType &itQianlongArchcannon;) (block (rechargeNeeded) (setq rechargeNeeded (subtract 120 (shpGetItemCharges gPlayerShip cursor))) (switch (eq rechargeNeeded 0) (setq gTitle "The longzhu sphere glows with stored power but the Qianlong archcannon is unaffected.")
(block Nil (setq gTitle (cat "The longzhu sphere glows with stored power and the Qianlong archcannon hums with new energy. Your Qianlong archcannon has been recharged.")) (shpRechargeItem gPlayerShip cursor rechargeNeeded) ) )
(objRemoveItem gPlayerShip (itmCreate &itLongzhuSphere; 1)) (scrShowPane gScreen "Used") )
(or (eq itemType &itTritiumPropulsionUpgrade;) (eq itemType &itTitanFusionDrive;) (eq itemType &itPteracniumMegadrive;) (itmMatches gItem "s") (itmMatches gItem "w +EnergyWeapon;") ) (block Nil (switch (itmIsDamaged gItem) (setq gTitle (cat "The longzhu sphere glows with stored power and the " (itmGetName gItem 32) " hums with new energy. Your " (itmGetName gItem 32) " has been repaired.")) (itmIsEnhanced gItem) (setq gTitle (cat "The longzhu sphere glows with stored power and the " (itmGetName gItem 32) " hums with new energy. Your " (itmGetName gItem 32) " is already enhanced and cannot be enhanced further.")) (setq gTitle (cat "The longzhu sphere glows with stored power and the " (itmGetName gItem 32) " hums with new energy. Your " (itmGetName gItem 32) " has been enhanced.")) ) (shpEnhanceItem gPlayerShip cursor) (objRemoveItem gPlayerShip (itmCreate &itLongzhuSphere; 1)) (scrShowPane gScreen "Used") )
(scrShowPane gScreen "NoEffect") ) )

NoEffect.Initialize: (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "The longzhu sphere has no effect on " (itmGetName gItem 4) "."))

Default.Initialize:
(block (desc) (setq gLevel (intBlackMarketPromotion))
(switch (ls gLevel 4) (setq desc "Two men with heavy weapons grab you as soon as you come out of the airlock: \"The boss wants to see you!\" They take you inside the station.")
(setq desc (plyComposeString gPlayer "Two men with heavy weapons walk up to you as you come out of the airlock: \"The boss would like to see you, %sir%. Please follow us.\" They take you inside the station to see Lord Mikho.")) )
(scrSetDesc gScreen desc) )

Promotion.Initialize:
(block (desc) (switch (eq gLevel 2) (setq desc "You are brought to Lord Mikho's outer office. A young, dark-haired woman in a tight neo-linen suit stands up as you walk in: \"In recognition of your services to the Sindikat, Lord Mikho has decided to promote you to the level of Smuggler. Congratulations and thank you for your loyalty.\"\n\nShe turns her back to you as you are escorted out.")
(eq gLevel 3) (setq desc "You are brought to Lord Mikho's outer office. A young, dark-haired woman in a tight neo-linen suit smiles as you walk in: \"Lord Mikho has promoted you to the level of Enforcer. Congratulations and thank you for your loyalty.\"\n\nShe shakes hands with you before you leave. You are escorted out.")
(eq gLevel 4) (setq desc "Lord Mikho is in his office. A young, dark-haired woman sits on the sofa next to him. Lord Mikho speaks: \"Good evening, %name%! Your services to us have been exemplary and the Sindikat has officially decided to make you a member. I am sure that you will not disappoint us.\"")
(eq gLevel 5) (setq desc "Lord Mikho is in his office. A young, dark-haired woman sits on the sofa next to him. Lord Mikho speaks: \"Good evening, %name%! You have been most useful to us and we have decided to promote you to the rank of Lieutenant in the Sindikat. I am sure that you will not disappoint us.\"")
(eq gLevel 6) (setq desc "Lord Mikho is waiting for you in his study. \"My dear %name%! Your fame and exploits have made you powerful friends among the Sindikat. I bow before your abilities and extend to you the title of Sindikat Lord!\"") )
(scrSetDesc gScreen desc) )

Default.desc: Two men with heavy weapons grab you as soon as you come out the airlock: "The boss wants to see you!" They take you inside the station to see Lord Mikho.

Actions.Action:
(if (geq (plyGetCredits gPlayer) (objGetData gPlayerShip "blackMarketCrimeCost"))
; If the player has enough money, then let her pay off the boss (scrShowPane gScreen "PaymentInFull")
; Otherwise, the player is killed (block Nil (plyDestroyed gPlayer "killed by Lord Mikho") (scrShowPane gScreen "Killed") ) )
(block Nil (plyCharge gPlayer (objGetData gPlayerShip "blackMarketCrimeCost")) (objSetData gPlayerShip "blackMarketCrimeCost" Nil) (scrShowPane gScreen "PaymentInFull2") )

PaymentInFull2.desc: After paying your debt, Lord Mikho assures you that the bounty hunters will be called off. The armed guards lead you back to your ship.

Default.desc: Two men with heavy weapons stand guard in the docking bay. As you approach, they stop you. "No one is interested in doing business with you. Get lost!"
There are no items here.
Default.Initialize:
(block (thisItem) (setq thisItem (scrGetItem gScreen)) (if thisItem (block (affordCount availCount desc fitCount) (setq gCost (itmGetPrice thisItem))
; Compute the cost of this item, including the mark-up ; If gMargin is a function then we call the function to ; compute the mark-up. Otherwise, margin is the % of ; cost that we raise the price by. (if (isfunction gMargin) (setq gCost (apply gMargin thisItem Nil)) (setq gCost (add gCost (divide (multiply gCost gMargin) 100))) )
(setq availCount (itmGetCount thisItem))
(if (gr gCost 0) (setq affordCount (divide (plyGetCredits gPlayer) gCost)) (setq affordCount 0) ) (setq gMaxCount (if (gr affordCount availCount) availCount affordCount))
(setq fitCount (divide (objGetCargoSpaceLeft gPlayerShip) (itmGetMass thisItem))) (setq gMaxCount (if (gr gMaxCount fitCount) fitCount gMaxCount))
; Set the price and description (setq desc (cat "Unit price: " (if (eq gCost 0) "N/A" gCost))) (if (gr gMaxCount 1) (setq desc (cat desc " (" gMaxCount " for " (multiply gCost gMaxCount) ")")) )
(setq desc (cat desc "\nUnit mass: " (intMassString (itmGetMass thisItem)))) (if (gr gMaxCount 1) (setq desc (cat desc " (" gMaxCount " at " (intMassString (multiply (itmGetMass thisItem) gMaxCount)) ")")) )
(setq desc (cat desc "\n\n"))
(switch (eq gCost 0) (setq desc (cat desc "This item is not for sale.")) (eq affordCount 0) (setq desc (cat desc "You do not have enough credits to purchase any.")) (eq fitCount 0) (setq desc (cat desc "Unfortunately, you cannot fit any in your cargo hold.")) (and (gr availCount affordCount) (gr fitCount affordCount)) (setq desc (cat desc "You have enough credits to buy " affordCount ".")) (and (gr availCount fitCount)) (setq desc (cat desc "You have enough room in your cargo hold to carry " fitCount ".")) )
(scrSetDesc gScreen desc) ) (setq gMaxCount 0) )
; Enable/disable actions (scrEnableAction gScreen 0 (gr gMaxCount 0)) )

BuyQuantity.Initialize: (block Nil (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "How many items do you wish to purchase at " gCost " credits each?")) (scrSetCounter gScreen gMaxCount) )

Default.desc: There are no items here.
Default.Initialize:
(block (thisItem) (if (not gTitle) (setq gTitle (objGetName gStation 65)) )
(setq thisItem (scrGetItem gScreen)) (if thisItem (block (affordCount availCount desc priceText) (setq gCost (itmGetPrice thisItem))
; Compute the cost of this item, including the mark-up ; If gMargin is a function then we call the function to ; compute the mark-up. Otherwise, margin is the % of ; cost that we lower the price by. (if (isfunction gMargin) (setq gCost (apply gMargin thisItem Nil)) (setq gCost (subtract gCost (divide (multiply gCost gMargin) 100))) )
(if (not (itmIsKnown thisItem)) (setq gCost (divide gCost 10)) ) (if (not (itmMatches thisItem gBuyCriteria)) (setq gCost 0) )
(setq availCount (itmGetCount thisItem)) (setq gMaxCount availCount)
(if (gr gCost gMaxPrice) (block Nil (setq affordCount 0) (setq gMaxCount 0) ) (setq affordCount 1) )
; Set the price and description (setq priceText (cat "Unit offer: " (if (eq gCost 0) "N/A" gCost))) (if (gr availCount 1) (setq priceText (cat priceText " (" availCount " for " (multiply gCost availCount) ")")) )
(setq priceText (cat priceText "\nUnit mass: " (intMassString (itmGetMass thisItem)))) (if (gr availCount 1) (setq priceText (cat priceText " (" availCount " at " (intMassString (multiply (itmGetMass thisItem) availCount)) ")")) )
(setq priceText (cat priceText "\n\n"))
(switch (eq gCost 0) (setq desc (cat gTitle " is not interested in buying " (itmGetName thisItem 2) ".")) (eq affordCount 0) (setq desc (cat gTitle " cannot buy such a rare and priceless item.")) (eq availCount 1) (setq desc (cat priceText gTitle " offers " gCost " credits for your " (itmGetName thisItem 0) ".")) (setq desc (cat priceText gTitle " offers " gCost " credits for each " (itmGetName thisItem 0) ".")) )
(scrSetDesc gScreen desc) ) (setq gMaxCount 0) )
; Enable/disable actions (scrEnableAction gScreen 0 (and (gr gCost 0) (gr gMaxCount 0))) )

SellQuantity.Initialize: (block Nil (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "How many items do you wish to sell at " gCost " credits each?")) (scrSetCounter gScreen gMaxCount) )

Default.Initialize: (if (geq (plyGetCredits gPlayer) 250) (block Nil (scrSetDesc gScreen "Commonwealth Customs stops your ship for decontamination. You are automatically charged 250 credits for decontaminating your ship.") (plyCharge gPlayer 250) (shpDecontaminate gPlayerShip) ) (scrSetDesc gScreen "Commonwealth Customs stops your ship for decontamination. Unfortunately, you cannot afford the 250 credit cost of decontamination.") )

(block (desc itemToRemove) ; Free the slaves (setq totalSlaves 0) (enum (objGetItems gPlayerShip "*+Slaves;") itemToRemove (block Nil (setq totalSlaves (add totalSlaves (itmGetCount itemToRemove))) (objRemoveItem gPlayerShip itemToRemove) ) )
; Keep track of how many we have freed in total (objIncData gPlayerShip "slavesFreed" totalSlaves)
; Create description (setq desc "As soon as you dock you inform the Commonwealth authorities that you have rescued ") (switch (eq totalSlaves 1) (setq desc (cat desc "a slave. The jaded officer takes the slave coffin and files a routine report."))
(eq totalSlaves 2) (setq desc (cat desc "a couple of slaves. The jaded officer takes the two slave coffins and files a routine report."))
(setq desc (cat desc "several slaves. The officer in charge thanks you for your role in the rescue: \"You must have a pretty good ship to have survived a fight against Slavers!\"")) )
(scrSetDesc gScreen desc) )

Actions.Action:
(block (freed rewarded) (setq freed (objGetData gPlayerShip "slavesFreed")) (setq rewarded (objGetData gPlayerShip "slaveReward"))
(switch (and (geq freed 12) (ls rewarded 12)) (scrShowPane gScreen "Reward1")
(and (geq freed 24) (ls rewarded 24)) (scrShowPane gScreen "Reward1")
(scrShowScreen gScreen gPrevScreen) ) )

Reward1.Initialize:
(block (reward roll) ; Create a random reward (setq roll (random 1 100)) (switch (ls roll 25) (setq reward (itmCreate &itLongzhuSphere; (random 1 3)))
(ls roll 60) (setq reward (itmCreate &itPromethiumCrystal; (random 1 6)))
(setq reward (itmCreate &itCalligraphyScroll; 1)) )
; Give it to the player (objAddItem gPlayerShip reward) (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "Once revived, one of the former slaves turns to you and puts something in your hand. She turns and walks away without saying a word. When you open your hand you see: " (itmGetName reward 8) ".")) )

Default.Initialize: (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "As you enter the station you are surrounded by heavily armed soldiers. A Commonwealth official approaches you: \"You are under arrest for " (objGetData gPlayerShip "commonCrime") "\"" ))

Default.desc: The dockmaster stops you as you disembark: "Hey! Get that contaminated ship off my dock!"
You are in a large and crowded spacer bar.

Story.Initialize:
(block (allEnemies bestStation bestLevel bestMessage allStories) ; Define list of stations that we know about (setq allStories '( (1 &stCentauriOccupation; 10) (2 &stOutlawBase; 20) (3 &stKorolovShipping; 11) (4 &stHotel; 22) (5 &stTerroristCamp; 30) (6 &stBlackMarketStation; 31) (7 &stDrugCartelOutpost; 40) (8 &stSungSlaveCamp; 41) (9 &stPenitentShrine; 50) (10 &stXenophobeFleet; 60) (11 &stTempusLab; 21) ))
; Find the best station to tell a story about (setq bestLevel 0) (setq bestMessage 0)
; Look for enemy station in the system (setq allEnemies (sysFindObject gPlayerShip "tAM")) (enum allEnemies station (block (type) (setq type (staGetType station))
; Figure out if there is a story for this station (enum allStories story (if (eq (item story 1) type) (if (gr (item story 2) bestLevel) (block Nil (setq bestStation station) (setq bestLevel (item story 2)) (setq bestMessage (item story 0)) ) ) ) ) ) )
; Tell the story (scrSetDesc gScreen (switch (eq bestMessage 0) "You spend 5 credits on drinks; everyone else around you seems to be having a good time."
(eq bestMessage 1) (cat "You listen to a refugee from " (objGetName bestStation) ": \"Centauri warlords took over our station last month. WhateverI like this place better.\" You spend 5 credits and buy him a few drinks.")
(eq bestMessage 2) "You spend 5 credits on drinks. A young stationer next to you comments that its a lot easier to get laudanum now that the Oulaw base is in the system."
(eq bestMessage 3) (block (rank) (setq rank (objGetData gPlayerShip "korolovRank")) (switch (or (not rank) (eq rank 0)) "You spend 5 credits on drinks. You talk to a couple of freighter pilots who try to convince you to fly escort missions for Korolov Shipping."
(eq rank -1) "A group of freighter pilots point in your direction, talking about how you blew your escort mission. You settle up a 5 credit tab and get ready to leave."
"A group of freighter pilots welcome you into their group. You tell various stories about your run-ins with the Charon pirates, but in the end you still get stuck with the 5 credit tab." ) )
(eq bestMessage 4) (cat "You talk to a corporate woman staying at the " (objGetName bestStation) ". She drones on about the excellent service. You spend 5 credits on drinks.")
(eq bestMessage 5) "You spend 5 credits and listen to a nuclear technician: \"I just got paid ten kilocreds to install a radiation room at the Sapiens camp! Those flippers scare mewith all their talk about 'human purity' they seem a little short on the brain scale.\""
(eq bestMessage 6) "A woman dressed in a fancy neolinen suit talks to you: \"Do you know how to get a contact at the black market station? You look like you might know.\" You spend 5 credits on drinks."
(eq bestMessage 7) "An old man talks to you: \"I don't trust the corporate medlabsthey talk about drug shortages while they munch on oncokillers and antigens! I'm going to the Death Labswhat's the worst they can do? Kill me?\" You spend 5 credits to buy him a drink."
(eq bestMessage 8) "You spend 5 credits while listening to a drunk woman: \"My sister-in-law was abducted by those filthy Sung. We finally got her released by buying her contract. I can't believe they allow slavery to exist. Hey, can you buy me a drink?\""
(eq bestMessage 9) "You drink through 5 credits while talking to an attractive Sister: \"The Sisters of Domina believe in the power of transcendence, but we worship Domina because she brings life and beauty. Say, you're not a Penitent, are you? Good! The Penitents only care about power and deathOracus controls them, you know.\""
(eq bestMessage 10) "You spend 5 credits buying drinks for a mercenary. He talk about his encounters with the Xenophobes: \"The minute I see their green ships I turn tailI'm not proud. And you shouldn't be either!\""
(eq bestMessage 11) "A man dressed in an expensive suit talks to you: \"You look like you need some Tempus.\" You ignore him and spend 5 credits buying your own drinks."
"You spend 5 credits, but the drinks are weak." ) ) )

NoMoney.desc: You hang around for a while, but you have no money to buy drinks.

Action.name: "I can sell you whatever you want."

Actions.Action: (block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "&dsCommonwealthNightclub;") ; We can charge more because we took more risks (setq gMargin -50) (setq gBuyCriteria "*NU +Illegal; -ID;") (setq gMaxPrice 10000) (setq gTitle "The Victorian Nightclub") (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsExchangeSell;") )

Action.name: "I have no idea what you're talking about."

Nothing.desc: You are in a large dance club where women and men dressed in leather and latex dance to classical music. Almost everyone here has the doe-eyed look common to those with an impaired nervous system. The heat and noise are oppresive and you choose not to stay long.

DeliveryMission.desc: You are in a large dance club where women and men dressed in leather and lace dance to classical music. A nondescript man dances next to you and whispers, "I hope you have what I need."

Actions.Action: (block Nil (objRemoveItem gPlayerShip (itmCreate &itBlackMarketContainer; 1)) (objSetData gPlayerShip "blackMarketMission" Nil) (objIncData gPlayerShip "blackMarketXP" 150) (scrShowPane gScreen "DeliveryComplete") )

Action.name: "I have no idea what you're talking about."

DeliveryComplete.desc: The nondescript man follows you to your cargo hold and takes the sealed container. He smiles as he leaves, "Say hello to Aubrey for me!"

Default.desc: You are in the outer docking level of a large station of the Commonwealth. A monorail terminal provides access to various points around the station.

DefaultWithInfo.desc: You are in the outer docking level of a large station of the Commonwealth. A monorail terminal provides access to various points around the station.

CommoditiesExchange.Initialize: (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "Welcome to the " (objGetName gStation) " Commodities Exchange Market."))

(block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "&dsCommonwealthStation;") (setq gPrevPane "DockServices") (setq gTechLevel 6) (setq gArmorSegment 0) (setq gArmorSegmentNames '("forward" "starboard" "aft" "port")) (setq gMargin 100) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsRepairArmor;") )
(block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "&dsCommonwealthStation;") (setq gPrevPane "DockServices") (setq gCheckMilitaryID True) (setq gMargin 100) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsInstallDevice;") )

CentralPlaza.desc: You are in the central hub of this station, a busy area where trendy shops mix with high-end residences.

Default.desc: As you exit the docking ramp, Commonwealth Troopers train their weapons on you: "This is a military ship, civie!"

Default.Initialize: (block Nil ; Set the description (scrSetDesc gScreen "You are at the docking services deck.") )

(block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "&dsFleetDockServices;") (setq gPrevPane "Default") (setq gTechLevel 9) (setq gArmorSegment 0) (setq gArmorSegmentNames '("forward" "starboard" "aft" "port")) ; Dock services are free if at fleetLevel 4 or greater (setq gMargin (if (geq (objGetData gPlayerShip "fleetLevel") 4) 0 100)) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsRepairArmor;") )

(block Nil (setq gSavedPrevScreen gPrevScreen) (setq gPrevScreen "&dsFleetDockServices;") (setq gPrevPane "Default") (setq gCheckMilitaryID True) (setq gMargin (if (geq (objGetData gPlayerShip "fleetLevel") 4) 0 100)) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsInstallDevice;") )
(block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "&dsFleetDockServices;") (setq gPrevPane "Default") (setq gMargin (if (geq (objGetData gPlayerShip "fleetLevel") 4) 0 100)) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsRemoveDevice;") )

FreeRefuel.Initialize:
(block (count itemsToUse) ; Refuel the ship (setq count (shpGetFuelNeeded gPlayerShip (itmCreate &itHelium3FuelRod; 1))) (setq itemsToUse (itmCreate &itHelium3FuelRod; count)) (shpRefuelFromItem gPlayerShip itemsToUse)
; Desc (scrSetDesc gScreen (plyComposeString gPlayer "The dock master salutes you as she refuels your ship, \"No charge, %sir%!\" Your ship has been refueled.")) )

Default.Initialize:
(block (newLevel) (setq newLevel (intFleetPromotion)) (switch (eq newLevel 2) (block Nil (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "In recognition of your service to the Fleet, the Captain of " (objGetName gStation 4) " awards you the title of Privateer and bestows upon you the Ares Campaign Ribbon.")) (objAddItem gPlayerShip (itmCreate &itAresCampaignRibbon; 1)) )
(eq newLevel 3) (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "In recognition of your service, the Captain of " (objGetName gStation 4) " awards you the title of Ensign in the Commonwealth Fleet."))
(eq newLevel 4) (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "In recognition of your service, the Captain of " (objGetName gStation 4) " promotes you to the rank of Fleet Lieutenant."))
(eq newLevel 5) (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "In recognition of your service, the Captain of " (objGetName gStation 4) " promotes you to the rank of Fleet Commander."))
(eq newLevel 6) (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "In recognition of your service, the Captain of " (objGetName gStation 4) " promotes you to the rank of Fleet Captain."))
(scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "The Captain of " (objGetName gStation 4) " commends you for your service.")) )
(objSetData gPlayerShip "fleetLevel" newLevel) )

Default.desc: There are no items here.
Default.Initialize:
(block (thisItem) (setq thisItem (scrGetItem gScreen)) (if thisItem (block (affordCount availCount desc itemMass) (setq itemMass (itmGetMass thisItem)) (setq availCount (itmGetCount thisItem)) (setq affordCount (divide (objGetCargoSpaceLeft gPlayerShip) itemMass)) (setq gMaxCount (if (gr affordCount availCount) availCount affordCount))
(setq desc (cat "Unit mass: " (intMassString (itmGetMass thisItem)))) (if (gr gMaxCount 1) (setq desc (cat desc " (" gMaxCount " at " (intMassString (multiply (itmGetMass thisItem) gMaxCount)) ")")) )
(setq desc (cat desc "\n\n"))
(switch (eq gMaxCount 0) (setq desc (cat desc "You do not have enough space to carry " (itmGetName thisItem 4) ".")) (eq gMaxCount 1) (setq desc (cat desc "You have enough room to carry one " (itmGetName thisItem 0) ".")) (gr availCount affordCount) (setq desc (cat desc "You have enough room to carry only " affordCount " " (itmGetName thisItem 2) ".")) (setq desc (cat desc "You have enough room to carry all " (itmGetName thisItem 8) ".")) )
(scrSetDesc gScreen desc) ) (setq gMaxCount 0) )
; Enable/disable actions (scrEnableAction gScreen 0 (gr gMaxCount 0)) )

(scrSetDesc gScreen info) )

(block (maxAfford) (setq gMaxCount (shpGetFuelNeeded gPlayerShip (itmCreate &itHelium3FuelRod; 1))) (setq maxAfford (divide (plyGetCredits gPlayer) gCost)) (if (geq maxAfford gMaxCount) (switch (eq gMaxCount 0) (scrSetDesc gScreen "You ship is does not need any fuel.")
