(scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "Your ship needs " gMaxCount " fuel rods to refuel. Each fuel rod costs " gCost " credits. How many do you wish to buy?")) ) (block Nil (setq gMaxCount maxAfford) (switch (eq gMaxCount 0) (scrSetDesc gScreen "You cannot afford to refuel your ship.") (eq gMaxCount 1) (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "Each fuel rod costs " gCost " credits. You can only afford a single fuel rod.")) (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "Each fuel rod costs " gCost " credits. You can only afford " gMaxCount " fuel rods. How many do you wish to buy?")) ) ) ) (scrSetCounter gScreen gMaxCount)
; Enable/disable actions (scrEnableAction gScreen 0 (gr gMaxCount 0)) )

Actions.Action: (block (count) (setq count (scrGetCounter gScreen)) (if (gr count gMaxCount) (scrSetCounter gScreen gMaxCount) (block (itemsToUse) (setq itemsToUse (itmCreate &itHelium3FuelRod; count)) (shpRefuelFromItem gPlayerShip itemsToUse) (plyCharge gPlayer (multiply count gCost)) (scrShowScreen gScreen gPrevScreen gPrevPane) ) ) )

Default.desc: There are no items in your cargo hold that can be jettisoned.
Default.Initialize:
(block (thisItem) (setq thisItem (scrGetItem gScreen))
(if thisItem (block (fitCount itemMass) (setq itemMass (itmGetMass thisItem)) (setq fitCount (divide (objGetCargoSpaceLeft gStation) itemMass)) (setq availCount (itmGetCount thisItem)) (setq gMaxCount (if (gr fitCount availCount) availCount fitCount))
(setq desc (cat "Unit mass: " (intMassString (itmGetMass thisItem)))) (if (gr gMaxCount 1) (setq desc (cat desc " (" gMaxCount " at " (intMassString (multiply (itmGetMass thisItem) gMaxCount)) ")")) )
(if (ls fitCount 100000) (setq desc (cat desc "
Capacity: " (intMassString (objGetCargoSpaceLeft gStation)))) )
(switch (eq gMaxCount 0) (setq desc (cat desc "

There is not enough space here to jettison " (itmGetName thisItem 4) ".")) (eq gMaxCount 1) (setq desc (cat desc "

There is enough space to jettison one " (itmGetName thisItem 0) ".")) (gr availCount fitCount) (setq desc (cat desc "

There is enough space to jettison only " fitCount " " (itmGetName thisItem 2) ".")) (setq desc (cat desc "

There is enough space to jettison all " (itmGetName thisItem 8) ".")) )
(scrSetDesc gScreen desc) ) (setq gMaxCount 0) )
; Enable/disable actions (scrEnableAction gScreen 0 (gr gMaxCount 0)) )

Actions.Action:
(switch (gr gMaxCount 1) (scrShowPane gScreen "JettisonQuantity")
(eq gMaxCount 1) (block (itemsToJettison) ; Dump items (setq itemsToJettison (scrRemoveItem gScreen 1)) (objAddItem gStation itemsToJettison) (scrShowPane gScreen "Default") ) )

JettisonQuantity.Initialize: (block Nil (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "How many items do you wish to jettison?")) (scrSetCounter gScreen gMaxCount) )

Actions.Action: (block (count) (setq count (scrGetCounter gScreen)) (if (gr count gMaxCount) (scrSetCounter gScreen gMaxCount) (block (itemsToJettison) ; Dump items (setq itemsToJettison (scrRemoveItem gScreen count)) (objAddItem gStation itemsToJettison) (scrShowPane gScreen "Default") ) ) )

TranscendenceUniverse.Globals:
(block Nil ; Define various internal functions
(setq intBlackMarketPromotion (lambda Nil ; Returns level that the player is promoted to (or Nil)
(block (xp newLevel) (setq xp (objGetData gPlayerShip "blackMarketXP")) (switch (geq xp 10000) (setq newLevel 6)
(geq xp 3000) (setq newLevel 5)
(geq xp 1250) (setq newLevel 4)
(geq xp 500) (setq newLevel 3)
(geq xp 200) (setq newLevel 2)
(setq newLevel 1) )
; Return if different from current level (if (eq (objGetData gPlayerShip "blackMarketLevel") newLevel) Nil newLevel ) ) ))
(setq intBlackMarketOnDestroy (lambda (cost) (if (eq aDestroyer gPlayerShip) (block Nil (objIncData gPlayerShip "blackMarketCrimeCost" cost) (if (objGetData gPlayerShip "blackMarketCrime") (objSetData gPlayerShip "blackMarketCrime" "multiple offenses against the Sindikat") (objSetData gPlayerShip "blackMarketCrime" (cat "the destruction of " (objGetName gStation 4))) ) ) ) ))
(setq intBlackMarketOnInit (lambda (prevScreen) (block Nil (setq gPrevScreen prevScreen)
; Initialize all variables that we need (if (not (objGetData gPlayerShip "blackMarketXP")) (block Nil (objSetData gPlayerShip "blackMarketXP" 0) (objSetData gPlayerShip "blackMarketLevel" 1) (objSetData gPlayerShip "blackMarketWeapon" 2) (objSetData gPlayerShip "blackMarketShields" 1) ) )
; Docking (switch ; If the ship is radioactive then refuse dock (shpIsRadioactive gPlayerShip) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsRefuseContamination;")
; If there is a bounty on the player, then the player ; has to repay the debt. (objGetData gPlayerShip "blackMarketCrimeCost") (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsBlackMarketPayDebt;")
; If the player is on a mission but lost the cargo then ; she's in trouble (and (eq (objGetData gPlayerShip "blackMarketMission") "StK") (not (objGetItems gPlayerShip "*U +SealedContainer;")) ) (block Nil (objIncData gPlayerShip "blackMarketCrimeCost" 50000) (objSetData gPlayerShip "blackMarketCrime" "losing valuable cargo") (objSetData gPlayerShip "blackMarketMission" Nil) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsBlackMarketPayDebt;") )
; If the player does not have a black market ID, then ; refuse dock (not (objGetItems gPlayerShip "*+BlackMarketID")) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsBlackMarketRefuseDock;")
; See if the player is promoted (and (scrIsFirstOnInit gScreen) (intBlackMarketPromotion)) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsBlackMarketPromotion;") ) ) ))
(setq intBuyItems (lambda (itemCount itemCost) (block (itemsToBuy) (setq itemsToBuy (scrRemoveItem gScreen itemCount)) (objAddItem gPlayerShip itemsToBuy) (plyCharge gPlayer (multiply itemCount itemCost))
; If the player bought items at a black market station then ; increase xp (if (and (objHasAttribute gStation "blackmarket") (itmHasModifier itemsToBuy "Illegal") ) (objIncData gPlayerShip "blackMarketXP" (divide (multiply itemCount itemCost) 100)) ) ) ))
(setq intCommonwealthCrime (lambda (severity description) (if (gr severity (int (objGetData gPlayerShip "commonCrimeSeverity"))) (block Nil (objSetData gPlayerShip "commonCrimeSeverity" severity) (objSetData gPlayerShip "commonCrime" description) ) ) ))
(setq intCommonwealthOnDestroy (lambda Nil (if (eq aDestroyer gPlayerShip) (intCommonwealthCrime 3 (cat "the destruction of " (objGetName gStation))) ) ))
(setq intCommonwealthOnInit (lambda (prevScreen) (block Nil (setq gPrevScreen prevScreen)
(switch ; If the ship is radioactive then we need to decontaminate (shpIsRadioactive gPlayerShip) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsCommonwealthDecon;")
; If the player has sold slaves then he/she is arrested (gr (int (objGetData gPlayerShip "commonCrimeSeverity")) 2) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsCommonwealthImprison;")
; If we have slaves then free them (objGetItems gPlayerShip "*+Slaves;") (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsCommonwealthFreeSlaves;")
; If the player has a black market container, then she is imprisoned (and (not (objGetItems gPlayerShip "*I+SmugglersHold;")) (objGetItems gPlayerShip "*U+SealedContainer;") ) (block Nil (intCommonwealthCrime 2 "smuggling") (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsCommonwealthImprison;") )
; If we have illegal items in the cargo hold then we need ; to confiscate them (and (not (objGetItems gPlayerShip "*I+SmugglersHold")) (or (objGetItems gPlayerShip "*U+Illegal; -ID") (and (objGetItems gPlayerShip "*U+Military") (not (objGetItems gPlayerShip "*+MilitaryID"))))) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsCommonwealthConfiscate;") ) ) ))
(setq intCorporateOnInit (lambda (prevScreen) (block Nil (setq gPrevScreen prevScreen)
(switch ; If the ship is radioactive then refuse dock (shpIsRadioactive gPlayerShip) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsRefuseContamination;") ) ) ))
(setq intCorporateOnDestroy (lambda Nil (block (corporateCruiser) ; Create a corporate cruiser to avenge the station (setq corporateCruiser (sysCreateShip &scCorporateCruiser; (objGetNearestStargate gStation) &svIndependent;) )
; If someone destroyed the station, avenge (if aDestroyer (block Nil (objSendMessage gStation gPlayerShip "Security alert! Deploy corporate enforcer!") (shpOrderAttack corporateCruiser aDestroyer) ) )
; Take all the items from the station (so that others won't loot it) (shpOrderLoot corporateCruiser gStation)
; Gate out (shpOrderGate corporateCruiser) ) ))
(setq intFleetOnInit (lambda (prevScreen) (block Nil (setq gPrevScreen prevScreen)
; Initialize all variables that we need (if (not (objGetData gPlayerShip "fleetXP")) (block Nil (objSetData gPlayerShip "fleetXP" 0) (objSetData gPlayerShip "fleetLevel" 1) (objSetData gPlayerShip "fleetTFSuccess" 0) (objSetData gPlayerShip "fleetTFFailure" 0) ) )
; Allow dock? (switch ; If the player does not have a military ID, then ; refuse dock (not (objGetItems gPlayerShip "*+MilitaryID")) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsFleetRefuseDock;") ) ) ))
(setq intFleetPromotion (lambda Nil ; Returns level that the player is promoted to (or Nil)
(block (xp newLevel) (setq xp (objGetData gPlayerShip "fleetXP")) (switch (geq xp 10000) (setq newLevel 6)
(geq xp 3000) (setq newLevel 5)
(geq xp 1250) (setq newLevel 4)
(geq xp 500) (setq newLevel 3)
(geq xp 200) (setq newLevel 2)
(setq newLevel 1) )
; Return if different from current level (if (eq (objGetData gPlayerShip "fleetLevel") newLevel) Nil newLevel ) ) ))
(setq intSellItems (lambda (itemCount itemCost) (block (itemsToSell) (setq itemsToSell (scrRemoveItem gScreen itemCount)) (objAddItem gStation itemsToSell) (plyCredit gPlayer (multiply itemCount itemCost))
; If the player just sold slaves, then keep track (if (itmHasModifier itemsToSell "Slaves") (block Nil (setq sales (objGetData gPlayerShip "slaveSales")) (if (not sales) (setq sales 0) )
(setq sales (add sales (multiply itemCount itemCost))) (objSetData gPlayerShip "slaveSales" sales)
(if (ls (random 1 25) itemCount) (intCommonwealthCrime 3 "slave-trading") ) ) ) ) ))
(setq intMassString (lambda (mass) (block Nil (switch (eq mass 1) "1 Kg"
(ls mass 1000) (cat mass " Kg")
(block (tons remainder) (setq tons (divide mass 1000)) (setq remainder (divide (add (subtract mass (multiply tons 1000)) 50) 100)) (if (eq remainder 10) (block Nil (setq tons (add tons 1)) (setq remainder 0) ) ) (cat tons "." remainder " tons") ) ) ) )) )

ItemType.name: unknown alien device
ItemType.description: This is an alien device of unknown origin. It has been recently altered to interface with a starship's systems, but its function and purpose are unknown.

ItemType.name: unknown auton
ItemType.description: This is an autonomous defense bot of some kind. Unfortunately, you cannot tell anything about its nature until you use it.

ItemType.name: barrel with strange markings
ItemType.description: These barrels are used to hold everything from chemicals to nanomachines. The markings are completely unfamiliar to you.

ItemType.name: unmarked identification chip
ItemType.description: These etched holographic chips are impossible to duplicate and often used for currency or identification.

ItemType.name: mnemonic cube
ItemType.description: These quantum-optical storage systems contain sophisticated programs and data. The programs require a quantum CPU to execute.

ItemType.name: ROM biosoft
ItemType.description: These ROM biochips are generally used to upgrade a computer's neural network. Unfortunately, you have no knowledge of the software's specific nature or purpose.

ItemType.name: halo gem
ItemType.description: The Halo Races created these gems to help them contemplate, but the dark-energies embedded within are also useful to humans. Unfortunately, there are several different kinds of gems, and you have no knowledge of this kind's purpose.

ItemType.name: alien hyperglyph rod
ItemType.description: This is an alien black rod roughly two meters long. The entire surface of the rod is microengraved with cryptic symbols and most scientists suspect that it is some form of information storage media or perhaps a sophisticated computer.

ItemType.name: 3K Siege MAG
ItemType.description: This heavy MAG grenade packs almost 100kg of hexagene explosives, a quantity sufficient to blast through the heavy armor of fortresses and military installations.

ItemType.name: 400 Hexagene MAG
ItemType.description: This is a standard hexagene high-explosive grenade compatible with the MAG launcher.

ItemType.name: 600 Hexagene MAG
ItemType.description: This is a larger version of the 400 MAG grenade. It is compatible with the MAG launcher.

ItemType.name: 800F Hexagene MAG
ItemType.description: The largest MAG in common use, the 800 series packs twice as much hexagene as the 400 MAG and surrounds it with a fragmentation jacket.

ItemType.name: segment of ablative armor
ItemType.description: Ablative armor consists of a heat-resistant polycarbon layer bonded to a titanium plate structure. The armor is ideal for absorbing laser and particle beam damage.

ItemType.name: barrel of ablative armor coating
ItemType.description: This coating is used to protect a ship's armor againt laser and particle beam weapons.

ItemType.name: Penitent cannon
ItemType.description: Very little is know about these exotic, dark-matter weapons. The Order of Penitence uses these weapons in their ships.

ItemType.name: actinide waste cannon
ItemType.description: The actinide waste cannon is a dirty weapon that shoots out a cloud of radioactive debris.

ItemType.name: segment of advanced reactive armor
ItemType.description: This is a more sophisticated version of reactive armor. Advanced reactive armor is very resistant to blast and kinetic damage.

ItemType.name: AK15 Partisan cannon
ItemType.description: This recoilless kinetic cannon, manufactured by NAMI, is more powerful than the heavy recoilless cannon.

ItemType.name: Akan 30 cannon
ItemType.description: The Akan 30 is a powerful cannon designed by the Rasiermesser Corporation. This weapon requires Akan 30 cannon shells.

ItemType.name: Akan 600 turret
ItemType.description: This weapons places an Akan 30 cannon on a computer-controlled, omnidirectional turret. This weapon requires Akan 30 cannon shells.

ItemType.name: Akan 30 cannon shell cartridge
ItemType.description: This shell cartridge is used by the Akan 30 cannon.

ItemType.name: kiloton cannon shell
ItemType.description: This shell cartridge is used by the kiloton cannon.

ItemType.name: Ares micronuke
ItemType.description: Micronukes are launched by the Ares micronuke cannon.

ItemType.name: Nandao bolt cartridge
ItemType.description: This energy cartridge is used by the Nandao bolt cannon.

ItemType.name: SmartCannon round
ItemType.description: SmartCannons are recoilless weapons modified to shoot special tracking shells. A SmartCannon round can adjust its path to strike a designated target.

ItemType.name: Ares lightning cannon
ItemType.description: During the Syrtis War the lightning cannons of the Orthodoxy were devastating to the Earth Fleet.

ItemType.name: Ares micronuke cannon
ItemType.description: These cannons can launch a thermonuclear shell at more than 60% of lightspeed.

ItemType.name: large armor patch
ItemType.description: This is a large armor plate that can be welded to your ship's armor to repair damage.

ItemType.name: small armor patch
ItemType.description: This is a small armor plate that can be welded to your ship's armor to repair damage.

ItemType.name: barrel of armor repair paste
ItemType.description: Apply this paste to an armor segment to repair light to moderate damage.

ItemType.name: case of artificial plasma
ItemType.description: This artificial blood can be stored almost indefinitely and is compatible with all blood types.

ItemType.name: AutoSentinel
ItemType.description: For around 500 credits, OmniDefense Systems' AutoSentinel keeps you and your loved ones safe from harm. NOTE: For professional security needs, order the 1M battle auton.
ItemType.Invoke:
(block (auton) ; Create the auton (setq auton (sysCreateShip &scAutoSentinel; (objGetPos gSource) &svFriendlyAuton; "auton" ) )
; Escort ship (shpOrderEscort auton gSource)
; Identify the item (itmSetKnown gItem)
; Welcome message (objSendMessage gSource Nil "AutoSentinel v2.01 online")
; Remove the item from the player's list (objRemoveItem gSource gItem 1) )

ItemType.name: 300D defender auton
ItemType.description: This is a commercial auton primarily used for defending small stations. NOTE: For professional security needs, order the 1M battle auton.
ItemType.Invoke:
(block (auton) ; Create the auton (setq auton (sysCreateShip &sc300DDefenderAuton; (objGetPos gSource) &svFriendlyAuton; "auton" ) )
; Escort ship (shpOrderEscort auton gSource)
; Identify the item (itmSetKnown gItem)
; Welcome message (objSendMessage gSource Nil "Auton 300D v2.1d online")
; Remove the item from the player's list (objRemoveItem gSource gItem 1) )

ItemType.name: 310A aegis auton
ItemType.description: This variant of the 300D is equipped with an anti-missile defense system.
ItemType.Invoke:
(block (auton) ; Create the auton (setq auton (sysCreateShip &sc310AAegisAuton; (objGetPos gSource) &svFriendlyAuton; "auton" ) )
; Escort ship (shpOrderEscort auton gSource)
; Identify the item (itmSetKnown gItem)
; Welcome message (objSendMessage gSource Nil "Auton 310A v1.0f online")
; Remove the item from the player's list (objRemoveItem gSource gItem 1) )

ItemType.name: 330M mule auton
ItemType.description: Dock with this auton to store supplies on its cargo platform. This auton has space for 75 tons of cargo.
ItemType.Invoke:
(block (auton) ; Create the auton (setq auton (sysCreateShip &scMuleAuton; (objGetPos gSource) &svFriendlyAuton; "auton" ) )
; Escort ship (shpOrderEscort auton gSource)
; Identify the item (itmSetKnown gItem)
; Welcome message (objSendMessage gSource Nil "Auton 330M v2.2a online")
; Remove the item from the player's list (objRemoveItem gSource gItem 1) )

ItemType.name: defective auton
ItemType.description: The 200A series was recalled several years ago because of an unstable AI.
ItemType.Invoke:
(block (auton) ; Create the auton (setq auton (sysCreateShip &sc300DDefenderAuton; (objGetPos gSource) &svFriendlyAuton; ) )
; Escort ship (shpOrderAttack auton gSource)
; Identify the item (itmSetKnown gItem)
; Welcome message (objSendMessage gSource Nil "200A: AI.error.safety_module_failure")
; Remove the item from the player's list (objRemoveItem gSource gItem 1) )

ItemType.name: 1M battle auton
ItemType.description: The 1M battle auton is the most powerful autonomous defense bot manufactured by the OmniDefense Systems corporation.
ItemType.Invoke:
(block (auton) ; Create the auton (setq auton (sysCreateShip &sc1MBattleAuton; (objGetPos gSource) &svFriendlyAuton; "auton" ) )
; Escort ship (shpOrderEscort auton gSource)
; Identify the item (itmSetKnown gItem)
; Welcome message (objSendMessage gSource Nil "Auton series 1M online")
; Remove the item from the player's list (objRemoveItem gSource gItem 1) )

ItemType.name: 1M/i battle auton
ItemType.description: This is a variant of OmniDefense Systems' 1M battle auton. Instead of a particle beam, it is equipped with an EMP cannon.
ItemType.Invoke:
(block (auton) ; Create the auton (setq auton (sysCreateShip &sc1MiBattleAuton; (objGetPos gSource) &svFriendlyAuton; "auton" ) )
; Escort ship (shpOrderEscort auton gSource)
; Identify the item (itmSetKnown gItem)
; Welcome message (objSendMessage gSource Nil "Auton series 1M/i online")
; Remove the item from the player's list (objRemoveItem gSource gItem 1) )

ItemType.name: autopilot ROM
ItemType.description: This program allows the ship's captain to rest while the ship maintains a steady course.
ItemType.Invoke:
(block Nil ; Install (if (shpIsAutopilotInstalled gSource) (objSendMessage gSource Nil "Ship already has an autopilot") (block Nil (shpInstallAutopilot gSource) (objSendMessage gSource Nil "Autopilot installed") ) )
; Identify the item (itmSetKnown gItem)
; Remove ROM (objRemoveItem gSource gItem 1) )

ItemType.name: sealed container with black markings
ItemType.description: This is a sealed container generally used by the Sindikat to move illegal items around from system to system.

ItemType.name: segment of blast plate
ItemType.description: This armor is made out of a plasteel alloy designed to resist missile damage.

ItemType.name: blinder cannon
ItemType.description: A blinder cannon shoots out a thin stream of ionized particles that disrupts a ship's sensors.

ItemType.name: kilo of Booster
ItemType.description: A strong base of O3 'boosted' with a pure dose of metaendorphile paste, this drug is considered to be best narcotic on the black market. It is extremely addictive, and thus banned everywhere.

ItemType.name: gram of unlicensed cancer dust
ItemType.description: Cancer dust is a complex blend of oncokillers and nanomachines that cures most forms of human cancer. This is an unlicensed (and thus illegal) batch, most likely manufactured at a Death Drug laboratory.

ItemType.name: vessel of boson condensate
ItemType.description: This exotic state of matter can support extremely high energy densities. It is used in zero-point energy generators.

ItemType.name: calligraphy scroll
ItemType.description: This is a beautiful parchment scroll containing archaic Chinese calligraphy.

ItemType.name: cannon accelerator
ItemType.description: This device increases the velocity of mass drivers and recoilles cannons. When installed, a ship's kinetic weapons will inflict 75% more damage.

ItemType.name: segment of carbide carapace
ItemType.description: Carbide is a strong and light material akin to diamond. It is a difficult material to work with, however, and combining it with other armor segments often results in weak seams.

ItemType.name: segment of carbon fiber shell
ItemType.description: A woven blend of titanium and monofilament carbon, this armor is resistant to most forms of laser fire.

ItemType.name: barrel of carbon-weaver nanos
ItemType.description: The nanomachines in this paste weave a strong carbon grid through a ship's armor. Armor that has been treated in this way will be stronger and more resistant to damage.

ItemType.name: cargo hold expansion
ItemType.description: This is a pressurized hold that can be attached to a ship to increase the amount of cargo it can carry.

ItemType.name: smuggler's cargo hold
ItemType.description: This is a scan-shielded secret cargo hold. The customs inspections of most stations will not detect illegal items when this cargo hold is installed on your ship.

ItemType.name: blue cash card
ItemType.description: This ROM stores digital cash and may be redeemed automatically with your ship's computer.
ItemType.Invoke:
(block (amount) (setq amount (multiply (itmGetCharges gItem) 2)) (objSendMessage gSource Nil (cat amount " credits deposited to your account.")) (plyCredit gPlayer amount)
; Identify the item (itmSetKnown gItem)
; Remove ROM (objRemoveItem gSource gItem 1) )

ItemType.name: gold cash card
ItemType.description: This ROM stores digital cash and may be redeemed automatically with your ship's computer.
ItemType.Invoke:
(block (amount) (setq amount (multiply (itmGetCharges gItem) 10)) (objSendMessage gSource Nil (cat amount " credits deposited to your account.")) (plyCredit gPlayer amount)
; Identify the item (itmSetKnown gItem)
; Remove ROM (objRemoveItem gSource gItem 1) )

ItemType.name: platinum cash card
ItemType.description: This ROM stores digital cash and may be redeemed automatically with your ship's computer.
ItemType.Invoke:
(block (amount) (setq amount (multiply (itmGetCharges gItem) 100)) (objSendMessage gSource Nil (cat amount " credits deposited to your account.")) (plyCredit gPlayer amount)
; Identify the item (itmSetKnown gItem)
; Remove ROM (objRemoveItem gSource gItem 1) )

ItemType.name: segment of ceramic armor
ItemType.description: Ceramic armor consists of a ceramic plate tile supported by a fiber reinforced composite backing. Ceramic was popular in gunships until the invention of plasteel.

ItemType.name: segment of compound ceramic armor
ItemType.description: An improved version of ceramic armor, this armor is equally well-balanced, resisting both laser and kinetic energy.

ItemType.name: tank of chronimium gas
ItemType.description: Chronimium is a high-energy elemental gas. In pure form it can be used as a fuel for anti-matter reactors.

ItemType.name: ton of cobalt-thorium ore
ItemType.description: This exotic fissionable material is used as a catalyst in high-energy fusion reactors.

ItemType.name: segment of dark matter armor
ItemType.description: Very little is known about this exotic form of dark-matter. It is impervious to most low-level forms of energy and yet light enough to protect a small ship.

ItemType.name: barrel of decon gel
ItemType.description: Decon gel is used to decontaminate radioactive metals, ceramics and other materials. It is ideal for decontaminating a ship's armor and hull.

ItemType.name: class I deflector
ItemType.description: This deflector screen protects a ship against laser fire.

ItemType.name: class II deflector
ItemType.description: While not powerful enough to protect against military-grade weapons, the class II deflector provides added defense for freelancers and independent merchantships.

ItemType.name: class III deflector
ItemType.description: The class III deflector is an integrated system that protects a ship against most forms of damage.

ItemType.name: barrel of degenerating nanos
ItemType.description: These nanomachines are used to recycle old ships and armors into their basic components. Use with caution: Do not allow contact with a ship's armor or hull.

ItemType.name: segment of diamond lattice armor
ItemType.description: The nanofacture towers of the Assembler Corporation can produce a pure diamond lattice in any configuration.

ItemType.name: DK10 Arbalest cannon
ItemType.description: The Arbalest cannon is an automatic minigun that fires in bursts of four shells.

ItemType.name: DM600 missile rack
ItemType.description: The DM600 missile rack is a disposable weapon system pre-loaded with six KM100 missiles. This weapon can be installed and uninstalled without the aid of a station.
ItemType.Invoke:
(if (itmIsInstalled gItem)
; Uninstall item (block Nil (shpRemoveDevice gSource gItem) (objSendMessage gSource Nil "DM600 missile rack uninstalled") )
; Install item (block (result) (setq result (shpCanInstallDevice gSource gItem))
(switch (eq result 0) (block Nil (shpInstallDevice gSource gItem) (objSendMessage gSource Nil "DM600 missile rack installed") )
(eq result 2) (objSendMessage gSource Nil "Ship cannot support another device")
(eq result 6) (objSendMessage gSource Nil "Ship already has a missile launcher")
(eq result 7) (objSendMessage gSource Nil "Reactor upgrade required")
(objSendMessage gSource Nil "DM600 missile rack cannot be installed") ) ) )

ItemType.name: Dragonfly missile cartridge
ItemType.description: This is a cartridge for the Dragonfly missile system. Each cartridge contains three micro-missiles.

ItemType.name: Dragonfly missile system
ItemType.description: The Dragonfly missile system is a cheap cartridge missile launcher that fires three micro-missiles at a ten-degree spread. The Dragonfly system accepts only Dragonfly missile cartridges.

ItemType.name: segment of Duralloy armor
ItemType.description: Duralloy is a plasteel blend infused with active nanomachines. The nanomachines are capable of automatically repairing minor to moderate damage to the armor.

ItemType.name: Flenser relativistic cannon
ItemType.description: The Flenser relativistic cannon is a much improved version of the recoilless cannon. Its greater power is able to fire small masses at nearly the speed of light.

ItemType.name: dual Flenser cannon
ItemType.description: Twin Flenser cannons with linked fire controls.

ItemType.name: fragmentation missile
ItemType.description: The warhead of this missile explodes into more than a dozen high-velocity shards.

ItemType.name: fusion trigger
ItemType.description: Fusion triggers are nuclear implosion devices used in fusion weapons such as the XM900 Lucifer missile. Fusion triggers are illegal throughout Human Space.

ItemType.name: gem of contrition
ItemType.description: These gems are used by the Halo Races, though their exact purpose is unknown. The dark-energies embedded in the gem have an influence over spacetime that is not yet fully understood.
ItemType.Invoke:
(block Nil ; Stop time (objSendMessage gSource Nil "\"Use this time to right your wrongs...\"") (sysStopTime 500 gSource)
; Remove the item from the player's list (objRemoveItem gSource gItem 1)
; Identify the item (itmSetKnown gItem) )

ItemType.name: gem of despair
ItemType.description: These gems are used by the Halo Races, though their exact purpose is unknown. The dark-energies embedded in the gem have an influence over spacetime that is not yet fully understood.
ItemType.Invoke:
(block Nil ; Gate to Elysium (objSendMessage gSource Nil "\"May you find your path among the stargates...\"") (objGateTo gSource "Elysium" "Start" &efStargateOut;)
; Remove the item from the player's list (objRemoveItem gSource gItem 1)
; Identify the item (itmSetKnown gItem) )

ItemType.name: Gotha-10 missile
ItemType.description: This hypervelocity missile is compatible with the Rasiermesser launcher.

ItemType.name: Gotha-400 seeker
ItemType.description: This is a tracking missile with a kiloton-yield warhead. It is compatible with the Rasiermesser launcher.

ItemType.name: segment of Gusoku armor
ItemType.description: Designed by the Kabuto Defense Corporation, Gusoku armor is light yet resistant to particle beam and blast damage.

ItemType.name: ton of hadron archeolith
ItemType.description: This rare resource was originally created in the Big Bang and cannot be replenished. It is used today as a fuel for zero-point energy generators.

ItemType.name: Hanzo blaster
ItemType.description: The top-of-the-line weapon manufactured by the Bushido corporation. This weapon consists of dual TeV 9s linked by a high-speed control system.

ItemType.name: barrel of heavy water
ItemType.description: Heavy water is used by many fusion reactors as a moderator.

ItemType.name: helium fuel rod
ItemType.description: This standard He fuel rod fits most starship reactors.

ItemType.name: helium reactor assembly
ItemType.description: This is an enriched bundle of He fuel rods. Though more efficient than individual fuel rods, only reactors 100 megawatts and larger can accomodate them.
ItemType.pluralName: helium reactor assembly; helium reactor assemblies

ItemType.name: ton of helium regolith
ItemType.description: Rocks containing helium are the main raw material for the fuel rods used by starships.

ItemType.name: segment of hierosteel armor
ItemType.description: Forged by the ancient Hierodules, this miraculous material can withstand all but the most brutal forms of energy.

ItemType.name: high-flux MAG
ItemType.description: The only military variant of the popular MAG series is this themonuclear and radiological variant.

ItemType.name: mark I howitzer
ItemType.description: The mark I howitzer fires heavy, high-explosive shells.

ItemType.name: mark III howitzer
ItemType.description: This is an improved version of the mark I howitzer.

ItemType.name: hull plate ionizer
ItemType.description: This device generates an ionization field around a ship's hull and thus repels laser and kinetic damage. The field weakens as the ship's armor is damaged.

ItemType.name: case of hypermycin
ItemType.description: Hypermycin is the strongest civilian antibioticonly a few strains of phobos aerium are immune to it.

ItemType.name: black market identification chip
ItemType.description: This identification chip is used by pirates and other outlaws to identify each other in the black market. Only people who have this chip can trade in the black market.

ItemType.name: Commonwealth military identification chip
ItemType.description: This identification chip is used by the Commonwealth military to identify authorized military personnel.

ItemType.name: Iocrym healer
ItemType.description: This alien device heals Iocrym armor. It is possible that it is able to repair other kinds of armor as well.

ItemType.name: segment of Iocrym armor
ItemType.description: This armor is used by the enormous command ships of the Iocrym Fleet.

ItemType.name: Iocrym veil
ItemType.description: This byzantine alien device generates a particle shield that absorbs most energy weapons.

ItemType.name: EMP cannon
ItemType.description: This cannon shoots out a stream of ionized particles that disrupts the control systems on most starships.

ItemType.name: heavy ion blaster
ItemType.description: The heavy ion blaster is used by Luminous for its drones and hunter-killers.

ItemType.name: kiloton cannon
ItemType.description: This heavy nuclear howitzer fires kiloton cannon shells.

ItemType.name: KM100 Longbow missile
ItemType.description: This is a standard hexagene high-explosive missile; cheap and light, they are the weapon of choice for modern patrol fleets.

ItemType.name: KM500 Stiletto missile
ItemType.description: A powerful optical and infrared tracking module allows this missile to home in on its target.

ItemType.name: Kytryn Plasma Thrower
ItemType.description: This weapon is used on Iocrym capital ships.

ItemType.name: lancer cannon
ItemType.description: The lancer cannon is a high-powered beam weapon.

ItemType.name: laser cannon
ItemType.description: A popular weapon for light freighters and fast gunships. This weapon is manufactured by the Earth Industries Conglomerate.

ItemType.name: laser cannon array
ItemType.description: The laser cannon array consists of three laser cannons with linked fire controls arranged in a forward spread pattern.

ItemType.name: Bolide laser blaster
ItemType.description: Soon after its release, the Bolide laser blaster was obsoleted by Earth Industries' turbolaser cannon. Many, however, still insist that the Bolide is a better and cheaper weapon.

ItemType.name: dual laser cannon
ItemType.description: Twin laser cannons with linked fire controls.

ItemType.name: fast-fire laser cannon
ItemType.description: This is an enhanced version of the ubiquitous laser cannon. The fast-fire laser cannon uses enhanced capacitors and can reach a fire rate triple that of the standard laser.

ItemType.name: omnidirectional laser cannon
ItemType.description: A single laser cannon with an automated targeting system.

ItemType.name: x-ray laser cannon
ItemType.description: A nuclear-powered laser source is the core of this weapon system.

ItemType.name: laser collimator
ItemType.description: A laser collimator is an after-market device that sharpens the focus of your laser cannons thereby increasing their damage.

ItemType.name: laudanum ampule
ItemType.description: Laundanum is an illegal drug popular with the middle members of the Corporate Hierarchy.

ItemType.name: Lazarus shield generator
ItemType.description: This is an experimental shield generator. Though not as robust as a plasma shield, this generator can regenerate more than ten times faster.

ItemType.name: longzhu sphere
ItemType.description: Longzhu spheres are antimatter containment vessels used by the Sung Slavers as power sources.

ItemType.name: segment of Luminous armature
ItemType.description: The drones and hunter-killers of Luminous are protected with this armor. It is a conductive exotic alloy that defends them from ion weapons.

ItemType.name: Luminous particle shields
ItemType.description: The Luminous AI has developed these shields generators for its drones. They are designed to be resistant to particle-beam energy.

ItemType.name: Luminous blast shields
ItemType.description: The Luminous AI has developed these shields generators for its drones. They are designed to be resistant to blast energy.

ItemType.name: Luminous ion shields
ItemType.description: The Luminous AI has developed these shields generators for its drones. They are designed to be resistant to ion energy.

ItemType.name: Luminous thermo shields
ItemType.description: The Luminous AI has developed these shields generators for its drones. They are designed to be resistant to thermonuclear energy.

ItemType.name: MAG launcher
ItemType.description: The MAG launcher is a flexible and sophisticated grenade launcher that is compatible with a large range of MAG munitions.

ItemType.name: case of Martian nori
ItemType.description: This exotic seaweed grows only in the subterranean water havens of Mars. Martian nori is strongly hallucinogenic if consumed and is consequently banned throughout most of Human Space.

ItemType.name: Ares Campaign Ribbon
ItemType.description: The Commonwealth Fleet awards this ribbon to all who have been in combat against the Ares Orthodoxy.

ItemType.name: Commonwealth Medal of Distinction
ItemType.description: The Commonwealth Medal of Distinction is given to officers in the Commonwealth Militia who manage to survive for more than a few missions.

ItemType.name: Commonwealth Medal of Honor
ItemType.description: The Commonwealth Medal of Honor is a square platinum plate micro-engraved with the names of those killed in the Syrtis bombing of Earth in 2243.

ItemType.name: segment of light meteorsteel
ItemType.description: A rare alloy invented by the Bennin Xenophobes, meteorsteel interferes with most shield generators.

ItemType.name: segment of heavy meteorsteel
ItemType.description: A rare alloy invented by the Bennin Xenophobes, meteorsteel interferes with most shield generators.

ItemType.name: mining laser
ItemType.description: This powerful laser is generally used for asteroid mining.

ItemType.name: ICX missile defense turret
ItemType.description: This device combines a fast-doppler sensor with a targeting computer. Hostile missiles in its range are blasted into dust by a laser cannon.

ItemType.name: Heisenmachines quantum CPU
ItemType.description: The Heisenmachines Corporation was the first commercial producer of quantum CPUs. Quantum CPUs are necessary for processing the instructions in a mnemonic memory cube.

ItemType.name: monopole deflector screen
ItemType.description: This device generates a quantum magnetic field that strongly deflects damage from kinetic and blast weapons. It is somewhat less effective against laser and particle beam attacks.

ItemType.name: NAMI missile launcher
ItemType.description: This launcher is compatible with a full range of popular missiles including the KM100 Longbows and the XM900 Lucifers.

ItemType.name: Shuriken neutron blaster
ItemType.description: The fastest weapon in its price range, the neutron blaster uses a double chamber design to shoot high-energy blasts of neutrons. The Shuriken is manufactured by the Bushido corporation.

ItemType.name: segment of neutronium armor
ItemType.description: A stable arrangement of degenerate matter forged in the heart of a neutron star. While almost indestructible, neutronium is prohibitively massive and impossible to repair.

ItemType.name: optical knowledge array
ItemType.description: This quantum-optical system is used to store and process large amounts of information.

ItemType.name: barrel of organic acid
ItemType.description: Powerful organic acids such as these are used in various industrial processes. Use with caution: Do not allow contact with a ship's armor or hull.

ItemType.name: segment of P120 Hexphase armor
ItemType.description: Hexphase armor is used extensively by capital ships of the Commonwealth Fleet. P120-grade armor can withstand 120 units of particle beam damage before collapsing.

ItemType.name: segment of P250 Hexphase armor
ItemType.description: Hexphase armor is used extensively by capital ships of the Commonwealth Fleet. P250-grade armor can withstand 250 units of particle beam damage before collapsing.

ItemType.name: segment of P1000 Hexphase armor
ItemType.description: Hexphase armor is used extensively by capital ships of the Commonwealth Fleet. P1000-grade armor can withstand 1000 units of particle beam damage before collapsing.

ItemType.name: particle beam weapon
ItemType.description: A modified linear accelerator fires energetic particles at its target.

ItemType.name: dual particle beam weapon
ItemType.description: A modified linear accelerator fires energetic particles at its target.

ItemType.name: omnidirectional particle cannon
ItemType.description: A single particle beam weapon with an automated targeting system.

ItemType.name: Nandao bolt cannon
ItemType.description: The Nandao bolt cannon fires a sublight pulse of heavy ions, causing damage similar to that of particle beam weapons, with much greater energy density. This weapon requires Nandao bolt cartridges.

ItemType.name: patcher arm
ItemType.description: The patcher arm, manufactured by Honoku-Tomashi, is a robotic arm that attaches to a ship's hull and performs basic repairs on its armor.

ItemType.name: patch spider
ItemType.description: This robotic spider automatically repairs damage to a ship's armor.
ItemType.Invoke:
(if (itmIsInstalled gItem)
; Uninstall item (block Nil (shpRemoveDevice gSource gItem) (objSendMessage gSource Nil "Patch spider uninstalled") )
; Install item (block (result) (setq result (shpCanInstallDevice gSource gItem))
(switch (eq result 0) (block Nil (shpInstallDevice gSource gItem) (objSendMessage gSource Nil "Patch spider installed") )
(eq result 2) (objSendMessage gSource Nil "Ship cannot support another device")
(eq result 7) (objSendMessage gSource Nil "Reactor upgrade required")
(objSendMessage gSource Nil "Patch spider cannot be installed") ) ) )

ItemType.name: segment of photo-organic armor
ItemType.description: This living armor consists of a carbon filament web fed by photosynthetic repair cells. Photo-organic armor repairs itself when exposed to sunlight.

ItemType.name: PK25 Morning Star cannon
ItemType.description: NAMI's Morning Star cannon shoots a high-velocity cloud of dense particles that can severely damage light to medium armor.

ItemType.name: plasma cannon
ItemType.description: This weapon emits a powerful plasma burst that can incinerate an unprotected ship. Plasma cannons are military weapons generally unavailable to civilian ships.

ItemType.name: plasma shield generator
ItemType.description: Plasma shield generators are used on most military ships. Plasma shield generators cannot be used on civilian ships without a special military ID.

ItemType.name: plasma torch
ItemType.description: Plasma torches are used for large-scale asteroid mining.

ItemType.name: segment of plasteel armor
ItemType.description: Stronger than titanium yet almost as light, plasteel is a popular metal for use in all forms of space construction.

ItemType.name: segment of hardened plasteel armor
ItemType.description: This segment of plasteel armor has been specially modified to resist radiation.

ItemType.name: segment of heavy plasteel armor
ItemType.description: This is a thicker plate of the popular plasteel armor.

ItemType.name: segment of light plasteel armor
ItemType.description: This is a lighter and cheaper segment of plasteel than the standard armor.

ItemType.name: segment of polyceramic armor
ItemType.description: Polyceramic armor is one of the most advanced forms of ceramic armor.

ItemType.name: segment of polymesh armor
ItemType.description: The incredible strength of the synthetic mesh provides ideal protection against missiles and kinetic weapons, but focused laser energy can often burn through it.

ItemType.name: Ares archcannon
ItemType.description: The most feared weapons in the Ares fleet are the positron archcannons mounted on their capital ships. The archcannons fire a burst of anti-matter particles.

ItemType.name: promethium crystal
ItemType.description: These beautiful and rare crystals of promethium-147, an exotic and powerful isotope, are used by the Ringers Collective as currency.

ItemType.name: pteracnium fuel rod
ItemType.description: Pteracnium is a stable transuranic compound of immense energy density. Refined and packaged as fuel rods this compound is ideal for gigawatt-class reactors.

ItemType.name: pteracnium megadrive
ItemType.description: The pteracnium megadrive is a recently developed military starship engine based on Library Link schematics. Like most other military technology, megadrives cannot be used by civilian ships.

ItemType.name: Qianlong archcannon
ItemType.description: The pinnacle of Sung Slaver technology, the Qianlong archcannon fires anti-matter shells that can quickly destroy its target. The Qianlong archcannon uses longzhu spheres as a power source.

ItemType.name: container of quantum vacuum
ItemType.description: Exotic vacuums are the ground-state for zero-point energy generators. This container holds several terrawatt hours of vacuum3 and vacuum7.

ItemType.name: R1 deflector
ItemType.description: The R1 deflector was developed a few decades ago to protect Commonwealth Fleet ships against the increasingly powerful lightning cannons of the Ares Orthodoxy.

ItemType.name: R5 deflector
ItemType.description: This is an updated version of the R1 deflector, designed to resist the Ares Orthodoxy's lightning cannons.

ItemType.name: barrel of radioactive waste
ItemType.description: This is a titanium barrel filled with low and medium-level radioactive waste.

ItemType.name: Rasiermesser launcher
ItemType.description: After the success of the SmartCannon, the Rasiermesser corporation developed a line of missiles for the military.

ItemType.name: Rasiermesser SmartCannon
ItemType.description: The Rasiermesser corporation introduced the SmartCannon into the low-end weapons market despite the opposition of the Commonwealth. This weapon requires SmartCannon rounds.

ItemType.name: segment of reactive armor
ItemType.description: Reactive armor is laced with miniature explosive cells that mitigate against the impact of kinetic weapons and chemical explosives.

ItemType.name: segment of hardened reactive armor
ItemType.description: This is a radiation-immune version of the popular reactive armor plate.

ItemType.name: barrel of reactive armor coating
ItemType.description: This coating reacts when hit by kinetic or chemical explosives and produces an opposite reaction that protect the underlying armor and hull.

ItemType.name: recoilless cannon
ItemType.description: Recoilless cannons are slower than the ubiquitous laser cannon but pack a bigger punch.

ItemType.name: dual recoilless cannon
ItemType.description: Twin recoilless cannons with linked fire controls.

ItemType.name: heavy recoilless cannon
ItemType.description: This is a heavier version of the common recoilless cannon.

ItemType.name: light recoilless cannon
ItemType.description: This specialized version of the recoilless cannon shoots lighter projectiles but has a much higher fire rate.

ItemType.name: barrel of reflective armor coating
ItemType.description: This coating is nearly perfectly reflective at all laser weapon wavelengths. A ship's armor coated with this substance will be immune to laser weapons.

ItemType.name: barrel of regenerating nanos
ItemType.description: The nanomachines are able to automatically regenerate any armor. Once treated with this paste an armor segment will continue to regenerate even if damaged further.

ItemType.name: barrel of repairing nanos
ItemType.description: Apply this paste to an armor segment to repair moderate to heavy damage.

ItemType.name: barrel of rejuv tank fluid
ItemType.description: Critically injured patients are healed in half the time if placed inside a rejuv tank.

ItemType.name: shield enhancement ROM
ItemType.description: This ROM upgrades any shield generator so that it is more effective at absorbing damage.
ItemType.Invoke:
(block (notFound) ; Install (setq notFound True) (objEnumItems gPlayerShip "sI" itemCursor (block (shieldItem) (setq shieldItem (itmAtCursor itemCursor)) (if notFound (block Nil (if (itmIsEnhanced shieldItem) (objSendMessage gSource Nil "Shield generator already enhanced") (block Nil (objSendMessage gSource Nil "Shield generator enhanced") (shpEnhanceItem gSource itemCursor) ) ) (setq notFound Nil) ) ) ) )
(if notFound (objSendMessage gSource Nil "Shield generator required") )
; Identify the item (itmSetKnown gItem)
; Remove ROM (objRemoveItem gSource gItem 1) )

ItemType.name: ROM of Rowena's Weapons and Armor: Volume I
ItemType.description: The definitive guide to starship weapons and armor. This ROM contains specification for commercially available weapons and armor of the Commonwealth.
ItemType.Invoke:
(block Nil (objSendMessage gSource Nil "\"Rowena's Weapons and Armor (Volume I)\" installed") (itmEnumTypes "adsw" itemType (if (and (geq (itmGetLevel itemType) 1) (leq (itmLevel itemType) 5)) (itmSetReference itemType) ) )
; Identify the item (itmSetKnown gItem)
; Remove ROM (objRemoveItem gSource gItem 1) )

ItemType.name: ROM of Rowena's Weapons and Armor: Volume II
ItemType.description: The definitive guide to starship weapons and armor. This ROM contains specification for military weapons and armor used in the Commonwealth.
ItemType.Invoke:
(block Nil (objSendMessage gSource Nil "\"Rowena's Weapons and Armor (Volume II)\" installed") (itmEnumTypes "adsw" itemType (if (and (geq (itmGetLevel itemType) 6) (leq (itmLevel itemType) 10)) (itmSetReference itemType) ) )
; Identify the item (itmSetKnown gItem)
; Remove ROM (objRemoveItem gSource gItem 1) )

ItemType.name: ROM of Rowena's Weapons and Armor: Volume III
ItemType.description: The definitive guide to starship weapons and armor. This ROM contains specification for weapons and armor used by the Ancient Races.
ItemType.Invoke:
(block Nil (objSendMessage gSource Nil "\"Rowena's Weapons and Armor (Volume III)\" installed") (itmEnumTypes "adsw" itemType (if (and (geq (itmGetLevel itemType) 11) (leq (itmLevel itemType) 15)) (itmSetReference itemType) ) )
; Identify the item (itmSetKnown gItem)
; Remove ROM (objRemoveItem gSource gItem 1) )

ItemType.name: ROM of Rowena's Weapons and Armor: Volume IV
ItemType.description: The definitive guide to starship weapons and armor. This ROM contains specification for weapons and armor developed by the Halo Races.
ItemType.Invoke:
(block Nil (objSendMessage gSource Nil "\"Rowena's Weapons and Armor (Volume IV)\" installed") (itmEnumTypes "adsw" itemType (if (and (geq (itmGetLevel itemType) 16) (leq (itmLevel itemType) 20)) (itmSetReference itemType) ) )
; Identify the item (itmSetKnown gItem)
; Remove ROM (objRemoveItem gSource gItem 1) )

ItemType.name: ROM of Rowena's Weapons and Armor: Volume V
ItemType.description: The definitive guide to starship weapons and armor. This ROM contains specification for weapons and armor used by the Hierodules and the entities Oracus and Domina.
ItemType.Invoke:
(block Nil (objSendMessage gSource Nil "\"Rowena's Weapons and Armor (Volume V)\" installed") (itmEnumTypes "adsw" itemType (if (and (geq (itmGetLevel itemType) 21) (leq (itmLevel itemType) 25)) (itmSetReference itemType) ) )
; Identify the item (itmSetKnown gItem)
; Remove ROM (objRemoveItem gSource gItem 1) )

ItemType.name: Scramble1.5 algorithm cube
ItemType.description: This algorithm hacks into near-by enemy ship computers and temporarily disable their control systems. Scramble1.5 requires a quantum CPU to execute.
ItemType.Invoke:
(switch ; If we don't have a quantum CPU (not (objGetItems gSource "*I+QuantumCPU")) (objSendMessage gSource Nil "Quantum CPU required")
; Otherwise, we paralyze enemy ships in the area (block (targets) (setq targets (sysFindObject gSource "sEN:16;")) (enum targets target (objProgramDamage target gSource "Scramble1.5" 6 (objMakeParalyzed target (random 600 1200)) ) ) (if (count targets) (objSendMessage gSource Nil "Scramble1.5: Targets disabled") (objSendMessage gSource Nil "Scramble1.5: No targets in range") )
(itmSetKnown gItem) (objRemoveItem gSource gItem 1) ) )

ItemType.name: slam cannon
ItemType.description: The slam cannon fires high-explosive shells.

ItemType.name: slave coffin
ItemType.description: The Sung Slavers of Jiang's Star System transport their slaves in life-support canisters that keep their captive occupants in biological suspension.

ItemType.name: segment of solar armor
ItemType.description: This innovative armor combines a honeycombed mesh of solar panels with a plasteel armor substrate. This armor will recharge the ship's reactor as long as the ship is near a sun.

ItemType.name: solar panel array
ItemType.description: A solar panel array converts sunlight into energy usable by a ship's reactor.

ItemType.name: Solon shield generator
ItemType.description: Developed by the innovative Solon Industries, this shield generator absorbs almost all laser energy. A ship equipped with these shields cannot fire any laser weapons.

ItemType.name: Katana star cannon
ItemType.description: The star cannon fires a stream of high-energy ions. Star cannons are military weapons that cannot be used on civilian ships without a special ID.

ItemType.name: stargate control rod
ItemType.description: This hyperglyph rod is used to program stargates.

ItemType.name: bootleg Star Wars 3DV
ItemType.description: The Ultimate Edition of this classic passive fiction is too expensive for most consumers, but an underground criminal organization has cracked the encryption keys and produced a bootleg version.

ItemType.name: segment of stealth armor
ItemType.description: The special geometry and coatings of this armor provide a ship with a greatly reduced signature in most standard scanners.

ItemType.name: sunflare cannon
ItemType.description: Heliotropes use a heavy ion particle cannon known as a sunflare cannon. The blast from a sunflare cannon is almost as destructive as a solar eruption.

ItemType.name: superconducting coil
ItemType.description: This is a special type of coil used to repair superconducting shield generators.
ItemType.Invoke:
(switch ; Does the ship have a superconducting shield? If not ; then we can't do anything. (not (eq (shpGetShieldItemUNID gSource) &itSuperconductingShields;)) (objSendMessage gSource Nil "Superconducting shields required")
; Are the shields fully charged? If they are, then this ; won't do anything. (eq (shpGetShieldDamage gSource) 0) (objSendMessage gSource Nil "Superconducting shields already fully charged")
; Charge the shields (block Nil (shpRechargeShield gSource (random 40 60)) (objRemoveItem gSource gItem 1) (objSendMessage gSource Nil "Superconducting shields recharged") ) )

ItemType.name: superconducting shield generator
ItemType.description: This generator creates its energy-deflecting field with an array of superconducting coils, which burn-out with damage. Individual superconducting coils must be replaced to restore the field after damage is taken.

ItemType.name: system map ROM
ItemType.description: This program accesses the central cartography libraries to generate a map of the current system.
ItemType.Invoke:
(block (obj) (enum (sysFindObject gSource "Ts") obj (objSetKnown obj) )
(objSendMessage gSource Nil "Mapped all stations in system")
; Identify the item (itmSetKnown gItem)
; Remove ROM (objRemoveItem gSource gItem 1) )

ItemType.name: targeting program ROM
ItemType.description: A targeting program is required to aim guided missiles such as the KM500 Stiletto.
ItemType.Invoke:
(block Nil (if (shpIsTargetingComputerInstalled gPlayerShip) (objSendMessage gSource Nil "Ship already has targeting program") (block Nil (shpInstallTargetingComputer gPlayerShip) (objSendMessage gSource Nil "Targeting program installed") ) )
; Identify the item (itmSetKnown gItem)
; Remove ROM (objRemoveItem gSource gItem 1) )

ItemType.name: Tempus syrette
ItemType.description: Tempus is a popular amphetamine that slows down the user's subjective time. Tempus is illegal throughout most of Human Space.

ItemType.name: TeV 9 blaster
ItemType.description: This heavy particle beam weapon was developed by the Earth Industries Conglomerate. This versitile weapon has been adopted by the Commonwealth Fleet.

ItemType.name: segment of Tevlar-composite armor
ItemType.description: This armor is composed of woven carbon fibers in a plasteel matrix. Though not as strong as Duralloy, this material is far lighter.

ItemType.name: segment of light Tharsis plate
ItemType.description: The standard armor used by Ares ships is light, yet resistant to particle beam damage; it is, however, vulnerable to blast damage.

ItemType.name: segment of heavy Tharsis plate
ItemType.description: A heavier version of the plate used in Ares gunships, this armor is resistant to thermonuclear damage.

ItemType.name: Titan 440 fusion drive
ItemType.description: The Titan 440 fusion drive is the top-of-the-line commercial starship engine. Its thrust far exceeds that of any other non-military engine.

ItemType.name: segment of titanium armor
ItemType.description: Titanium is one of the weakest material used for ship's armor. Nevertheless, for ships that require little protection or when cost or mass are a factor, titanium plate is a good choice.

ItemType.name: segment of heavy titanium armor
ItemType.description: Though not strong enough to be used in warships, heavy titanium plate is twice as strong as normal titanium plate. It is often used to protect freighters and scout ships.

ItemType.name: titanium barricade
ItemType.description: These reinforced titanium plates are used in station construction both as bulkheads and as exterior armor.

ItemType.name: double titanium barricade
ItemType.description: These reinforced titanium plates are used in station construction both as bulkheads and as exterior armor.

ItemType.name: quad titanium barricade
ItemType.description: These reinforced titanium plates are used in station construction both as bulkheads and as exterior armor.

ItemType.name: TK10 Trident cannon
ItemType.description: The TK10 Trident cannon is another in the popular series of NAMI kinetic weapons. The TK10 fires three small high-velocity projectiles.

ItemType.name: transpace jumpdrive
ItemType.description: This arcane alien device can open a portal through transpace to teleport a ship to another location, much as stargates do.
ItemType.Invoke:
(switch ; If we don't have enough fuel, then we cannot proceed (gr 60000 (shpGetFuelLeft gSource)) (objSendMessage gSource Nil "Not enough fuel to engage jumpdrive")
; If we are on top of a stargate, then jump to Elyssium (leq (objGetDistance gSource (objGetNearestStargate gSource)) 3) (objGateTo gSource "Elysium" "Start" &efStargateOut;)
; Otherwise, we jump (block (newPos) (setq newPos (sysVectorPolarOffset gSource (shpGetDirection gSource) 500)) (objJumpTo gSource newPos) (shpConsumeFuel gSource 60000) ) )

ItemType.name: segment of transuranic armor
ItemType.description: The strength of the material is almost unparalleled, but its properties fade as the elements decay into baser forms.

ItemType.name: Trenton field generator
ItemType.description: A Trenton field generator degrades the intensity of any form of energy. Unlike other shield generators, however, some energy inevitably leaks through.

ItemType.name: tritium propulsion upgrade
ItemType.description: Most small and medium sized ships use a fusion drive for propulsion. This device upgrade mixes-in a powerful tritium plasma to increase the thrust of the engines.

ItemType.name: turbolaser cannon
ItemType.description: One of the most popular designs by the Earth Industries Conglomerate, the turbolaser cannon is a cheap, powerful, and reliable weapon.

ItemType.name: dual turbolaser cannon
ItemType.description: Twin turbolaser cannons with linked fire controls.

ItemType.name: ton of uranium ore
ItemType.description: Uranium is the most common fissionable material. Uranium ore can be processed into nuclear fuel for low-tech industries.

ItemType.name: visual display enhancement ROM
ItemType.description: This ROM enhances a ship's visual display to show the bearing of ships and stations beyond normal visual range.
ItemType.Invoke:
(block Nil (if (shpIsSRSEnhanced gSource) (objSendMessage gSource Nil "Visual display already enhanced") (block Nil (shpEnhanceSRS gSource) (objSendMessage gSource Nil "Visual display enhanced") ) )
; Identify the item (itmSetKnown gItem)
; Remove ROM (objRemoveItem gSource gItem 1) )

ItemType.name: defective visual display ROM
ItemType.description: This ROM would normally enhance a ship's visual display, but a manufacturing defect makes it worse than useless. Plugging this in to your ship's computer will temporarily damage you display screen.
ItemType.Invoke:
(block Nil (shpMakeBlind gSource 3000) (objSendMessage gSource Nil "ROM failure: Visual display temporarily damaged")
; Identify the item (itmSetKnown gItem)
; Remove ROM (objRemoveItem gSource gItem 1) )

ItemType.name: weapon enhancement ROM
ItemType.description: This ROM upgrades any weapon so that it is more powerful.
ItemType.Invoke:
(block (notFound) ; Install (setq notFound True) (objEnumItems gPlayerShip "wI" itemCursor (block (weaponItem) (setq weaponItem (itmAtCursor itemCursor)) (if (and notFound (eq (shpGetItemDeviceName gSource weaponItem) 0)) (block Nil (if (itmIsEnhanced weaponItem) (objSendMessage gSource Nil (cat (itmGetName weaponItem 33) " already enhanced")) (block Nil (objSendMessage gSource Nil (cat (itmGetName weaponItem 33) " enhanced")) (shpEnhanceItem gSource itemCursor) ) ) (setq notFound Nil) ) ) ) )
(if notFound (objSendMessage gSource Nil "Primary weapon required") )
; Identify the item (itmSetKnown gItem)
; Remove ROM (objRemoveItem gSource gItem 1) )

ItemType.name: worldship armor plate
ItemType.description: Like other meteorsteel armors, this plate interferes with the operation of shield generators.

ItemType.name: ton of xenotite ore
ItemType.description: Xenotite was one of the first minerals to be discovered in another star system. Xenotite can be refined to produce a fuel for anti-matter reactors.

ItemType.name: XM300 Reaper missile
ItemType.description: These missiles are armed with a chemical explosive jacketed with small amounts of plutonium. Although not enough to achieve fission, the radioactive materials contaminate the target.

ItemType.name: XM900 Lucifer missile
ItemType.description: This is an optical tracking missile modified to carry a thermonuclear warhead of around 100 kilotons yield. These missiles are tightly controlled and only military vessels are allowed to carry them.

ItemType.name: segment of XMH armor
ItemType.description: Originally designed at the Cenobite Labs, XMH armor uses an experimental metallic hydrogen alloy. Most stations do not have the technology to repair XMH armor.

ItemType.name: Yoroi S100 shields
ItemType.description: The shield generators sold by Kabuto Defense are among the most powerful and advanced. The Yoroi line of shields ranges from this inexpensive commercial model to more powerful military versions.

ItemType.name: Yoroi S500 shields
ItemType.description: The Yoroi S500 is the most powerful shield generator available for non-military customers of the Kabuto Defense corporation.

ItemType.name: Yoroi MX shields
ItemType.description: This is the military version of the S500 shield generator created by the Kabuto Defense corporation.

ItemType.name: ZG24 Cluster MAG
ItemType.description: The ZG24 Cluster MAG is a cluster grenade that explodes into dozens of smaller hexagene explosives.

ItemType.name: barrel of grade B grains
ItemType.description: This is a genetically modified grain variety that is designed to grow under low-gravity and high-radiation conditions. This grade is not approved for human consumption and is only used for animal feed.

ItemType.name: barrel of hydrocarbons
ItemType.description: Hydrocarbons are used by industrial autofacs to create plastics and other consumer items.

ItemType.name: barrel of white rice
ItemType.description: This is a high-protein variety of rice popular in the Commonwealth.

ItemType.name: case of Stimuzine muscle-enhancers
ItemType.description: Stimuzine is a popular drug that stimulates muscle growth in low-gravity environments.

ItemType.name: cask of Venusian Hellas rum
ItemType.description: This popular rum is made throughout the Commonwealth at stations licensed by the Venusian Hellas Corporation.

ItemType.name: container of frozen supplies
ItemType.description: Much of the food available on stations is shipped frozen from various agricultural centers.

ItemType.name: crate of frozen beef cylinders
ItemType.description: This vat-grown meat tastes remarkably like beef, at least according to anyone who has never been on Earth.

ItemType.name: crate of Kennebec Salmonite
ItemType.description: This vat-grown synthetic meat taste almost, but not quite, totally unlike salmon.

ItemType.name: tank of water ice
ItemType.description: Water is a valuable commodity in the depths of space.

ItemType.name: ton of titanium ore
ItemType.description: Titanium ore is used commercially for space-rated structures and components.

ItemType.name: barrel of Charles River sparkling water
ItemType.description: Though this water is no longer bottled at its eponymous river, the brand is still considered a mark of purity throughout the Commonwealth.

ItemType.name: barrel of grade A grains
ItemType.description: Quadrotriticale, the most common grade A grain, is a genetically modified variety suitable for human consumption and generally ideal for space-borne colonies.

ItemType.name: bolt of neolinen
ItemType.description: A synthetic fabric superior to cotton and generally cheap to produce.

ItemType.name: spool of carbon fiber
ItemType.description: Carbon fibers are used in many industrial processes to create materials that are lightweight and heat-resistant.

ItemType.name: case of Martian Merlot
ItemType.description: Grown in the arid hills of New Marineris, this wine is known for its strong flavour and traditional production methods.

ItemType.name: crate of frozen synthetic chicken
ItemType.description: The United Earth Military developed this synthetic food to feed the millions of soldiers needed for the invasion of Mars.

ItemType.name: keg of Red Nebula beer
ItemType.description: Red Nebula beer is advertised throughout the Commonwealth.

ItemType.name: crate of medical supplies
ItemType.description: This crate contains standard medical supplies such as antibiotics, sterilization paste, and plasma precursors.

ItemType.name: plasteel blank
ItemType.description: Plasteel is a stronger and lighter alloy of titanium.

ItemType.name: barrel of Eridani mineral water
ItemType.description: At product of Starton Eridani, this mineral water is trendy among the Corporate crowd.

ItemType.name: container of biofactor paste
ItemType.description: Biofactor paste is a genetically engineered substance that promotes healing and delays aging.

ItemType.name: bolt of photocotton
ItemType.description: Photocotton is modified variety of cotton that can be died by simple exposure to light of different wavelengths.

ItemType.name: case of Australian Chardonnay
ItemType.description: Chardonnay produced by the ancient methods of Australia is today considered to be the best in the Commonwealth.

ItemType.name: case of Europan Ice vodka
ItemType.description: Vodka has always been an important liquor in the frozen colonies of Europa. This is the best Europan brand and the only one exported outside of the Sol System.

ItemType.name: crate of frozen megathere meat
ItemType.description: Huge farms on Earth raise this once extinct animal to produce a delicacy known throughout the Commonwealth.

ItemType.name: roll of hyperfiber
ItemType.description: Hyperfiber is a nanoengineered molecular strand of carbon.

ItemType.name: neolinen business suit
ItemType.description: The standard uniform of the Corporate Hierarchy.

ItemType.name: ton of palladium ore
ItemType.description: Palladium is a critical element as a catalyst in various industrial processes.

ItemType.name: Segway antigrav platform
ItemType.description: The Segway is not a true antigrav platform (it relies on noisy microfans). Nevertheless, it has proven to be useful in stations and other low-gravity environments.

ItemType.name: uranium rod
ItemType.description: This is a rod of refined uranium ready for use in an old industrial reactor.

ItemType.name: barrel of Centauri rice
ItemType.description: With its subtle flavor and rich aroma, Centauri rice is a popular accompaniment to many gourmet dishes.

ItemType.name: barrel of Kobe spring water
ItemType.description: Famous for its refreshing effects and calming advertisements, Kobe spring water is the drink of choice for Corporate executives.

ItemType.name: bolt of silk
ItemType.description: This rarest of fabrics has many synthetic imitators, but none approach the feel of organic silk.

ItemType.name: case of Bombay Sapphire gin
ItemType.description: Bombay Sapphire has maintained enormous popularity as a premium spirit with ten botanicals and a unique vapor-infusion procession to make a subtly complex, highly nuanced gin.

ItemType.name: case of California Cabernet Sauvignon
ItemType.description: Even after the disastrous tectonic quakes of the 22nd Century, the island city states of New California on Earth continue to make the most excellent of red wines.

ItemType.name: case of Terran eggs
ItemType.description: Infinitely superior to the synthetic variety produced on most stations.

ItemType.name: crate of frozen Hogei salmon
ItemType.description: Clone farms of the Senpaku Hogei Corporation make this well-respected product at a reasonable (compared to Earth salmon) price.

ItemType.name: ton of Duralloy ore
ItemType.description: Duralloy ore is a mixture of titanium, hexanium, and other exotic metals. Although not as strong or light as plasteel, duralloy can be easily laced with repairing nanomachines.

ItemType.name: ton of gold ore
ItemType.description: Beyond the demand for jewelry, gold is used as a conductor in many electronic devices.

ItemType.name: kilo of dried Europan ice moss
ItemType.description: This exquisite spice is made from a dried moss originally found on the frozen Jovian moon.
ItemType.sortName: Europan ice moss, kilo of dried

ItemType.name: tailored silk suit
ItemType.description: This designer woman's suit is popular with Corporate executives and Commonwealth officials.

ItemType.name: barrel of Misato sake
ItemType.description: The finest Earth sake is made in small town in Japan.

ItemType.name: case of Exile Starport Champagne
ItemType.description: Popularized by the 3DV epic, 'Exile Starport', this champagne is trendy and very expensive.

ItemType.name: case of Hennessy cognac
ItemType.description: Old and extremely rare, the years of maturing have left only that which is essential--the richness and smoothness of an exceptional, full-bodied cognac, incredibly long in the mouth.

ItemType.name: crate of frozen natural ham
ItemType.description: A guilty pleasure of the executive crowd, natural ham has unique subtle flavors without any of the carcinogenic effects of the vat-grown variety.

ItemType.name: Humagen heart and lungs prosthesis
ItemType.description: This ancient artificial heart and lungs prosthesis is seldom used anymore, but many people believe it to be superior to current medical technologies.
ItemType.pluralName: Humagen heart and lungs prosthesis; Humagen heart and lungs prostheses

ItemType.name: kilo of natural periweed
ItemType.description: This subtle spice is grown only on some Centauri planets.

ItemType.name: pair of genuine leather boots
ItemType.description: Expensive almost to the point of extragavance, leather boots are nevertheless popular throughout the wealthier parts of the Commonwealth.

ItemType.name: ton of platinum ore
ItemType.description: Platinum is used as a component of plasteel and duralloy.

ItemType.name: ton of pteracnium ore
ItemType.description: Pteracnium is one of the only transuranic elements that is stable under normal conditions. When bombarded with high-energy particles, pteracnium releases a cascade of anti-protons that can sustain a starship engine.

ItemType.name: human organ
ItemType.description: Held in a vat of suspension fluid, this human organ is ready to be transplanted.

ItemType.name: Microsaur
ItemType.description: This genetically engineered pet has long been the symbol of conspicuous consumption among the corporate elite.

ItemType.name: ton of neutronium ore
ItemType.description: The densest substance known, a ton of neutronium could fit in the palm of your hand. The secret of its manufacture is known only to the ancient races.
