Default.Initialize: (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "You in the docking bay of the " (objGetName gStation) "."))

Actions.Action: ; If see if we got promoted (if (intFleetPromotion) (block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "Main") (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsFleetPromotion;") ) (scrShowScreen gScreen "Bridge") )

Default.Initialize:
(switch (eq (objGetData gStation "CSC") "sahara") (scrSetDesc gScreen "The captain of the CSC Sahara welcomes you aboard: \"I hope you will be able to help our good doctor to obtain medical supplies. This damn war has made more invalids than heroes.\"")
(eq (objGetData gStation "CSC") "arctica") (scrSetDesc gScreen "The captain of the CSC Arctica welcomes you aboard: \"How are things going back in the Commonwealth? I haven't been to St. Katharine's in more than five yearshad an amazing time at this little bar in the inner system. You really should check it outif you make it back, I mean.\"")
(scrSetDesc gScreen "The captain welcomes you aboard.") )

Default.desc: You are in the main infirmary of a Commonwealth Star Carrier. Sleep-deprived technicians attend hundreds of patients in their rejuv tanks, mostly oblivious to the insistent medical alarms. The smell of blood, wounds, and antiseptics smother you.

Actions.Action:
(block Nil ; See if the player has any medical supplies (setq gItem (objGetItems gPlayerShip "*U+Meds"))
(if gItem (scrShowPane gScreen "SellMedicalItems") (scrShowPane gScreen "NoMedicalItems") ) )

NoMedicalItems.desc: The Medical Officer complains about how hard it is to get medical supplies this deep in space. "We're getting killed out here fighting the Ares and this is how the Commonwealth thanks usno supplies, no reinforcements, nothing!"

SellMedicalItems.Initialize:
(block (medicalItem) ; Figure out how much all the supplies cost (setq gCost 0) (enum gItem medicalItem (setq gCost (add gCost (multiply (itmGetPrice medicalItem) (itmGetCount medicalItem)) ) ) )
; Offer 25% more (setq gCost (divide (multiply gCost 125) 100))
; Set the description (if (eq (count gItem) 1) ; Only one item (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "\"Welcome to the Infirmary, " (plyComposeString gPlayer "%sir%") "! We are in desperate need of medical supplies. I'm prepared to offer you " gCost " credits for the " (itmGetName (item gItem 0) 16) " in your cargo hold. What do you say?\""))
; Multiple items (block (medicalItem itemListDesc) (enum gItem medicalItem (if itemListDesc (setq itemListDesc (cat itemListDesc ", " (itmGetName medicalItem 8))) (setq itemListDesc (cat "(" (itmGetName medicalItem 8))) ) )
(setq itemListDesc (cat itemListDesc ")"))
(scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "\"Welcome to the Infirmary, " (plyComposeString gPlayer "%sir%") "! We are in desperate need of medical supplies. I'm prepared to offer you " gCost " credits for all the medical items in your cargo hold " itemListDesc ". What do you say?\"")) ) ) )

Actions.Action:
(block (medicalItem) ; Remove the items from the cargo hold (enum gItem medicalItem (objRemoveItem gPlayerShip medicalItem) )
; Pay the player (plyCredit gPlayer gCost)
; Done (scrShowPane gScreen "DoneSelling") )

(block (medicalItems) ; Remove the items from the cargo hold (enum gItem medicalItem (objRemoveItem gPlayerShip medicalItem) )
; Player gets a gift depending on how much she donated (scrShowPane gScreen "Donate") )

DoneSelling.desc: "Thank you, those supplies are really going to help these troopers."

Donate.Initialize:
(block (gift xpGain) (switch (gr gCost 10000) (setq gift (itmCreate &itIocrymVeil; 1))
(gr gCost 5000) (setq gift (itmCreate &itTranspaceJumpdrive; 1))
(gr gCost 2500) (setq gift (itmCreate &itR5Deflector; 1))
(gr gCost 1250) (setq gift (itmCreate &itR1Deflector; 1))
(setq gift (itmCreate &itEuropanIceVodka; 1)) )
; Describe the gift (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "\"Your generosity humbles me! When I was posted in the front-lines I came across " (itmGetName gift 8) ". I would be honored if you would accept it as a gift.\""))
; Give the gift to the player (objAddItem gPlayerShip gift)
; Player gains experience at the rate of 1 xp per 10 credits ; up to a maximum of 200 xp (setq xpGain (divide gCost 10)) (if (gr xpGain 200) (setq xpGain 200) )
(objIncData gPlayerShip "fleetXP" xpGain); )

StaticData.Missions1:
( ("mission1a" ; Code to describe mission (lambda Nil (block (stationList) ; Look for a major Ares station in the system (setq stationList (sysFindObject gStation "T:aresMajor;A"))
; If we found at least one, then pick a random one (setq gTarget (random stationList))
; If the player doesn't have an SRS enhancement, then they ; can't do this mission. (if (not (shpIsSRSEnhanced gPlayerShip)) (setq gTarget Nil) )
; Compose the mission description (if gTarget (cat "\"We need you to do a recon mission on " (objGetName gTarget 4) " in this system. All you have to do is fly past it and make visual contact. We'll enter the coordinates to your computer. What do you say?\"") Nil ) ) )
; Code to initiate mission (lambda Nil (block (timer) ; Remember what we're supposed to recon (objSetObjRefData gStation "Target" gTarget)
; Set the recon target in the player ship's computer (shpOrderEscort gPlayerShip gTarget)
; Prepare the station to be reconned (staClearReconned gTarget) (staSetFireReconEvent gTarget)
; Get events for the station (objRegisterForEvents gStation gTarget) (objRegisterForEvents gStation gPlayerShip) ) )
; Code on successful mission (lambda Nil (block (damage) (setq damage (objGetVisibleDamage gPlayerShip))
; Set description (switch (gr damage 75) (scrSetDesc gScreen "\"Outstanding mission! You better report to Docking Services to have all that damage repaired!\"")
(gr damage 25) (scrSetDesc gScreen "\"Outstanding mission! Looks like you got a little banged up out there.\"")
(scrSetDesc gScreen "\"Outstanding mission! You made it look easy.\"") )
; Increment XP (objIncData gPlayerShip "fleetXP" 100) ) ) ) )
StaticData.Missions2:
( ("mission2a" ; Code to describe mission (lambda Nil (block (gate stationList) ; Get the list of all Ares bases (setq stationList (sysFindObject gStation "T:ares;A")) (setq gEnd Nil)
; For each stargate, see if we can travel to an Ares base ; stop looking when we find a destination (enumwhile (sysFindObject gStation "G") (not gEnd) gate
(block (bestDist testDest) ; Pick a stargate (setq gStart gate)
; Find the nearest base to the stargate that is at least ; 300 light-seconds away from the stargate (setq bestDist 1200) (enum stationList testDest (if (and (gr (objGetDistance gStart testDest) 300) (ls (objGetDistance gStart testDest) bestDist)) (block Nil (setq bestDist (objGetDistance gStart testDest)) (setq gEnd testDest) ) ) ) ) )
; If we found a station, then compose the mission text (if gEnd (cat "An Ares freighter is delivering supplies to " (objGetName gEnd 4) " in this system. Your orders are to intercept and destroy the freighter. Any questions?") Nil ) ) )
; Code to initiate mission (lambda Nil (block (ship) ; create the transport (setq ship (sysCreateShip &scPolar; gStart &svAres;)) (shpOrderDock ship gEnd) (shpOrderGate ship)
; create the escorts (for i 1 5 (block (escort) (setq escort (sysCreateShip &scSandstorm; gStart &svAres;)) (shpOrderEscort escort ship) ) )
; Add some items to the transport (objAddItem ship (itmCreate &itPteracniumOre; (random 10 30))) (objAddRandomItems ship &trConsumables6; (random 1 4)) (objAddRandomItems ship &trMinorItem6; 1)
; register so we know when the main ship is destroyed (objRegisterForEvents gStation ship) (objSetObjRefData gStation "Target" ship)
; orders (shpCancelOrders gPlayerShip) (shpOrderAttack gPlayerShip ship) (objRegisterForEvents gStation gPlayerShip) ) )
; Code to see if mission has been completed (lambda Nil (block Nil ; Set description (scrSetDesc gScreen "\"Outstanding mission! That's one less supply ship for the Martiansjust a matter of time before this war is over.\"")
; Increment XP (objIncData gPlayerShip "fleetXP" 150) ) ) ) )
StaticData.Missions3:
( ("mission3a" ; Code to describe mission (lambda Nil (block Nil ; Find a random stargate more than 400 light-seconds from us (setq gStart (random (sysFindObject gStation "GR:400;")))
; Describe the mission (if gStart (cat "A supply ship is arriving at the " (objGetName gStart) ". Your orders are to escort it back to " (objGetName gStation 4) " and defend it against all enemies. Carry On!") Nil ) ) )
; Code to initiate mission (lambda Nil (block Nil ; Set a timer to give the player a chance to get to the stargate (objSetObjRefData gStation "Target" gStart) (setq timer (add (multiply 5 (objGetDistance gStation gStart)) (random 0 200))) (sysAddObjTimerEvent timer gStation "OnTimerConvoyAppears")
; Add some enemy ships patrolling around the stargate (for i 1 (random 4 6) (block (patrol) (setq patrol (sysCreateShip &scSandstorm; gStart &svAres;)) (shpOrderPatrol patrol gStart 20) ) )
; orders (shpOrderEscort gPlayerShip gStart) (objRegisterForEvents gStation gPlayerShip) ) )
; Code to see if mission has been completed (lambda Nil (block Nil ; Set description (scrSetDesc gScreen "\"Outstanding mission! Those supplies are desperately needed here.\"")
; Increment XP (objIncData gPlayerShip "fleetXP" 250) ) ) ) )
StaticData.Missions4:
( ("mission4a" ; Code to describe mission (lambda Nil (block Nil ; Pick a random Ares station in the system (setq gTarget (random (sysFindObject gStation "T:aresMajor;A")))
; Compose description (if gTarget (cat "This mission is straight from Admiral Decker himself. We want you to lead a squadron to destroy " (objGetName gTarget 4) " in this system. Any questions?") Nil ) ) )
; Code to initiate mission (lambda Nil (block Nil ; Create some ships off-screen a bring them in (for i 0 5 (block (ship) (setq ship (sysCreateShip &scCenturion; gStation &svCommonwealth; "fleet")) (shpOrderEscort ship gPlayerShip i)
; Remember the escorts we assigned (objSetObjRefData gStation (cat "Wingman" i) ship) ) )
; Point-out the station to destroy (objSetObjRefData gStation "Target" gTarget) (objRegisterForEvents gStation gTarget) (shpOrderAttack gPlayerShip gTarget) (objRegisterForEvents gStation gPlayerShip) ) )
; Code to see if mission has been completed (lambda Nil (block (shipsLeft) ; Disperse wingmen (setq shipsLeft 0) (for i 0 5 (block (ship) (setq ship (objGetObjRefData gStation (cat "Wingman" i))) (if ship (block Nil (setq shipsLeft (add shipsLeft 1)) (shpCancelOrders ship) (shpOrderGate ship) ) ) ) )
; Set description (switch (eq shipsLeft 0) (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "\"A tough mission. We can't afford to lose so many good pilots.\""))
(eq shipsLeft 1) (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "\"Good mission! It's unfortunate that only one of your wingmen survived.\""))
(scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "\"Outstanding mission! Looks like you came back with " shipsLeft " wingmen.\"")) )
; Increment XP (objIncData gPlayerShip "fleetXP" (add 250 (multiply shipsLeft 100))) ) ) ) )

Events.OnObjDestroyed:
(if (eq (objGetData gStation "MissionStatus") "inprogress") (if (eq aObjDestroyed gPlayerShip)
; If the player was destroyed, stop the mission (block Nil (objSetData gStation "MissionStatus" "failure") (shpCancelOrders gPlayerShip)
; Disperse wingmen (for i 0 10 (block (ship) (setq ship (objGetObjRefData gStation (cat "Wingman" i))) (if ship (block Nil (shpCancelOrders ship) (shpOrderDock ship gStation) (shpOrderGate ship) ) ) ) ) )
; Otherwise, deal with some other object being destroyed (block (missionID) (setq missionID (objGetData gStation "MissionID")) (switch (and (eq missionID "mission2a") (eq aObjDestroyed (objGetObjRefData gStation "Target"))) (block Nil (plyMessage gPlayer "Mission complete!") (objSetData gStation "MissionStatus" "success") (shpCancelOrders gPlayerShip) )
(and (eq missionID "mission3a") (eq aObjDestroyed (objGetObjRefData gStation "Target"))) (block Nil (plyMessage gPlayer "Mission failed") (objSetData gStation "MissionStatus" "failure") (shpCancelOrders gPlayerShip) )
(and (eq missionID "mission4a") (eq aObjDestroyed (objGetObjRefData gStation "Target"))) (block Nil (plyMessage gPlayer "Mission complete!") (objSetData gStation "MissionStatus" "success") (shpCancelOrders gPlayerShip) ) ) ) ) )
Events.OnObjDocked:
(if (eq (objGetData gStation "MissionStatus") "inprogress") (block (missionID) (setq missionID (objGetData gStation "MissionID")) (switch (and (eq missionID "mission2a") (eq aObjDocked (objGetObjRefData gStation "Target"))) (block Nil (plyMessage gPlayer "Mission failed") (objSetData gStation "MissionStatus" "failure") (objUnregisterForEvents gStation aObjDocked) (shpCancelOrders gPlayerShip) )
(and (eq missionID "mission3a") (eq aObjDocked (objGetObjRefData gStation "Target"))) (block Nil (plyMessage gPlayer "Mission complete!") (objSetData gStation "MissionStatus" "success") (objUnregisterForEvents gStation aObjDocked) (shpCancelOrders gPlayerShip) ) ) ) )
Events.OnObjReconned: (if (eq (objGetData gStation "MissionStatus") "inprogress") (block (missionID) (setq missionID (objGetData gStation "MissionID")) (switch (and (eq missionID "mission1a") (eq aObj (objGetObjRefData gStation "Target"))) (block Nil (plyMessage gPlayer "Recon completed") (objSetData gStation "MissionStatus" "success") (objUnregisterForEvents gStation aObj) (shpCancelOrders gPlayerShip) ) ) ) )
Events.OnTimerConvoyAppears:
(if (eq (objGetData gStation "MissionStatus") "inprogress") (block (missionID) (setq missionID (objGetData gStation "MissionID")) (switch (eq missionID "mission3a") (block (ship) (plyMessage gPlayer "Transport has arrived")
; create the transport that will go back to the carrier (setq ship (sysCreateShip &scEI100; (objGetObjRefData gStation "Target") &svCommonwealth;)) (shpOrderDock ship gStation) (shpOrderGate ship)
; Remember this ship (objSetObjRefData gStation "Target" ship)
; register so we know when the transport is destroyed (objRegisterForEvents gStation ship)
; Point the player to the transport (shpCancelOrders gPlayerShip) (shpOrderEscort gPlayerShip ship) ) ) ) )

Default.Initialize: (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "You are in the docking bay of the " (objGetName gStation) "."))

MissionFailure.desc: "You screwed that mission all the way to Sol and back. You better hit the sims, pilot!"

Actions.Action:
(block (success failure) (objSetData gStation "MissionStatus" Nil)
(setq success (objGetData gPlayerShip "fleetTFSuccess")) (setq failure (add (objGetData gPlayerShip "fleetTFFailure") 1)) (objSetData gPlayerShip "fleetTFFailure" failure)
(scrShowPane gScreen "Default") )

MissionInProgress.desc: "What is your major malfunction!? Get back out there and complete your mission!"

MissionSuccess.Initialize:
(block (success failure) ; Get the mission (setq gMission (objGetData gStation "Mission"))
; Execute the post-mission code (which must set the description). (apply (eval (item gMission 3)) Nil)
; Update mission success/failures (setq success (add (objGetData gPlayerShip "fleetTFSuccess") 1)) (setq failure (objGetData gPlayerShip "fleetTFFailure")) (objSetData gPlayerShip "fleetTFSuccess" success)
; Done with mission (objSetData gStation "MissionStatus" Nil) )

Default.Initialize:
(switch (eq (objGetData gStation "CSC") "america") (scrSetDesc gScreen "You talk to the captain of the CSC America. \"The Ares have been ruthless. When we lost the CSC Europa, the damn Martians deliberately targeted the emergency capsules. We taught them a lesson the next year, though: we torched several of their communes.\"")
(eq (objGetData gStation "CSC") "india") (scrSetDesc gScreen "You talk to the captain of the CSC India. \"If you ever get back to the Commonwealth, you've got to tell them to send more ships. We're getting killed out here and I don't even know if anyone back home cares.\"")
(eq (objGetData gStation "CSC") "atlantica") (scrSetDesc gScreen "You talk to the captain of the CSC Atlantica. \"This war has been tough on the troops. We've had to start scavenging for vital supplies. I'm not surprised that the discipline in some units has deteriorated.\"")
(eq (objGetData gStation "CSC") "asia") (scrSetDesc gScreen "You talk to the captain of the CSC Asia. \"When the Antarctica went rogue, Admiral Decker just about pissed acid. He was furious! He took it as a personal betrayal.\"")
(eq (objGetData gStation "CSC") "pacifica") (scrSetDesc gScreen "You talk to the captain of the CSC Pacifica. \"You ever meet a Martian? Not the meek little SyrtiansI mean the Ares clones. They all have this smug look of superiority that cranks me up. They look better in the crosshairs of TeV9, that's for sure!\"")
(scrSetDesc gScreen "The captain welcomes you aboard.") )

(block (desc) (setq gLevel (objGetData gPlayerShip "fleetLevel")) (switch (eq gLevel 1) (setq desc (cat "The flight deck of the " (objGetName gStation) " hums with the activity of men and women working at terminals and holocharts. The XO is giving orders to a squadron out on a mission."))
(setq desc (cat "You are on the flight deck of the " (objGetName gStation) ". Men and women work at terminals planning missions and communicating with squadrons on patrol. The XO is near a holochart, listening to a report.")) ) (scrSetDesc gScreen desc) )

Actions.Action: (block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "FlightDeck") (setq gPrevPane "Default") (setq gMissionTitle "Flight Deck") (setq gMissionListName (cat "Missions" (objGetData gPlayerShip "fleetLevel"))) (if (gr (objGetData gPlayerShip "fleetTFSuccess") 0) (setq gMissionNoneText "\"Sorry, Captain, there no missions available for you.\"") (setq gMissionNoneText "\"Sorry, Captain, there no missions available for you.\"") ) (setq gMissionAcceptText "\"Good luck, Captain!\"") (setq gMissionDeclineText "\"Get the hell out of here then!\"") (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsMission;") )

Events.OnCreate:
(block (resistList total rnd choice) (setq resistList (staGetGlobalData &stLuminousAssembler; "Resist")) (setq total (item resistList 4))
; Depending on what we've been killed-by previously, create ; new drones that are resistant
(setq rnd (random 1 total)) (setq choice Nil) (for i 0 3 (if (and (not choice) (leq rnd (item resistList i))) (setq choice i) (setq rnd (subtract rnd (item resistList i))) ) )
; Add appropriate shield generator (switch (eq choice 0) (setq choice (itmCreate &itLuminousParticleShields; 1))
(eq choice 1) (setq choice (itmCreate &itLuminousBlastShields; 1))
(eq choice 2) (setq choice (itmCreate &itLuminousIonShields; 1))
(eq choice 3) (setq choice (itmCreate &itLuminousThermoShields; 1))
(setq choice Nil) )
; Install (if choice (block Nil (objAddItem gStation choice) (shpInstallDevice gStation choice) ) ) )
Events.OnDestroy:
(if aDestroyer (block (damage resistList d1 d2 d3 d4) ; Figure out what kind of damage killed us (setq damage (objGetDamageType aDestroyer))
; Increment the resist list (setq resistList (staGetGlobalData &stLuminousAssembler; "Resist")) (setq d1 (if (eq damage 1) (add (item resistList 0) 1) (item resistList 0))) (setq d2 (if (eq damage 2) (add (item resistList 1) 1) (item resistList 1))) (setq d3 (if (eq damage 4) (add (item resistList 2) 1) (item resistList 2))) (setq d4 (if (eq damage 5) (add (item resistList 3) 1) (item resistList 3)))
(staSetGlobalData &stLuminousAssembler; "Resist" (list d1 d2 d3 d4 (add (add (add d1 d2) d3) d4) ) ) ) )

InitialData.Info: "Welcome, Traveller! You have just arrived at Rigel Aurelius, the universe's most famous tourist destination. Millions of us, from all star systems, have come to shed the constraints of our regimented life and trust to the luck of the Games. Join us at Battle Arena Maximus!"
"Welcome to Battle Arena Maximus! Please enter through the gates and dock at the main station for registration information."
"Pirate activity reported in systems between Eridani and St. Katharine's System. Please use caution. Make sure you have current star maps and avoid travel to non-Commonwealth stations."

"Welcome to Starton Eridani! Founded in 2176, our small star system is one of the most friendly in all the Commonwealth. Whatever your purpose here, whether business or pleasure, we're sure that you will enjoy your stay!"

"WARNING! Systems beyond St. Katharine's Star are not controlled by the Commonwealth. By entering this stargate you agree to hold the Commonwealth Transport System immune to liability in the event of injury, involuntary servitude, or death."
"Welcome to St. Katharine's Star System, capital of the Commonwealth and metropolitan jewel of Human Space."

StationType.name: (agricultural station)

Events.OnTimer:
(block Nil ; Create the encounter (apply (eval (item (item (objGetStaticData gStation "WaveData") (objGetData gStation "Wave")) 2 ) ) gStation Nil )
; Mark WaveReady so that we know that we've already created the encounter (objSetData gStation "WaveReady" True) )

Default.desc: You are inside a C9-class prefabricated agricultural station.

MissionDone.desc: The hall is empty, but in the corner you can see a small Duralloy plaque commemorating a battle against pirates.

MeetingHall.Initialize:
(switch ; If the player hasn't accepted the mission yet... (eq (objGetData gStation "State") "start") (block Nil (if (eq (objGetData gStation "Declined") 0)
; If this is the first time the player is here... (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "As you enter the meeting hall, you see about a dozen people talking excitedly. " "One of them approaches you: \"Welcome to " (objGetName gStation) ", " "Captain. I hope you don't mind if we skip the tour of the " "station and instead get right to the point: the truth is that we've received " "good information that a small raiding party is heading for this station. " "We saw your ship come in, and frankly, we thought that you might be able to help us...\"" ))
; Else, if the player has declined before... (scrSetDesc gScreen "\"You're back! Look, we're desperate. No one else has a powerful ship or the skills to fly it. Please reconsider our offer...\"") ) )
; Else (if the mission is complete)... (scrSetDesc gScreen "The hall is empty.") )

Proposal.Initialize: (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "\"If you can defend our station, we're prepared to offer you " (objGetStaticData gStation "Reward") " credits in compensation (which is frankly all we've been able to collect on short notice). What do you say?\"" ))

AcceptProposal.Initialize: (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "\"Thank you, you won't regret it! We believe that the first wave is composed " "mostly of gunships; the heavier ships won't show up til the end. You should " "have no problem at all! Well, we better get to the shelters. Thanks again!\"" ))

DeclineProposal.Initialize: (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "\"Well, I suppose I shouldn't have expected you to risk your life for us.\" He offers you his hand, " "\"Thanks, anyways. And wish us luck.\"" ))

MissionStatus.Initialize:
(switch ; If the station is actively under attack... (objIsUnderAttack gStation) (block Nil (scrSetDesc gScreen "\"Whoa, what are you doing here!? The station is still under attack! Just get out there are finish the job, you've got them on the run now.\"") (setq gState "under-attack") )
; If the wave hasn't arrived yet... (not (objGetData gStation "WaveReady")) (block Nil (scrSetDesc gScreen (item (item (objGetStaticData gStation "WaveData") (objGetData gStation "Wave")) 1) ) (setq gState "waiting") )
; If we have more waves to go... (gr (count (objGetStaticData gStation "WaveData")) (add (objGetData gStation "Wave") 1)) (block Nil (scrSetDesc gScreen (item (item (objGetStaticData gStation "WaveData") (add (objGetData gStation "Wave") 1)) 1) ) (setq gState "next") )
; Otherwise, we are done... (block Nil (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "\"You've done it! I haven't seen fighting like that since the videos of the Marineris War! " " As promised, we've deposited " (objGetStaticData gStation "Reward") " credits into your account.\"") )
(if (not (eq gState "done")) (block Nil (plyCredit gPlayer (objGetStaticData gStation "Reward")) (setq gState "done") ) ) ) )

Actions.Action:
(block Nil (switch (eq gState "next") (block Nil (objSetData gStation "Wave" (add (objGetData gStation "Wave") 1)) (objSetData gStation "WaveReady" Nil) (sysAddObjTimerEvent (random 30 150) gStation "OnTimer") ) (eq gState "done") (objSetData gStation "State" "done") )
(scrExitDock gScreen) )

CommoditiesExchange.Initialize: (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "Welcome to the " (objGetName gStation) " Commodities Exchange Market."))

Actions.Action:
(block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "Main")
; Buys stuff that the farm needs (setq gMargin (lambda (thisItem) (block (cost) (setq cost (itmGetPrice thisItem)) (switch ; We pay double for certain kinds of supplies (or (eq (itmGetUNID thisItem) &itHydrocarbons;) (eq (itmGetUNID thisItem) &itHelium3FuelRod;) (eq (itmGetUNID thisItem) &itOrganicAcid;) (eq (itmGetUNID thisItem) &itMedicalSupplies;) (eq (itmGetUNID thisItem) &itHyperfiberRoll;) (eq (itmGetUNID thisItem) &itBiofactorPaste;) ) (setq cost (divide (multiply cost 150) 100))
; We pay extra for cheap luxuries (and (itmHasModifier thisItem 'Lux) (ls cost 250)) (setq cost (divide (multiply cost 125) 100))
; We don't want anything else (setq cost 0) )
cost ) ) )
(setq gBuyCriteria "*U -Illegal; -ID;") (setq gMaxPrice 10000) (setq gTitle Nil) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsExchangeSell;") )

DockServices.desc: You are at the docking services terminal.

Actions.Action: (block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "Main") (setq gPrevPane "DockServices") (setq gTechLevel 3) (setq gArmorSegment 0) (setq gArmorSegmentNames '("forward" "starboard" "aft" "port")) (setq gMargin 100) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsRepairArmor;") )

StationType.name: (armor dealer)

Default.desc: You are docked at an armor dealer station.

Actions.Action: (block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "Main") (setq gMargin 10) (setq gBuyCriteria "asU -Illegal;") (setq gMaxPrice 100000) (setq gTitle Nil) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsExchangeSell;") )

(block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "Main") (setq gPrevPane "Default") (setq gTechLevel 5) (setq gArmorSegment 0) (setq gArmorSegmentNames '("forward" "starboard" "aft" "port")) (setq gMargin 100) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsRepairArmor;") )

(block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "Main") (setq gPrevPane "Default") (setq gCost 1300) (setq gItem (itmCreate &itMonopoleDeflector; 1)) (setq gCheckMilitaryID True) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsInstallSpecificDevice;") )

StationType.name: (arms dealer)

Default.Initialize: (block Nil (scrSetDesc gScreen "You are docked at an arms dealer station.") (setq gItem (itmCreate (item (objGetStaticData gStation "WeaponUpgradeList") (objGetData gStation "WeaponUpgrade")) 1)) (scrSetActionLabel gScreen 2 (cat "Install " (itmGetName gItem 0))) )

Actions.Action: (block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "Main") (setq gMargin 10) (setq gBuyCriteria "mwU -Illegal;") (setq gMaxPrice 500000) (setq gTitle Nil) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsExchangeSell;") )

(block Nil (setq gItem (itmCreate (item (objGetStaticData gStation "WeaponUpgradeList") (objGetData gStation "WeaponUpgrade")) 1)) (setq gPrevScreen "Main") (setq gPrevPane "Default") (setq gCost (add (itmGetPrice gItem) 100)) (setq gCheckMilitaryID True) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsInstallSpecificDevice;") )

StationType.name: (auton dealer)

Default.desc: You are docked at an auton dealer.

Actions.Action: (block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "Main") (setq gMargin 10) (setq gBuyCriteria "mwU -Illegal; +Auton;") (setq gMaxPrice 500000) (setq gTitle Nil) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsExchangeSell;") )

(block Nil ; Figure out the list of autons for the player (setq gList (sysFindObject gPlayerShip "s B:auton; O:escort;")) (if gList (scrShowPane gScreen "RepairAutons") (scrShowPane gScreen "NoAutons") ) )

NoAutons.desc: A sales droid approaches you: "You do not currently have any autons to repair, but I would be delighted to show you some of our newest models."

RepairAutons.Initialize:
(block Nil ; Figure out how much it would cost to repair the player's ; autons.
(setq gCost 0) (enum gList auton (for i 0 (subtract (shpGetArmorCount auton) 1) (setq gCost (add gCost (multiply 5 (objGetArmorDamage auton i)))) ) )
(switch ; If the autons have no damage, then there is nothing to do (eq gCost 0) (block Nil (scrSetDesc gScreen "There is no damage to your autons.") (scrEnableAction gScreen 0 Nil) )
; If the player cannot afford it. (gr gCost (plyGetCredits gPlayer)) (block Nil (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "Repairing the damage to your autons would cost " gCost " credits. Unfortunately, you do not have enough credits to proceed.")) (scrEnableAction gScreen 0 Nil) )
; Otherwise, we're OK (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "Repairing the damage to your autons will cost " gCost " credits. Do you wish to proceed?")) ) )

Events.OnObjDestroyed:
(if (eq aObjDestroyed gPlayerShip) ; If the player was destroyed (block Nil ; Open arena doors (staSetImageVariant (sysGetObjectByName gStation "arenaDoor1a") 16) (staSetImageVariant (sysGetObjectByName gStation "arenaDoor1b") 17) (staSetImageVariant (sysGetObjectByName gStation "arenaDoor2a") 16) (staSetImageVariant (sysGetObjectByName gStation "arenaDoor2b") 17)
; Set status (objSetData gStation "Status" Nil) (objSetData gStation "OpponentCount" Nil) )
; If some other ship was destroyed (block (opponentCount) (setq opponentCount (subtract (objGetData gStation "OpponentCount") 1)) (objSetData gStation "OpponentCount" opponentCount)
(if (eq opponentCount 0) (block Nil (objSetData gStation "Status" 2)
(setq battles (objGetData gPlayerShip "arenaBattles")) (setq opponentsList (objGetStaticData gStation "Opponents")) (plyCredit gPlayer (item (item opponentsList battles) 2)) (objSetData gPlayerShip "arenaRank" (item (item opponentsList battles) 3)) (plyMessage gPlayer "Victory!") ) ) ) )
Events.OnObjDocked: (if (not (eq aObjDocked gPlayerShip)) (block Nil (objMoveTo aObjDocked (sysVectorPolarOffset gStation 270 300)) (objUnregisterForEvents gStation aObjDocked) (shpCancelOrders aObjDocked) (shpOrderGate aObjDocked) ) )
Events.OnObjJumped:
(if (eq aObj gPlayerShip) (block Nil ; Open arena doors (staSetImageVariant (sysGetObjectByName gStation "arenaDoor1a") 16) (staSetImageVariant (sysGetObjectByName gStation "arenaDoor1b") 17) (staSetImageVariant (sysGetObjectByName gStation "arenaDoor2a") 16) (staSetImageVariant (sysGetObjectByName gStation "arenaDoor2b") 17)
; Unregister (objUnregisterForEvents gStation gPlayerShip)
; Send all the opponents away (for i 0 3 (block (ship) (setq ship (objGetObjRefData gStation (cat "Opponent" i))) (if ship (block Nil (objMoveTo ship (sysVectorPolarOffset gStation 270 300)) (objUnregisterForEvents gStation ship) (shpCancelOrders ship) (shpOrderGate ship) ) ) ) )
; Set status (objSetData gStation "Status" 3) (objSetData gStation "OpponentCount" Nil) ) )

Main.name: =(objGetName gStation)
Main.InitialPane:
(block (status) (setq status (objGetData gStation "Status")) (switch (not status) "Default"
(eq status 1) "StillFighting"
(eq status 2) "Winner"
(eq status 3) "PlayerLeft" ) )

Default.desc: Welcome to Battle Arena Maximus! Prepare yourself for the greatest show in space! Watch as the best pilots in the Commonwealth compete in mortal combat. The action is so real you'll swear its faked! See you ticket agent for reservation. Enquire within to join the elite combatants.

Chicken.desc: "This kind of challenge is not for the weak and fearful. You are wise to decline."

DockServices.desc: You are at the docking services terminal.

Actions.Action: (block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "Main") (setq gPrevPane "DockServices") (setq gTechLevel 3) (setq gArmorSegment 0) (setq gArmorSegmentNames '("forward" "starboard" "aft" "port")) (setq gMargin 100) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsRepairArmor;") )

Fight.Initialize: (block (battles opponentsList) (setq opponentsList (objGetStaticData gStation "Opponents")) (setq battles (objGetData gPlayerShip "arenaBattles")) (if (eq battles (count opponentsList)) (block Nil (scrSetDesc gScreen "\"No opponent is brave enough to face you!\"") (scrEnableAction gScreen 0 Nil) ) (scrSetDesc gScreen (item (item opponentsList battles) 0)) ) )

Actions.Action:
(block (battles opponentsList) ; Get the table of challengers and figure out which ; is next. (setq opponentsList (objGetStaticData gStation "Opponents")) (setq battles (objGetData gPlayerShip "arenaBattles"))
(if (ls battles (count opponentsList)) (block (shipClass) (setq opponent Nil) (setq offset 0)
; Loop over the list of ships, creating each one (enum (item (item opponentsList battles) 1) shipClass (block (thisShip) (setq thisShip (sysCreateShip shipClass (sysVectorPolarOffset gStation (random 22 24) (add 65 offset)) &svOutlaw; ) ) (shpOrderAttack thisShip gPlayerShip) (shpOrderDock thisShip gStation)
(objRegisterForEvents gStation thisShip)
(objSetObjRefData gStation (cat "Opponent" (count opponent)) thisShip)
(setq offset (add offset 2)) (setq opponent (lnkAppend opponent thisShip)) ) )
; Close the arena doors (staSetImageVariant (sysGetObjectByName gStation "arenaDoor1a") 1) (staSetImageVariant (sysGetObjectByName gStation "arenaDoor1b") 1) (staSetImageVariant (sysGetObjectByName gStation "arenaDoor2a") 1) (staSetImageVariant (sysGetObjectByName gStation "arenaDoor2b") 1)
; Register for events (objRegisterForEvents gStation gPlayerShip)
; Initialize state (objSetData gStation "OpponentCount" (count opponent)) (objSetData gStation "Status" 1)
(scrExitDock gScreen) ) ) )

(block (battles opponentsList) (setq opponentsList (objGetStaticData gStation "Opponents")) (setq battles (objGetData gPlayerShip "arenaBattles")) (if (eq battles (count opponentsList)) (scrShowPane gScreen "Default") (scrShowPane gScreen "Chicken") ) )

FirstFight.desc: "Welcome, citizen! You are about to join an elite group of men and women who have conquered their fears and proven their courage and skills in the ultimate testmortal combat. All that remains is for you to sign this minor release indemnifying the Maximus Corporation against any liability in the event of harm, death, etc."

StillFighting.desc: "You'll get no help here. Fight your own battles!"

PlayerLeft.desc: "You're banned from the games for leaving the arena in the middle of battle!"

Winner.desc: "Gladiator, we salute you! The sight of flame and twisted metal has pleased the crowd."

Actions.Action:
(block Nil ; Open arena doors (staSetImageVariant (sysGetObjectByName gStation "arenaDoor1a") 16) (staSetImageVariant (sysGetObjectByName gStation "arenaDoor1b") 17) (staSetImageVariant (sysGetObjectByName gStation "arenaDoor2a") 16) (staSetImageVariant (sysGetObjectByName gStation "arenaDoor2b") 17)
; Unregister (objUnregisterForEvents gStation gPlayerShip)
; Set status (objSetData gStation "Status" Nil) (objSetData gStation "OpponentCount" Nil) (objSetData gPlayerShip "arenaBattles" (add (objGetData gPlayerShip "arenaBattles") 1)) (scrShowPane gScreen "Default") )

Events.OnCreate: ; Register timer event for bounty hunters (sysAddObjRecurringTimerEvent (random 4000 5000) gStation "OnBountyHunterCheck")

Default.desc: The docking bay is guarded by two men with heavy weapons. They check you out and then step aside to let you in.

Actions.Action:
(block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "Main")
; Military items cost double; illegals cost 10% more (setq gMargin (lambda (thisItem) (block (cost) (setq cost (itmGetPrice thisItem)) (if (itmHasModifier thisItem 'Military) (setq cost (multiply cost 2)) (setq cost (divide (multiply cost 110) 100)) ) cost ) ) )
(setq gShowCriteria "*NU") (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsExchangeBuy;") )

(block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "Main")
; Offer 150% for a military item (since it is hard to get) ; Offer 90% for an average illegal item (setq gMargin (lambda (thisItem) (block (cost) (setq cost (itmGetPrice thisItem)) (switch (itmHasModifier thisItem 'ID) (setq cost 0)
(itmHasModifier thisItem 'Military) (if (ls (objGetData gPlayerShip "blackMarketLevel") 4) (setq cost (divide (multiply cost 150) 100)) )
(itmHasModifier thisItem 'Illegal) (setq cost (divide (multiply cost 90) 100))
(setq cost 0) ) cost ) ) )
(setq gBuyCriteria "*NU -ID;") (setq gMaxPrice 100000) (setq gTitle Nil) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsExchangeSell;") )

DockServices.desc: You are at the docking services terminal.

Actions.Action: (block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "Main") (setq gPrevPane "DockServices") (setq gCost 2200) (setq gItem (itmCreate &itSmugglersCargoHold; 1)) (setq gCheckMilitaryID True) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsInstallSpecificDevice;") )

MemberBoss.desc: You are escorted to Lord Mikho's outer office. But instead of finding him there, you see a young, dark-haired woman sitting at the desk. She looks at you slowly, perhaps trying to remember your name, "What can I do for you?"

Actions.Action:
(if (ls (objGetData gPlayerShip "blackMarketWeapon") (objGetData gPlayerShip "blackMarketLevel")) (block (level) (setq level (objGetData gPlayerShip "blackMarketLevel"))
(setq gPrevScreen "Boss") (setq gPrevPane "UpgradeWeaponComplete") (setq gCost 0) (switch (eq level 6) (block Nil (setq gItem (itmCreate &itRasiermesserLauncher; 1)) (setq gAmmo (itmCreate &itGotha400Seeker; 50)) )
(eq level 5) (block Nil (setq gItem (itmCreate &itHanzoBlaster; 1)) (setq gAmmo Nil) )
(eq level 4) (block Nil (setq gItem (itmCreate &itDragonflyMissileSystem; 1)) (setq gAmmo (itmCreate &itDragonflyCartridge; 150)) )
(block Nil (setq gItem (itmCreate &itMAGLauncher; 1)) (setq gAmmo (itmCreate &itZG24ClusterMAG; 100)) ) ) (setq gCheckMilitaryID Nil) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsInstallSpecificDevice;") ) (scrShowPane gScreen "NoUpgrade") )

(if (ls (objGetData gPlayerShip "blackMarketShields") (objGetData gPlayerShip "blackMarketLevel")) (block (level) (setq level (objGetData gPlayerShip "blackMarketLevel"))
(setq gPrevScreen "Boss") (setq gPrevPane "UpgradeShieldsComplete") (setq gCost 0) (switch (eq level 6) (setq gItem (itmCreate &itPlasmaShieldGenerator; 1))
(eq level 5) (setq gItem (itmCreate &itYoroiMX; 1))
(eq level 4) (setq gItem (itmCreate &itYoroiS500; 1))
(eq level 3) (setq gItem (itmCreate &itYoroiS100; 1))
(setq gItem (itmCreate &itClass3Deflector; 1)) ) (setq gCheckMilitaryID Nil) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsInstallSpecificDevice;") ) (scrShowPane gScreen "NoUpgrade") )

LordBoss.desc: You try to see Lord Mikho, but he is indisposed.

NoAccess.desc: You ask to see the station boss. Everyone turns to stare at you for a second, but then they go about their business and continue to ignore you.

NoMissions.desc: The dark-haired woman frowns for a second, "I'm sorry, but we don't have any use for you right now."

NoUpgrade.desc: The dark-haired woman rolls her eyes, "I'm sorry, but you'll just have to do with what you've got."

DeliveryMission.Initialize: (block Nil (setq gDest "StK") (scrSetDesc gScreen "The dark-haired woman looks down at some papers and says, \"As a matter of fact, I was thinking of you. We need you to deliver some cargo to St. Katharine's. Do you think you could do that?\"") )

AcceptDelivery.Initialize: (switch (eq gDest "StK") (scrSetDesc gScreen "\"Take this container to the Victorian at the Commonwealth station in St. Katharine's Star System. Do not take it through customs, obviously. Be careful and good luck!\"") )

DeclineMission.desc: The dark-haired woman frowns for a second, "I'm sorry you feel that way. I will inform Lord Mikho."

UpgradeWeaponComplete.Initialize: (if gResult (scrSetDesc gScreen "The dark-haired woman smiles as the crew installs your new weapon: \"Enjoy your new toy.\"") (scrSetDesc gScreen "The dark-haired woman frowns in disappointment.") )

UpgradeShieldsComplete.Initialize: (if gResult (scrSetDesc gScreen "The dark-haired woman smiles as the crew installs your new shield generator: \"Enjoy your new toy.\"") (scrSetDesc gScreen "The dark-haired woman frowns in disappointment.") )

Main.name: Abandoned Cargo Container
Main.Panes:
(block (contents roll) (objSetData gStation "Opened" True)
; Pick contents randomly (setq roll (random 1 100)) (switch (ls roll 15) (setq contents 1) ; 15% empty (ls roll 45) (setq contents 2) ; 30% random items (ls roll 55) (setq contents 3) ; 10% acid (ls roll 75) (setq contents 4) ; 20% refugees (setq contents 5) ; 25% pirate attack )
; Set the pane and contents (scrShowPane gScreen (cat "Contents" contents)) (objSetData gStation "Contents" contents) )
(switch (eq (objGetData gStation "Contents") 4) (scrSetDesc gScreen "You are docked at an abandoned cargo container. There is a family of refugees living here.") (block (allItems itemCount) (setq allItems (objGetItems gStation "*")) (setq itemCount (count allItems)) (switch (eq itemCount 0) (scrSetDesc gScreen "You are docked at an abandoned cargo container. There are no items here.") (eq itemCount 1) (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "You are docked at an abandoned cargo container. You see " (itmGetName (item allItems 0) 8) " here.")) (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "You are docked at an abandoned cargo container. You see several items here.")) ) ) )
(block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "Main") (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsLoot;") )
; Cargo container is empty
; Cargo container has some random junk
(block (allItems itemCount) (objAddRandomItems gStation &trCargoContainer; 1)
(setq allItems (objGetItems gStation "*")) (setq itemCount (count allItems)) (switch (eq itemCount 0) (scrSetDesc gScreen "The cargo container is empty.") (eq itemCount 1) (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "The cargo container has " (itmGetName (item allItems 0) 8) ".")) (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "The cargo container is filled with various items.")) ) )
(block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "Main") (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsLoot;") )
; Cargo container is filled with a powerful acid
(block (allItems desc) (setq desc "The cargo container was filled with a powerful industrial solvent which has flooded your ship's cargo hold.")
; pick a random item in the ship's cargo hold to damage (setq allItems (objGetItems gPlayerShip "*U"))
; Destroy an item (if (eq (count allItems) 0) (setq desc (cat desc " Fortunately, your cargo hold is empty and nothing was damaged.")) (block (itemDamaged) (setq itemDamaged (random allItems)) (setq desc (cat desc " The solvent has destroyed " (itmGetName itemDamaged 8) ".")) (objRemoveItem gPlayerShip itemDamaged) ) )
; set the desc (scrSetDesc gScreen desc) )
; Cargo container is occupied by some refugees
; Cargo container is a trap for some pirates
(block Nil (sysAddEncounterEventAtDist 0 gPlayerShip &etPirateAmbush1; 50) (scrExitDock gScreen) )

StationType.name: (Centauri occupation)

Events.OnCreate: ; Register events for when subordinates are destroyed (enum (staGetSubordinates gStation) tObj (objRegisterForEvents gStation tObj) )
Events.OnObjDestroyed: ; If the player destroys any of the warlords then she ; counts as the liberator (if (eq aDestroyer gPlayerShip) (objSetData gStation "LiberatedByPlayer" True) )

Default.desc: You are docked at a small Commonwealth settlement. The people here are friendly and grateful to you, but they mostly go on with their business.

Hiding.desc: The docks and corridors of this station are deserted. The men and women of the station hide in their apartments and refuse to talk with you.

LiberatedByOther.desc: You are docked at a small Commonwealth settlement. The people here are friendly, but they mostly go on with their business.

Welcome1.desc: As you exit the airlock dozens of men and women cheer for you. The leader approaches you: "Thank you for killing the warlords! We've been hiding ourselves ever since they took over the station."

Welcome2.desc: The leader continues: "We would like to reward you for liberating our station. Please accept these barrels of exotic rice; they were left behind by the warlords."

StationType.name: (commonwealth colony)

Default.desc: You are in the docking bay of a Commonwealth colony. Except for a few shuttles, the docking bay of this station is deserted. A loose hose is spilling dirty water onto the landing pad; elsewhere, an automatic load-lifter moves forward and back again as it unloads a ship's cargo hold. The air smells of liquid fuel and exhaust.

CommoditiesExchange.Initialize: (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "Welcome to the " (objGetName gStation) " Commodities Exchange Market."))

Actions.Action: (block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "Main") (setq gMargin 10) (setq gBuyCriteria "*NU -Illegal; -ID;") (setq gMaxPrice 50000) (setq gTitle Nil) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsExchangeSell;") )

DockServices.desc: You are at the docking services terminal.

Actions.Action: (block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "Main") (setq gPrevPane "DockServices") (setq gTechLevel 3) (setq gArmorSegment 0) (setq gArmorSegmentNames '("forward" "starboard" "aft" "port")) (setq gMargin 100) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsRepairArmor;") )

Default.desc: You are docked at a Commonwealth Defense Turret. These armed and armored turrets are used to defend Commonwealth stations and settlements in the Ungoverned territory beyond St. Katharine's Star System.

StationType.name: (commonwealth colony, armed)

Default.desc: You are in the docking bay of a Commonwealth colony. Except for a few shuttles, the docking bay of this station is deserted. A loose hose is spilling dirty water onto the landing pad; elsewhere, an automatic load-lifter moves forward and back again as it unloads a ship's cargo hold. The air smells of liquid fuel and exhaust.

CommoditiesExchange.Initialize: (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "Welcome to the " (objGetName gStation) " Commodities Exchange Market."))

Actions.Action: (block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "Main") (setq gMargin 10) (setq gBuyCriteria "*NU -Illegal; -ID;") (setq gMaxPrice 50000) (setq gTitle Nil) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsExchangeSell;") )

DockServices.desc: You are at the docking services terminal.

Actions.Action: (block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "Main") (setq gPrevPane "DockServices") (setq gTechLevel 5) (setq gArmorSegment 0) (setq gArmorSegmentNames '("forward" "starboard" "aft" "port")) (setq gMargin 100) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsRepairArmor;") )

StaticData.Missions0:
( ("mission0a" ; Code to describe mission (lambda Nil (block (gateList) (setq gStart Nil)
; Get the list of gates in the system (setq gateList (sysFindObject gStation "G"))
; Make sure there are at least 2 gates (if (geq (count gateList) 2) (block Nil (setq gStart (item gateList 0)) (setq gEnd (item gateList 1))
; The two gates better be at least 50 light-seconds ; away from each other (if (ls (objGetDistance gStart gEnd) 50) (setq gStart Nil) ) ) )
; We must have an SRS enhancement (if (not (shpIsSRSEnhanced gPlayerShip)) (setq gStart Nil) )
; If we have a destination, then compose briefing (if gStart (cat "\"Your mission is to patrol the orbital lanes that access the major stargates. Your patrol will take you in a circuit through the system that passes each stargate and returns back here. Your orders are to destroy any enemy ships in the lanes. Understood?\"") Nil ) ) )
; Code to initiate mission (lambda Nil (block (waypoint) ; Remember where were supposed to go (objSetObjRefData gStation "StartGate" gStart) (objSetObjRefData gStation "EndGate" gEnd)
; First waypoint is the nav beacon (setq waypoint (objGetObjRefData gStart "NavBeacon"))
; Set the target in the player ship's computer (shpOrderEscort gPlayerShip waypoint)
; Prepare the station to be reconned (staClearReconned waypoint) (staSetFireReconEvent waypoint) (objRegisterForEvents gStation waypoint)
; Create some marauders at the waypoint and send them ; towards the player (if (leq (random 1 100) 60) (sysAddEncounterEvent 0 gPlayerShip &etMarauderAmbush2; waypoint) )
; Remember which waypoint we want (objSetData gStation "Waypoint" 1) ) ) ) )
StaticData.Missions1:
( ("mission1a" ; Code to describe mission (lambda Nil (block (gateList) (setq gStart Nil)
; Get the list of gates in the system (setq gateList (sysFindObject gStation "G"))
; If there are a least 2 gates, figure out which should ; be start and end. (if (geq (count gateList) 2) (block Nil (setq gStart (item gateList 0)) (setq gEnd (item gateList 1))
; The nearest gate is the first gate (if (ls (objGetDistance gStation gEnd) (objGetDistance gStation gStart)) (block (swap) (setq swap gStart) (setq gStart gEnd) (setq gEnd swap) ) )
; The two gates better be at least 50 light-seconds ; away from each other (if (ls (objGetDistance gStart gEnd) 50) (setq gStart Nil) ) ) )
; If we have two valid gates then compose the mission briefing ; (otherwise return Nil. (if gStart (cat "\"We have received information that a marauder convoy will be entering the system at the " (objGetName gStart) ". Your mission is to destroy the convoy before it leaves the system.\"") Nil ) ) )
; Code to initiate mission (lambda Nil (block (timer) (objSetObjRefData gStation "StartGate" gStart) (objSetObjRefData gStation "EndGate" gEnd)
(setq timer (add 600 (random 0 100))) (sysAddObjTimerEvent timer gStation "OnTimerConvoyAppears")
(shpOrderEscort gPlayerShip gStart) ) ) )
("mission1b" ; Code to describe mission (lambda Nil (block (gateList) (setq gStart Nil)
; Get the list of gates in the system (setq gateList (sysFindObject gStation "G"))
; If there are a least 2 gates, figure out which should ; be start and end. (if (geq (count gateList) 2) (block Nil (setq gStart (item gateList 0)) (setq gEnd (item gateList 1))
; The nearest gate is the first gate (if (ls (objGetDistance gStation gEnd) (objGetDistance gStation gStart)) (block (swap) (setq swap gStart) (setq gStart gEnd) (setq gEnd swap) ) )
; The two gates better be at least 50 light-seconds ; away from each other (if (ls (objGetDistance gStart gEnd) 50) (setq gStart Nil) ) ) )
; If we have two valid gates then compose the mission briefing ; (otherwise return Nil. (if gStart (cat "\"We have received information that a slaver convoy will be entering the system at the " (objGetName gStart) ". Your mission is to destroy the convoy before it leaves the system.\"") Nil ) ) )
; Code to initiate mission (lambda Nil (block (timer) (objSetObjRefData gStation "StartGate" gStart) (objSetObjRefData gStation "EndGate" gEnd)
(setq timer (add 600 (random 0 100))) (sysAddObjTimerEvent timer gStation "OnTimerConvoyAppears")
(shpOrderEscort gPlayerShip gStart) ) ) ) )
StaticData.Missions2:
( ("mission2a" ; Code to describe mission (lambda Nil (block Nil "We're receiving a distress signal from a super-freighter at the edge of the system. Check it out, and if necessary, escort the freighter back. We'll feed the coordinates into your computer. What are standing around for? Get moving!" ) )
; Code to initiate mission (lambda Nil (block (pos ship timer vec1) ; unit vector from origin to station (setq vec1 (sysVectorDivide (objGetPos gStation) (objGetDistance gStation)))
; position of freighter (setq pos (sysVectorAdd (objGetPos gStation) (sysVectorMultiply vec1 (random 450 500))))
; Create the freighter with orders to dock at fortress (setq ship (sysCreateShip &scScarabFreighter; pos &svCommonwealth;)) (shpOrderDock ship gStation) (shpOrderWait ship (random 10 60)) (shpOrderGate ship)
; Remember this ship (objSetObjRefData gStation "Target" ship)
; register so we know when the transport is destroyed (objRegisterForEvents gStation ship)
; Point the player to the transport (shpCancelOrders gPlayerShip) (shpOrderEscort gPlayerShip ship)
; Create an enemy ship that will attack the freighter (for i 1 (random 2 3) (block (enemy) (setq enemy (sysCreateShip &scViking-II; (sysVectorPolarOffset ship (random 0 359) 300) &svPirates;)) (shpOrderAttack enemy ship) ) )
; On timer, more enemies appear (sysAddEncounterEventAtDist (add 800 (random 0 600)) ship &etMarauderAmbush1; (random 120 200) )
(sysAddEncounterEventAtDist (add 1200 (random 0 500)) gPlayerShip &etMarauderAmbush2; (random 120 200) )
(sysAddEncounterEventAtDist (add 1800 (random 0 100)) gPlayerShip &etMarauderAmbush2; (random 120 200) )
(sysAddEncounterEventAtDist (add 1900 (random 0 100)) ship &etMarauderAmbush2; (random 120 200) ) ) ) ) )

Events.OnObjReconned:
(if (eq (objGetData gStation "MissionStatus") "inprogress") (block (missionID) (setq missionID (objGetData gStation "MissionID")) (switch (eq missionID "mission0a") (block (waypoint nextWaypoint) ; Unregister (objUnregisterForEvents gStation aObj) (shpCancelOrders gPlayerShip)
; Next waypoint (setq waypoint (objGetData gStation "Waypoint")) (switch (eq waypoint 1) (setq nextWaypoint (objGetObjRefData gStation "StartGate"))
(eq waypoint 2) (setq nextWaypoint (objGetObjRefData (objGetObjRefData gStation "EndGate") "NavBeacon"))
(eq waypoint 3) (setq nextWaypoint (objGetObjRefData gStation "EndGate"))
(eq waypoint 4) (setq nextWaypoint gStation)
(setq nextWaypoint Nil) )
(if nextWaypoint ; If we're not done, then prepare the next encounter (block Nil ; Set the target in the player ship's computer (shpOrderEscort gPlayerShip nextWaypoint)
; Prepare the station to be reconned (staClearReconned nextWaypoint) (staSetFireReconEvent nextWaypoint) (objRegisterForEvents gStation nextWaypoint)
; Create some marauders at the waypoint and send them ; towards the player (if (leq (random 1 100) 60) (sysAddEncounterEvent 0 gPlayerShip &etMarauderAmbush1; nextWaypoint) )
; Remember which waypoint we want (objIncData gStation "Waypoint") )
; Otherwise, mission is done (block Nil (plyMessage gPlayer "Mission Accomplished!") (objSetData gStation "MissionStatus" "success") ) ) ) ) ) )
Events.OnTimerConvoyAppears:
(block (missionID) (setq missionID (objGetData gStation "MissionID"))
(switch (eq missionID "mission1a") (block (ship) ; create the main ship that will go from one stargate to the other (setq ship (sysCreateShip &scDrake; (objGetObjRefData gStation "StartGate") &svPirates;) ) (shpOrderGate ship (objGetObjRefData gStation "EndGate"))
; create the escorts (for i 1 (random 3 6) (block (escort) (setq escort (sysCreateShip &scViking-II; (objGetObjRefData gStation "StartGate") &svPirates;) ) (shpOrderEscort escort ship) ) )
; register so we know when the main ship is destroyed (objRegisterForEvents gStation ship) (objSetObjRefData gStation "ShipToDestroy" ship)
; orders (shpCancelOrders gPlayerShip) (shpOrderAttack gPlayerShip ship) )
(eq missionID "mission1b") (block (ship) ; create the transport that will go from one stargate to the other (setq ship (sysCreateShip &scSungTransport; (objGetObjRefData gStation "StartGate") &svSung;) ) (shpOrderGate ship (objGetObjRefData gStation "EndGate")) (objAddItem ship (itmCreate &itSlaveCoffin; (random 10 20)))
; create the escorts (for i 1 (random 6 9) (block (escort) (setq escort (sysCreateShip &scWindSlaver; (objGetObjRefData gStation "StartGate") &svSung;) ) (shpOrderEscort escort ship) ) )
; register so we know when the main ship is destroyed (objRegisterForEvents gStation ship) (objSetObjRefData gStation "ShipToDestroy" ship)
; orders (shpCancelOrders gPlayerShip) (shpOrderAttack gPlayerShip ship) ) ) )

Default.Initialize:
(block (desc playerRank) ; Make sure playerRank variable is initialized (setq playerRank (objGetData gPlayerShip "militiaRank")) (if (not playerRank) (block Nil (setq playerRank 0) (objSetData gPlayerShip "militiaRank" playerRank) (objSetData gPlayerShip "militiaSuccess" 0) (objSetData gPlayerShip "militiaFailure" 0) ) )
; Set the greeting based on the player's rank (setq desc "You are in the main hall of a Commonwealth Militia Fortress.")
(switch (eq playerRank 1) (setq desc (cat desc " Squadron captains rush through the hall reading mission briefings and weapons manifests."))
(eq playerRank 2) (setq desc (cat desc " Squadron captains rush through the hall on various missions; several stop to say hello to you. You feel like you belong."))
(eq playerRank 3) (setq desc (cat desc " Squadron captains rush through the hall on various missions, each one stops to salute you as you pass."))
(setq desc (cat desc " Squadron captains rush through the hall reading mission briefings and weapons manifests. You feel out of place here.")) ) (scrSetDesc gScreen desc) )

Actions.Action:
(block (playerRank) (setq playerRank (objGetData gPlayerShip "militiaRank"))
(switch ; If we're ranked (meaning we've completed at least one mission) ; then proceed to the command center (gr playerRank 0) (scrShowPane gScreen "CommandCenter")
; If we're ranked in the arena then proceed to the ; command center. (gr (objGetData gPlayerShip "arenaRank") 0) (scrShowPane gScreen "CommandCenter")
; If we're ranked in korolov shipping then proceed (gr (objGetData gPlayerShip "korolovRank") 0) (scrShowPane gScreen "CommandCenter")
; If we have a military id then proceed (objGetItems gPlayerShip "*+MilitaryID") (scrShowPane gScreen "CommandCenter")
; Otherwise, we are not allowed in (scrShowPane gScreen "AccessDenied") ) )

AccessDenied.Initialize: (scrSetDesc gScreen (plyComposeString gPlayer "Two guards flank the door to the Command Center. One of them checks your ID against a computer list: \"Sorry, %sir%, only experienced captains are allowed inside.\""))

AccessDenied2.Initialize: (scrSetDesc gScreen (plyComposeString gPlayer "Two guards flank the door to the Armory. One of them checks your ID against a computer list: \"Sorry, %sir%, only officers are allowed in the armory.\""))

AccessDenied3.Initialize: (scrSetDesc gScreen (plyComposeString gPlayer "Two guards flank the door to the Officer's Club. One of them checks your ID against a computer list: \"Sorry, %sir%, only officers are allowed in the club.\""))

Armory.desc: You are in the station's armory shop. You may buy weapons and armor to equip your ship.

Actions.Action:
(block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "Main")
(setq gMargin (lambda (thisItem) (block (rank) (setq rank (objGetData gPlayerShip "militiaRank")) (switch ; Some items only available to Majors (or (eq (itmGetUNID thisItem) &itXM900Missile;) (eq (itmGetUNID thisItem) &itStarCannon;) ) (if (gr rank 1) (itmGetPrice thisItem) 0 )
; Other items are available at a discount depending on level (eq rank 1) (divide (multiply (itmGetPrice thisItem) 90) 100)
(eq rank 2) (divide (multiply (itmGetPrice thisItem) 75) 100)
(eq rank 3) (divide (multiply (itmGetPrice thisItem) 55) 100)
; item not available 0 ) ) ) )
(setq gShowCriteria "*NU -Illegal;") (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsExchangeBuy;") )

CommandCenter.desc: You are in the command center surrounded by wall maps and scanner displays. The commanding officer of the fortress looks up from his charts and asks, "Are you looking for a mission, Captain?"

Actions.Action: (block (playerRank) (setq playerRank (objGetData gPlayerShip "militiaRank")) (if (eq playerRank -1) (scrShowPane gScreen "TooManyFailures") (block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "Main") (setq gPrevPane "Default") (setq gMissionTitle Nil) (setq gMissionListName (cat "Missions" (objGetData gPlayerShip "militiaRank"))) (setq gMissionNoneText "\"Sorry, there are no missions currently available.\"") (setq gMissionAcceptText "\"Good luck, captain!\"") (setq gMissionDeclineText "\"Why don't you make yourself useful and get us some tea or something\"") (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsMission;") ) ) )

GetOut.desc: "Why don't you make yourself useful and get us some tea or something"

MissionFailure.desc: "You screwed that mission all the way to Sol and back. You better hit the sims, pilot!"

Actions.Action:
(block (success failure) (objSetData gStation "MissionStatus" Nil)
(setq success (objGetData gPlayerShip "militiaSuccess")) (setq failure (add (objGetData gPlayerShip "militiaFailure") 1)) (objSetData gPlayerShip "militiaFailure" failure)
; If the player ever ends up with 3 more failures than ; successes then he is booted. (if (geq failure (add success 3)) (objSetData gPlayerShip "militiaRank" -1) )
(scrShowPane gScreen "Default") )

MissionInProgress.desc: "What is your major malfunction!? Get back out there and complete your mission!"

MissionSuccess.desc: "Good work, captain! That was an outstanding mission."

Actions.Action:
(block (success failure rank promoted) (objSetData gStation "MissionStatus" Nil)
(setq success (add (objGetData gPlayerShip "militiaSuccess") 1)) (setq failure (objGetData gPlayerShip "militiaFailure")) (objSetData gPlayerShip "militiaSuccess" success)
(setq rank (objGetData gPlayerShip "militiaRank")) (setq promoted Nil) (switch (eq rank 0) ; Need one more successes than failures to become ; an apprentice. (if (geq (subtract success failure) 1) (setq promoted True) ) (eq rank 1) ; Need at least three successes to be a journeyman ; and two more successes than failures (if (and (geq success 3) (geq (subtract success failure) 2)) (setq promoted True) ) (eq rank 2) ; Need at least six successes to be a master ; and four more successes than failures (if (and (geq success 6) (geq (subtract success failure) 4)) (setq promoted True) ) )
; Reset the bar encounter after a successful mission (objSetData gStation "NextBarEncounter" Nil)
; If we're promoted, show the promotion screen. Otherwise, ; show default. (if promoted (block Nil (objSetData gPlayerShip "militiaRank" (add rank 1)) (scrShowPane gScreen "Promotion") ) (scrShowPane gScreen "Default") ) )

Promotion.Initialize:
(block (rank) (setq rank (objGetData gPlayerShip "militiaRank")) (switch (eq rank 1) (scrSetDesc gScreen "\"Your success on this mission has brought you great respect. It is my privilege to bestow upon you the rank of lieutenant in service to the Commonwealth Militia.\" General Powell hands you a military ID chip.")
(eq rank 2) (scrSetDesc gScreen "\"Your skills on this mission have brought you great admiration. It is my honor to present you with the Commonwealth Medal of Distinction and to promote you to the rank of major. Congratulations!\"")
(eq rank 3) (scrSetDesc gScreen "\"Your bravery has brought great honor to you and to the militia. It is my honor to present you with the Commonwealth Medal of Honor and to promote you to the rank of colonel. Congratulations!\"") ) )

Actions.Action:
(block (rank) (setq rank (objGetData gPlayerShip "militiaRank")) (switch (eq rank 1) (block Nil (objAddItem gPlayerShip (itmCreate &itMilitaryID; 1)) (itmSetKnown &itMilitaryID;) )
(eq rank 2) (objAddItem gPlayerShip (itmCreate &itMedalOfDistinction; 1))
(eq rank 3) (objAddItem gPlayerShip (itmCreate &itMedalOfHonor; 1)) )
(scrShowPane gScreen "Default") )

TooManyFailures.desc: "How about getting us a cup of tea or something? That's probably a mission you could handle."

Actions.Action: (block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "Main") (setq gPrevPane "DockServices") (setq gTechLevel 7) (setq gArmorSegment 0) (setq gArmorSegmentNames '("forward" "starboard" "aft" "port")) (setq gMargin 100) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsRepairArmor;") )
(block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "Main") (setq gPrevPane "DockServices") (setq gCheckMilitaryID True) (setq gMargin 100) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsInstallDevice;") )

OfficersClub.desc: The Officer's Club is packed with pilots and other officers having a few drinks to pass aways the off-duty hours.

BarEncounter.Initialize:
(block (rank) (setq rank (objGetData gPlayerShip "militiaRank")) (setq gResult Nil)
(switch ; If the player is black-listed, then she is not welcome (eq rank -1) (scrSetDesc gScreen "You spend 5 credits on drinks, but everyone avoids you. You feel out of place here.")
; Make sure enough time passes between encounters (and (objGetData gStation "NextBarEncounter") (ls (unvGetTick) (objGetData gStation "NextBarEncounter"))) (scrSetDesc gScreen "You spend 5 credits on drinks, but there aren't too many people here that you want to talk to.")
; If the player is a major, there is a chance of a henchman (and (eq rank 2) (leq (random 1 100) 60) (not (objGetGlobalData gStation "EncounterJenna"))) (block Nil (scrSetDesc gScreen "A young woman in a flight-suit and Commonwealth insignia sits next to you: \"I've seen you in action out thereyou're not too bad for an old-timer.\"") (setq gResult "jenna") )
; If the player is a colonel, then another chance for a henchman (and (eq rank 3) (leq (random 1 100) 80) (not (objGetGlobalData gStation "EncounterRama"))) (block Nil (scrSetDesc gScreen "You talk to Rama, a silver-haired pilot who seems to be wearing blaster armor under his flight-suit. You trade stories about flying and fighting, but when you mention your journey to the Core, he grows quiet and stares off into space.") (setq gResult "rama") )
; Otherwise, we get rumors (block (rumor) (setq rumor (random 1 4))
(switch (eq rumor 1) (scrSetDesc gScreen "A man with a prosthetic arm sits next to you: \"I've been flying for the militia for years, but I'd much rather be helping the Fleet. No one's seen them in a long time. They must be at the Ares Homeworld by now.\"")
(eq rumor 2) (scrSetDesc gScreen "A man and a woman sit next to you. The woman starts a conversation with you: \"We're students from St. Katharine's Star! It's so exciting to be here where all the action is! We're writing a doctoral thesis on the role of minority neo-humans on reductive militia policy. Wish us luck!\"")
(eq rumor 3) (scrSetDesc gScreen "An older pilot sits next to you: \"Don't underestimate the slavers! We've been fighting them for years and they just keep advancing their technology. There are rumors that they've developed a new archcannon powered by their longzhu spheres.\"")
(eq rumor 4) (scrSetDesc gScreen "A woman sits next to you: \"My husband is in the Commonwealth Fleet and I haven't seen him for years. Sometimes I get messages from him, but it's never good news.\"") )
(setq gResult "rumor") ) )
; Set the time for the next encounter (if gResult (objSetData gStation "NextBarEncounter" (add (unvGetTick) (random 1500 2000))) ) )

Jenna.desc: "I'm a pretty good pilot myself. What do you think about you and me taking on the bad guys together?"

JennaOK.desc: "Awesome! You won't regret it, I promise!"

Actions.Action:
(block (ship) ; Create the ship (setq ship (sysCreateShip &scRoninC; gStation &svCommonwealth; "fleet")) (shpOrderEscort ship gPlayerShip (random 1 10))
; Can't encounter Jenna again (objSetGlobalData gStation "EncounterJenna" True)
(scrShowPane gScreen "OfficersClub") )

JennaSorry.desc: "Yeah, well, I didn't think it would work out either." She leaves you and starts to talk to another pilot at the bar.

Rama.desc: Rama talks about his ship instead: "I've made a lot of modifications to her over the years. You should see her in a fight: fast and tight as a lightship, but heavily armed. She's saved my life a hundred times."

Action.name: "Why don't you travel with me to the Core?"

RamaOK.desc: Rama pauses for a long time, and when he speaks it is in a whisper. "When I became a man, I went to see a monk about my future. He told me that I was destined to die on a journey to the Core." And then, Rama laughs and dispatches the rest of his drink. "But I no longer fear my destiny. I will go with you!"

Actions.Action:
(block (ship) ; Create the ship (setq ship (sysCreateShip &scCenturionRama; gStation &svCommonwealth; "fleet")) (shpOrderEscort ship gPlayerShip (random 1 10))
; Can't encounter Rama again (objSetGlobalData gStation "EncounterRama" True)
(scrShowPane gScreen "OfficersClub") )

RamaSorry.desc: As you get up to leave, Rama grabs your arm and says, "Perhaps we will see each other again."

Actions.Action:
(block Nil ; Can't encounter Rama again (objSetGlobalData gStation "EncounterRama" True)
(scrShowPane gScreen "OfficersClub") )

NoMoney.desc: You sit at the bar, but you don't even have enough money to buy a drink. You feel out of place.

Default.desc: Welcome to Commonwealth Residentials.

You are in the docking bay of a Commonwealth settlement. Except for a few shuttles, the docking bay of this station is deserted. A loose hose is spilling dirty water onto the landing pad; elsewhere, an automatic load-lifter moves forward and back again as it unloads a ship's cargo hold. The air smells of liquid fuel and exhaust.

CommoditiesExchange.Initialize: (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "Welcome to the " (objGetName gStation) " Commodities Exchange Market."))

Actions.Action: (block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "Main") (setq gMargin 10) (setq gBuyCriteria "*NU -Illegal; -ID;") (setq gMaxPrice 50000) (setq gTitle Nil) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsExchangeSell;") )

DockServices.desc: You are at the docking services terminal.

Actions.Action: (block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "Main") (setq gPrevPane "DockServices") (setq gTechLevel 7) (setq gArmorSegment 0) (setq gArmorSegmentNames '("forward" "starboard" "aft" "port")) (setq gMargin 100) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsRepairArmor;") )

StaticData.Info: "As you reach the information booth its screen lights up:\n\nWelcome to the Eridani System and to Starton Eridani! Settled in 2176, our small star system is one of the most friendly in all the Commonwealth. Whatever your purpose here, whether business or pleasure, we're sure that you will enjoy your stay! Please select your topic of interest:"
StaticData.TouristInfo: "Though far from St. Katharine's Star System, the Eridani System is not the backwater station shown on the 3DVs. The bars and nightclubs of Central Plaza are always ready for visitors. But if you prefer a quieter time, you can travel out to the outer planet in the system and visit the monastery of the Sisters of Domina."
StaticData.CorporateInfo: "If you are here on corporate business you will find the Commodities Exchange to have many popular items, including starship equipment. The Corporate Enclave near Starton Eridani also trades in supplies.\n\nNote: In accordance with Commonwealth laws, all customs officers are required to search for contrabandbuy and sell legal goods only."
StaticData.TravelInfo: "Starships are very common here, so you will have no problem obtaining fuel or making repairs to your ship. Starton Eridani's shipyard can even install new devices on your ship. And when you've enjoyed everything that the Eridani System has to offer, you can find an outbound stargate around the innermost planet."
StaticData.SafetyInfo: "Like any populated star system, Eridani has its share of dangers. Charon pirates and outlaw bands control some parts of the systemavoid all non-Commonwealth station unless escorted or armed.\n\nNote: In accordance with Commonwealth laws, legally armed ships may attack and loot designated enemy targets only. Ships attacking Commonwealth stations will be treated as pirates and destroyed."
StaticData.FunFacts: ( "Starton is more than seven stargates away from St. Katharine's Star System." "Starton Eridani was founded by the Commonwealth in 2176." "According to the 2410 census, 29 million people live in this star system; half of them live in Starton Eridani itself." "For some reason, more pilgrims have started their journey to the Galactic Core from Eridani than from any other system of the Commonwealth." "Conrad Decker, admiral of the Commonwealth Fleet, spent his summers in Starton Eridani as a young boy." "In 2240, Starton Eridani was almost evacuated because of rumors that a large Ares fleet was approaching. It later turned out to be a group of Salvagers travelling together." "During the Eridani Bicentenial in 2376, then governor Jerad Norton convinced the Charon pirates to join in the celebrations in exchange for an unspecified sum." )

Default.desc: You are in the docking level of a Corporate Enclave. The citizens of the station work for various members of the Corporate Hierarchy.

Illegals.desc: You are in the maintenance level of a Corporate Enclave. The door to the maintenance shop is open and you hear voices inside.

MaintenanceLevel.desc: You are in the maintenance level of a Corporate Enclave. The drone of the atmosphere processors and the waste converters drowns out all other noises. There is an empty maintenance shop here filled with various machines and droids; an empty laudanum ampule peeks out from under the workbench.

MaintenanceShop.desc: You are in the maintenance shop surrounded by various machines and droids. There are four men in the room repairing various items. One of the men walks towards you and says, "You must be the new delivery person. Show me what you've got to sell."

Action.name: "Sorry, you have me confused with someone else."
"The merchandise is in my cargo hold."

Actions.Action: (block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "Main") (setq gMargin 10) (setq gBuyCriteria "*NU +Illegal; -ID") (setq gMaxPrice 50000) (setq gTitle Nil) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsExchangeSell;") )

ResidentialLevel.desc: You are in the residential level of a Corporate Enclave. This level holds the apartments and dwelling units of mid-level corporate citizens. The units are small and somewhat homogenous, though everyone you meet seems happy.

Default.desc: You are in the corporate level of a Corporate Enclave. The day-to-day services and manufacturing of the various corporations are carried-out on this level.

Actions.Action:
(block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "CorporateLevel")
; Buys stuff that the enclave needs (setq gMargin (lambda (thisItem) (block (cost) (setq cost (itmGetPrice thisItem)) (switch ; We pay extra for luxuries (itmHasModifier thisItem 'Lux) (setq cost (divide (multiply cost 120) 100))
; We buy meds (itmHasModifier thisItem 'Meds) (setq cost (divide (multiply cost 120) 100))
; We buy food (itmHasModifier thisItem 'Food) (setq cost (divide (multiply cost 110) 100))
; We buy resources (itmHasModifier thisItem 'Res) (setq cost (divide (multiply cost 105) 100))
; We don't want anything else (setq cost 0) )
cost ) ) )
(setq gBuyCriteria "*U -Illegal; -ID;") (setq gMaxPrice 10000) (setq gTitle Nil) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsExchangeSell;") )

StationType.name: (fuel depot)

Default.Initialize: (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "Welcome to " (objGetName gStation) ", your most reliable source of starship fuel and a member of the Earth Industries Conglomerate. All our fuel has been produced to the exacting standards required by today's reactors. Please use the terminal to proceed with your transaction."))

Actions.Action: (block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "Main") (setq gPrevPane Nil) (setq gCost 19) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsRefuel;") )

Activate.desc: You are docked at the Heretic Gate. This gate has been deactivated ever since the Ancient Races of the Galaxy quarantined Human Space. The Heretic Gate is the only barrier that stands between humanity and the rest of the Galaxy. It is also the only way to get to the Galactic Core.

Default.desc: You are docked at the Heretic Gate. This gate leads out of the Human Quarantine Zone and into the rest of the Galaxy. Your journey to the Galactic Core begins here...
You are in the alien control room of the Heretic Gate. Pick an item to use to attempt to activate the stargate.

Actions.Action:
(block Nil (setq gItem (scrGetItem gScreen)) (switch (eq gItem Nil) Nil
(eq (itmGetUNID gItem) &itStargateControlRod;) (block Nil (objSetData gStation "Active" True) (staSetActive gStation) (scrRemoveItem gScreen 1) (scrShowPane gScreen "Success") )
(scrShowPane gScreen "Failure") ) )

Failure.Initialize: (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "Using " (itmGetName gItem 4) " has no discernible effect on the stargate."))

Success.desc: As you install the alien hyperglyph rod the machines in the control room hum with energy. The stargate spins slowly to life.

Default.desc: You are docked at an independent ice farm on a small asteroid. Cold and stale air blows out of a wheezing recycler and you hear the drone of struggling generators and pumps.

Actions.Action: (block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "Main") ; sells what the farm produces at a discount (luxuries) (setq gMargin -25) (setq gShowCriteria "*NU +Lux;") (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsExchangeBuy;") )

(block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "Main")
; Buys stuff that the farm needs (setq gMargin (lambda (thisItem) (block (cost) (setq cost (itmGetPrice thisItem)) (switch ; We pay double for certain kinds of supplies (or (eq (itmGetUNID thisItem) &itHydrocarbons;) (eq (itmGetUNID thisItem) &itHelium3FuelRod;) (eq (itmGetUNID thisItem) &itOrganicAcid;) (eq (itmGetUNID thisItem) &itMedicalSupplies;) (eq (itmGetUNID thisItem) &itHyperfiberRoll;) (eq (itmGetUNID thisItem) &itBiofactorPaste;) ) (setq cost (multiply cost 2))
; We pay extra for cheap food (and (itmHasModifier thisItem 'Food) (ls cost 100)) (setq cost (divide (multiply cost 150) 100))
; We don't want anything else (setq cost 0) )
cost ) ) )
(setq gBuyCriteria "*U -Illegal; -ID;") (setq gMaxPrice 10000) (setq gTitle Nil) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsExchangeSell;") )

Default.Initialize: (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "Welcome to the " (sysGetName) " System branch of the Clavius Insurance Conglomerate. Since 2071 we have been providing hazard insurance services to freelancers and enterpreneurs throughout Human Space."))

AlreadyInsured.desc: You are already insured by our conglomerate. Rest assured that you are protected against all loses by the most comprehensive insurance in the Commonwealth.

TooRisky.desc: Unfortunately, we do not have an insurance product suitable for the risky lifestyle that you lead.

BuyInsurance.Initialize:
(block (desc) (switch (eq (plyGetInsuranceClaims gPlayer) 0) (setq gCost 10000)
(eq (plyGetInsuranceClaims gPlayer) 1) (setq gCost 50000)
(eq (plyGetInsuranceClaims gPlayer) 2) (setq gCost 100000)
(setq gCost 1000000) )
(setq desc (cat "Our conglomerate specializes in providing full personal and property coverage against death and destruction. Claims are settled by full replacement of life and property, including resuscitation and cloning. Based on your risk profile we can offer you full coverage for " gCost " credits. "))
(if (ls (plyGetCredits gPlayer) gCost) (block Nil (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat desc "Unfortunately, you cannot afford this service currently, but we urge you to return as soon as your financial situation improves.")) (scrEnableAction gScreen 0 Nil) ) (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat desc "Do you wish to purchase this service?")) ) )

Actions.Action: (if (geq (plyGetCredits gPlayer) gCost) (block Nil (plyInsure gPlayer) (plyCharge gPlayer gCost) (scrShowPane gScreen "Done") ) )

Done.desc: Thank you for your purchase. We wish you a long and happy life, secure in the knowledge that the oldest and most powerful insurance conglomerate stands behind you.

(sysAddEncounterEventAtDist (add 600 (random 0 100)) transport &etPirateAmbush1; (random 60 100)) (sysAddEncounterEventAtDist (add 1200 (random 0 200)) transport &etPirateAmbush1; (random 60 100))

500 ; Payment 250 ; Min distance ) )
