(shpOrderEscort gPlayerShip transport) ) )
5000 ; Payment 600 ; Min distance ) )

Events.OnObjDestroyed: (if (eq (objGetObjRefData gStation "Transport") aObjDestroyed) (if (eq aDestroyer gPlayerShip) (objSetData gStation "MissionResult" "friendly-fire") (objSetData gStation "MissionResult" "destroyed") ; Note: We don't need to unregister events because we ; automatically do so when an object is destroyed. ) )

Dispatch.name: Korolov Shipping
Dispatch.OnInit:
(block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "Dispatch")
(switch ; If the ship is radioactive then we need to decontaminate (shpIsRadioactive gPlayerShip) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsCommonwealthDecon;") ) )

Default.Initialize:
(block (desc playerRank) (setq playerRank (objGetData gPlayerShip "KorolovRank")) (if (not playerRank) (block Nil (objSetData gPlayerShip "KorolovRank" 0) (objSetData gPlayerShip "KorolovSuccess" 0) (objSetData gPlayerShip "KorolovFailure" 0) (setq playerRank 0) ) )
(setq desc "You are in the main hall of a Korolov Shipping Company station.")
; Description depends on rank
(switch ; Blacklisted (eq playerRank -1) (setq desc (cat desc " Conversations stop as you enter the room. Whispered condemnations make it clear that you are not welcome among the freighter crews and captains."))
; Probationary or apprentice (or (eq playerRank 0) (eq playerRank 1)) (setq desc (cat desc " The walls are decorated with holopanes honoring the men and women who have died defending Korolov freighters. Do you wish to hire yourself out as a freighter escort?"))
; Journeyman (eq playerRank 2) (setq desc (cat desc " The freighter captains welcome you as you enter. Do you wish to hire yourself out as a freighter escort?"))
; Master (eq playerRank 3) (setq desc (cat desc " The more experienced escort captains welcome you as you enter; you are treated with deference and respect. Do you wish to hire yourself out as a freighter escort?")) )
(scrSetDesc gScreen desc) )

DockServices.desc: You are at the docking services terminal.

Actions.Action: (block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "Dispatch") (setq gPrevPane "DockServices") (setq gTechLevel 6) (setq gArmorSegment 0) (setq gArmorSegmentNames '("forward" "starboard" "aft" "port")) (setq gMargin 100) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsRepairArmor;") )
(block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "Dispatch") (setq gPrevPane "DockServices") (setq gCheckMilitaryID True) (setq gMargin 100) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsInstallDevice;") )

CantUseDockServices.desc: The dock services area is restricted to members only.

Mission.Initialize:
(block (destList bestDist minDist testDest missionList) ; Pick a mission (setq missionList (objGetData gStation (cat "Missions" (objGetData gPlayerShip "KorolovRank")))) (setq gMission (random missionList))
; Get a docked ship and make sure that it is a transport (setq gTransport Nil) (enumwhile (staGetDockedShips gStation) (not gTransport) dockedShip (if (eq (shpGetClass dockedShip) &scEI100;) (setq gTransport dockedShip) ) )
; Get the destination. It should be a friendly structure (setq destList (sysFindObject gStation "T:populated;F"))
; Find the farthest station (start with min distance) (setq minDist (item gMission 4)) (setq bestDist 1200) (setq gDestination Nil) (enum destList testDest (if (and (gr (objGetDistance gStation testDest) minDist) (ls (objGetDistance gStation testDest) bestDist)) (block Nil (setq bestDist (objGetDistance gStation testDest)) (setq gDestination testDest) ) ) )
; If we've got both then we've got a mission (if (and gTransport gDestination) (block (successess failures totalMissions desc) (setq successes (objGetData gPlayerShip "KorolovSuccess")) (setq failures (objGetData gPlayerShip "KorolovFailure")) (setq totalMissions (add successes failures))
(setq desc (item gMission 1)) (scrSetDesc gScreen (strCapitalize (subst desc (objGetName gDestination) (item gMission 3) (objGetName gTransport 4)))) )
; This means we couldn't get a freighter (block Nil (scrSetDesc gScreen "Sorry, there are no freighters currently looking for escorts. Please come back later.") (scrEnableAction gScreen 0 Nil) ) ) )

Actions.Action:
(if (and gTransport gDestination) (block Nil (objSetData gStation "MissionResult" "in-progress") (objSetData gStation "Mission" gMission) (objSetObjRefData gStation "Transport" gTransport) (objRegisterForEvents gStation gTransport)
(apply (eval (item gMission 2)) gTransport gDestination Nil)
(scrExitDock gScreen) ) )

Debrief.Initialize: (block (rank result successes failures) (setq successes (objGetData gPlayerShip "KorolovSuccess")) (setq failures (objGetData gPlayerShip "KorolovFailure")) (setq result (objGetData gStation "MissionResult")) (setq gMission (objGetData gStation "Mission")) (setq rank (objGetData gPlayerShip "KorolovRank")) (switch (eq result "docked") (block Nil (scrSetDesc gScreen "Well done, Captain! You've shown skill and bravery in facing those pirates.") (plyCredit gPlayer (item gMission 3)) (setq successes (add successes 1)) (objSetData gPlayerShip "KorolovSuccess" successes) (objSetData gStation "MissionResult" Nil) (switch (eq rank 0) ; Need one more successes than failures to become ; an apprentice. (if (geq (subtract successes failures) 1) (objSetData gPlayerShip "KorolovRank" 1) ) (eq rank 1) ; Need at least four successes to be a journeyman ; and three more successes than failures (if (and (geq successes 4) (geq (subtract successes failures) 3)) (objSetData gPlayerShip "KorolovRank" 2) ) (eq rank 2) ; Need at least eight successes to be a master ; and six more successes than failures (if (and (geq successes 8) (geq (subtract successes failures) 6)) (objSetData gPlayerShip "KorolovRank" 3) ) ) ) (eq result "destroyed") (block Nil (scrSetDesc gScreen "Your timidity under fire and your lack of skill doomed the poor crew of your freighter and its cargo!") (setq failures (add failures 1)) (objSetData gPlayerShip "KorolovFailure" failures) (objSetData gStation "MissionResult" Nil) (if (geq (subtract failures successes) 3) (objSetData gPlayerShip "KorolovRank" -1) ) ) (eq result "friendly-fire") (block Nil (scrSetDesc gScreen "Either your poor marksmanship or deliberate malice destroyed the freighter entrusted to your care! You will never work for us again, Captain.") (objSetData gPlayerShip "KorolovFailure" (add failures 1)) (objSetData gPlayerShip "KorolovRank" -1) (objSetData gStation "MissionResult" Nil) ) (eq result "in-progress") (scrSetDesc gScreen "Captain, where is the freighter you were supposed to be escorting? If anything happens to that freighter it will be on your conscience.") ) )

TooManyFailures.desc: Sorry, Captain, but your escort record is terrible. No freighter wants to be defended by you.

StationType.name: (merchant prince hotel)

Default.Initialize: (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "Welcome to " (objGetName gStation 4) "."))

Actions.Action:
(block (hasID hasIllegals) ; See if the player has a Black Market ID or ; any illegal items
(objEnumItems gPlayerShip "*U" itemCursor (block Nil (if (itmHasModifier (itmAtCursor itemCursor) 'Illegal) (setq hasIllegals True) )
(if (itmHasModifier (itmAtCursor itemCursor) 'BlackMarketID) (setq hasID True) ) ) )
; If the player has a Black Market ID then she is treated ; with respect. ; ; If the player has illegal items, then she encounters ; a black market recruiter or an enforcement unit. ; ; If the player has neither, then she feels out of place.
(switch (objGetData gStation "Declined") (scrShowPane gScreen "Restaurant-NoRespect")
hasID (scrShowPane gScreen "Restaurant-Respect")
(objGetGlobalData gStation "EncounterDone") (scrShowPane gScreen "Restaurant-NoRespect")
hasIllegals (scrShowPane gScreen "Restaurant-Illegals")
(scrShowPane gScreen "Restaurant-NoRespect") ) )

Restaurant-Respect.desc: As you enter the restaurant the maitre d' welcomes you warmly and shows you to a table. Envious patrons look on while you eat a wonderful dish of Hogei Salmon with organic yams and sweet plum sauce.

Restaurant-NoRespect.desc: The maitre d' leaves you waiting for several minutes. When he finally turns to you he coldly tells you that there are no tables available. You feel out of place here.

Restaurant-Illegals.desc: The maitre d' tells you that no tables are available and shows you to the bar instead. At the bar you strike up a conversation with two brothers from Eridani who seem to be a little evasive about their business.

Restaurant-Illegals3.Initialize: (block Nil (setq gCost (multiply (itmGetPrice gItem) (itmGetCount gItem))) (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "The brothers offer you " gCost " credits for " (itmGetName gItem 8) ".")) )

Restaurant-Illegals4.desc: Finding nothing else to talk about, you finish eating in silence.

Restaurant-Illegals5.desc: You exchance the merchandise for the money at the dock. As they are about to leave, one of the brothers hands you an identification chip and says, "You probably won't find us here again, but use this at a black market station if you want to do more business."
Restaurant-Illegals5.Initialize: (block Nil (plyCredit gPlayer gCost) (objRemoveItem gPlayerShip gItem) (objAddItem gPlayerShip (itmCreate &itBlackMarketID; 1)) (itmSetKnown &itBlackMarketID;) )

Restaurant-Busted.Initialize: (if (geq (plyGetCredits gPlayer) 1000) (block Nil (plyCharge gPlayer 1000) (scrSetDesc gScreen "The brothers pull out badges and guns. \"You are under arrest for the attempted sale of illegal merchandise. Normally you could be imprisoned for your crimes, but we're going to let you go with just a 1000 credit fine.\"") (setq gPaid True) ) (block Nil (scrSetDesc gScreen "The brothers pull out badges and guns. \"You are under arrest for the attempted sale of illegal merchandise.\"") (plyDestroyed gPlayer "imprisoned for smuggling") (setq gPaid Nil) ) )

Default.Initialize: (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "You are in the loading dock of " (objGetName gStation 4) "."))

Actions.Action:
(block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "LoadingDock")
; Buys stuff that the hotel needs (setq gMargin (lambda (thisItem) (block (cost) (setq cost (itmGetPrice thisItem)) (switch ; We pay extra for luxuries (itmHasModifier thisItem 'Lux) (setq cost (divide (multiply cost 125) 100))
; We buy food (itmHasModifier thisItem 'Food) (setq cost (divide (multiply cost 110) 100))
; We buy certain kinds of basic supplies (or (eq (itmGetUNID thisItem) &itWaterIce;) (eq (itmGetUNID thisItem) &itStimuzine;) (eq (itmGetUNID thisItem) &itMedicalSupplies;) (eq (itmGetUNID thisItem) &itBiofactorPaste;) (eq (itmGetUNID thisItem) &itHypermycin;) ) (setq cost (divide (multiply cost 110) 100))
; We don't want anything else (setq cost 0) )
cost ) ) )
(setq gBuyCriteria "*U -Illegal; -ID;") (setq gMaxPrice 10000) (setq gTitle Nil) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsExchangeSell;") )

StationType.name: (mining colony)

Default.desc: You are in the docking bay of a mining colony.

CommoditiesExchange.Initialize: (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "Welcome to the " (objGetName gStation) " Commodities Exchange Market."))

Actions.Action: (block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "Main") (setq gMargin 10) (setq gBuyCriteria "*NU -Illegal; +Food;") (setq gMaxPrice 50000) (setq gTitle Nil) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsExchangeSell;") )

DockServices.desc: You are at the docking services terminal.

Actions.Action: (block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "Main") (setq gPrevPane "DockServices") (setq gTechLevel 3) (setq gArmorSegment 0) (setq gArmorSegmentNames '("forward" "starboard" "aft" "port")) (setq gMargin 100) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsRepairArmor;") )

(block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "Main") (setq gPrevPane "DockServices") (setq gCost 650) (setq gItem (itmCreate &itMiningLaser; 1)) (setq gCheckMilitaryID True) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsInstallSpecificDevice;") )

(block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "Main") (setq gPrevPane "DockServices") (setq gCost 1100) (setq gItem (itmCreate &itCargoHoldExpansion; 1)) (setq gCheckMilitaryID True) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsInstallSpecificDevice;") )

Default.desc: You are docked at a Ringers Collective. Ringer neohumans float through the vast volume of the station, perfectly adapted to zero-gravity and space.

Exchange.desc: The central structure of the Ringers Collective is a large marketplace containing sophisticated and rare devices from all over Human Space. Commonwealth credits are not accepted here.

ExchangeIntro.desc: As you enter the main Exchange, a greeter scans you and says, "Earthican, welcome. Your account balance at 0 rins. Continue and browse, but Collective not accepts Commonwealth credits. Collective seeks rare and powerful ores and substances. Bring here."

Default.desc: There are no items here.
Default.Initialize:
(block (thisItem) (setq thisItem (scrGetItem gScreen)) (if thisItem (block (affordCount availCount desc fitCount rins)
; Compute the cost of the item the exchange rate ; is at 5 credits per rin (setq rins (objGetData gPlayerShip "rins")) (setq gCost (divide (itmGetPrice thisItem) 5))
(setq availCount (itmGetCount thisItem))
(if (gr gCost 0) (setq affordCount (divide rins gCost)) (setq affordCount 0) ) (setq gMaxCount (if (gr affordCount availCount) availCount affordCount))
(setq fitCount (divide (objGetCargoSpaceLeft gPlayerShip) (itmGetMass thisItem))) (setq gMaxCount (if (gr gMaxCount fitCount) fitCount gMaxCount))
; Set the price and description (setq desc (cat "Balance: " rins (if (eq rins 1) " rin" " rins"))) (setq desc (cat desc "\nUnit price: " (if (eq gCost 0) "N/A" (cat gCost " rins")))) (if (gr gMaxCount 1) (setq desc (cat desc " (" gMaxCount " for " (multiply gCost gMaxCount) ")")) )
(setq desc (cat desc "\nUnit mass: " (intMassString (itmGetMass thisItem)))) (if (gr gMaxCount 1) (setq desc (cat desc " (" gMaxCount " at " (intMassString (multiply (itmGetMass thisItem) gMaxCount)) ")")) )
(setq desc (cat desc "\n\n"))
(switch (eq gCost 0) (setq desc (cat desc "This item is not for sale.")) (eq affordCount 0) (setq desc (cat desc "You do not have enough rins to purchase any.")) (eq fitCount 0) (setq desc (cat desc "Unfortunately, you cannot fit any in your cargo hold.")) (and (gr availCount affordCount) (gr fitCount affordCount)) (setq desc (cat desc "You have enough rins to buy " affordCount ".")) (and (gr availCount fitCount)) (setq desc (cat desc "You have enough room in your cargo hold to carry " fitCount ".")) )
(scrSetDesc gScreen desc) ) (setq gMaxCount 0) )
; Enable/disable actions (scrEnableAction gScreen 0 (gr gMaxCount 0)) )

Actions.Action: (if (gr gMaxCount 1) (scrShowPane gScreen "BuyQuantity") (if (eq gMaxCount 1) (block Nil (setq itemsToBuy (scrRemoveItem gScreen 1)) (objAddItem gPlayerShip itemsToBuy) (objIncData gPlayerShip "rins" (subtract 0 gCost)) (scrShowPane gScreen "Default") ) ) )

BuyQuantity.Initialize: (block Nil (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "How many items do you wish to purchase at " gCost " rins each?")) (scrSetCounter gScreen gMaxCount) )

Actions.Action: (block (count) (setq count (scrGetCounter gScreen)) (if (gr count gMaxCount) (scrSetCounter gScreen gMaxCount) (block Nil (setq itemsToBuy (scrRemoveItem gScreen count)) (objAddItem gPlayerShip itemsToBuy) (objIncData gPlayerShip "rins" (subtract 0 (multiply count gCost))) (scrShowPane gScreen "Default") ) ) )

Default.desc: There are no items here.
Default.Initialize:
(block (thisItem) (setq thisItem (scrGetItem gScreen)) (if thisItem (block (affordCount availCount desc priceText rins) (setq rins (objGetData gPlayerShip "rins"))
(switch ; We pay extra for Promethium crystals (itmHasModifier thisItem "RingerValuable") (setq gCost (itmGetPrice thisItem))
; We buy high-level resources (and (itmHasModifier thisItem "Res") (geq (itmGetLevel thisItem) 4)) (setq gCost (divide (itmGetPrice thisItem) 5))
; Otherwise, no sale (setq gCost 0) )
; Unknown items are discounted (if (not (itmIsKnown thisItem)) (setq gCost (divide gCost 10)) )
(setq availCount (itmGetCount thisItem)) (setq gMaxCount availCount)
; Set the price and description (setq priceText (cat "Balance: " rins (if (eq rins 1) " rin" " rins"))) (if (gr gCost 0) (block Nil (setq priceText (cat priceText "\nUnit offer: " (if (eq gCost 0) "N/A" (cat gCost " rins")))) (if (gr availCount 1) (setq priceText (cat priceText " (" availCount " for " (multiply gCost availCount) ")")) )
(setq priceText (cat priceText "\nUnit mass: " (intMassString (itmGetMass thisItem)))) (if (gr availCount 1) (setq priceText (cat priceText " (" availCount " at " (intMassString (multiply (itmGetMass thisItem) availCount)) ")")) ) ) )
(setq priceText (cat priceText "\n\n"))
(switch (eq gCost 0) (setq desc (cat priceText "The Collective is not interested in buying " (itmGetName thisItem 2) ".")) (eq availCount 1) (setq desc (cat priceText "The Collective offers " gCost " rins for your " (itmGetName thisItem 0) ".")) (setq desc (cat priceText "The Collective offers " gCost " rins for each " (itmGetName thisItem 0) ".")) )
(scrSetDesc gScreen desc) ) (setq gMaxCount 0) )
; Enable/disable actions (scrEnableAction gScreen 0 (and (gr gCost 0) (gr gMaxCount 0))) )

SellQuantity.Initialize: (block Nil (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "How many items do you wish to sell at " gCost " rins each?")) (scrSetCounter gScreen gMaxCount) )

Actions.Action: (block (count) (setq count (scrGetCounter gScreen)) (if (gr count gMaxCount) (scrSetCounter gScreen gMaxCount) (block (itemsToSell) (setq itemsToSell (scrRemoveItem gScreen count)) (objAddItem gStation itemsToSell) (objIncData gPlayerShip "rins" (multiply count gCost)) (scrShowPane gScreen "Default") ) ) )

Default.desc: You are docked at an abbey of the Sisters of Domina. As you enter the docking bay you are approached by a woman wearing a flowing red robe. "Welcome to the shrine of Domina. How may I help you, child?"

Actions.Action: (if (and (gr (plyGetCredits gPlayer) 0) (leq (objGetData gPlayerShip "sistersAttitude") 0)) (scrShowPane gScreen "TooRich") (block (count itemsToUse) (setq count (shpGetFuelNeeded gPlayerShip (itmCreate &itHelium3FuelRod; 1))) (setq itemsToUse (itmCreate &itHelium3FuelRod; count)) (shpRefuelFromItem gPlayerShip itemsToUse) (objSetData gPlayerShip "sistersAttitude" (subtract (objGetData gPlayerShip "sistersAttitude") 1)) (scrShowPane gScreen "RefuelShip") ) )

(if (and (gr (plyGetCredits gPlayer) 0) (leq (objGetData gPlayerShip "sistersAttitude") 0)) (scrShowPane gScreen "TooRich") (block (armorSeg repaired noDamage) (setq repaired Nil) (setq noDamage True) (enum '(0 1 2 3) armorSeg (block (type damage maxHP) (setq type (objGetArmorType gPlayerShip armorSeg)) (setq damage (objGetArmorDamage gPlayerShip armorSeg)) (if (gr damage 0) (setq noDamage Nil)) (setq maxHP (shpGetArmorMaxHitPoints gPlayerShip armorSeg))
(switch ; No need to repair if no damage (eq damage 0) Nil
; If armor needs higher tech to repair, we can't do anything (gr (armGetRepairTech type) 9) Nil
; Can't repair if damage is too much (ls (subtract maxHP damage) (divide maxHP 4)) Nil
; Repair (block Nil (objRepairArmor gPlayerShip armorSeg) (setq repaired True) ) ) ) )
(switch repaired (block Nil (objSetData gPlayerShip "sistersAttitude" (subtract (objGetData gPlayerShip "sistersAttitude") 1)) (scrShowPane gScreen "RepairArmor") )
noDamage (scrShowPane gScreen "NoDamage")
(scrShowPane gScreen "UnableToRepair") ) ) )

RefuelShip.desc: "Your vessel has been refueled. Go in peace and spread the teachings of Domina."

RepairArmor.desc: "Your vessel has been repaired as best as we could manage. Devote your life to Domina and your spirit shall be similarly healed."

NoDamage.desc: "Your vessel is undamaged. There is no need for repairs."

UnableToRepair.desc: "The damage to your vessel is beyond our capability to repair. Open yourself to Domina and leave your worthless ship behind."

Donate.Initialize: (block Nil (setq gMaxCount (plyGetCredits gPlayer)) (scrSetDesc gScreen "\"We are devoutly grateful for your generosity. How many credits do you wish to donate?\"") (scrSetCounter gScreen gMaxCount) )

Actions.Action:
(block (count) (setq count (scrGetCounter gScreen)) (switch (eq count 0) (scrShowPane gScreen "Default")
(gr count gMaxCount) (scrSetCounter gScreen gMaxCount)
(block (donationCounts lastDonation tithe) (setq gCost count) (setq tithe (add (divide (plyGetCredits gPlayer) 20) 1)) (plyCharge gPlayer gCost)
; Make sure we don't donate too often (setq lastDonation (objGetData gPlayerShip "sistersLastDonation")) (if lastDonation (setq donationCounts (gr (subtract (unvGetTick) lastDonation) 1000)) (setq donationCounts True) )
; For each 5% of total that the player donates, increate ; the sisters' attitude by 1. (if (and donationCounts (geq gCost 100)) (objSetData gPlayerShip "sistersAttitude" (add (objGetData gPlayerShip "sistersAttitude") (divide gCost tithe)) ) )
; Remember when we donated (objSetData gPlayerShip "sistersLastDonation" (unvGetTick))
(scrShowPane gScreen "Thanks") ) ) )

Thanks.desc: "Thank you for your generous contribution. Your faithful support enables us to help the truly needy. May the blessings of Domina illuminate your way."

TooRich.desc: "Please forgive us, but it is the wish of Domina that we help only those truly in need."

SanctumBlocked.desc: "Please forgive us, but you are not allowed to enter the sanctum."

Sanctum.desc: You are in the sanctum of the Sisters of Domina. The hierosteel walls that surround you are micro-engraved with the revelation of Domina. You see before you a holographic display of indescribable beauty and you feel immersed in the energies of a vast cosmic fountain.

Default.desc: You are docked at a strange station, apparently devoid of inhabitants. The immense docking bay is built out of a metal engraved with faintly luminous hieroglyphics. The walls are warm to the touch and hum with power.
You are docked at a Tempus manufacturing lab. The docking bay is guarded by two men with heavy weapons. They check you out and then step aside to let you in.

Actions.Action: (block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "Main") ; sells what the lab produces at a discount (tempus) (setq gMargin -25) (setq gShowCriteria "*NU +Illegal; -ID") (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsExchangeBuy;") )

StationType.name: (tinker gathering)

Default.desc: You are docked at a station belonging to the Tinkers Guild. The docking bay is decorated with various ancient devices of unknown origin and purpose.

Actions.Action: (block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "Main") (setq gMargin 0) (setq gBuyCriteria "*DU -Illegal; -Military; -ID;") (setq gMaxPrice 10000) (setq gTitle Nil) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsExchangeSell;") )

(block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "Main") (setq gPrevPane Nil) (setq gTechLevel 8) (setq gArmorSegment 0) (setq gArmorSegmentNames '("forward" "starboard" "aft" "port")) (setq gMargin 100) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsRepairArmor;") )

Default.desc: You are in a machine shop surrounded by robot welders and cutters. A woman approaches you. "If you've got some scrap or otherwise useless items we can turn them into something useful. Pick an item."

UseQuantity.Initialize: (block Nil (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "How many " (itmGetName gItem 2) " do you wish to use in this process?")) (scrSetCounter gScreen gMaxCount) )

UseItem.Initialize:
(block (testWork foundPartial) ; Loop through our table looking to see if there ; is something that we can convert
(setq foundPartial Nil) (setq gMatch Nil) (enum (objGetData gStation 'CustomWork) testWork (block Nil (if (eq (item testWork 0) (itmGetUNID gItem)) (block Nil (setq foundPartial True) (if (geq gMaxCount (item testWork 1)) (block Nil (setq gMatch testWork) (setq gCount (divide gMaxCount (item testWork 1))) (setq gCost (multiply gCount 50)) ) ) ) ) ) )
; Set state depending on whether we matched
(switch gMatch (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "We can convert your " (itmGetName (itmCreate (itmGetUNID gItem) gMaxCount) 8) " into " (itmGetName (itmCreate (item gMatch 2) gCount) 8) " for " gCost " credits. Do you wish to proceed?")) foundPartial (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "If we had more " (itmGetName gItem 2) " we might be able to do something, but there's nothing we can do with so few.")) (scrSetDesc gScreen "Sorry, that junk isn't useful to us. We can't do anything with it.") )
; Enable/disable actions (scrEnableAction gScreen 0 (and gMatch (geq (plyGetCredits gPlayer) gCost))) )

Actions.Action:
(if (and gMatch (geq (plyGetCredits gPlayer) gCost)) (block Nil (scrRemoveItem gScreen gMaxCount) (plyCharge gPlayer gCost) (objAddItem gPlayerShip (itmCreate (item gMatch 2) gCount))
(scrShowPane gScreen 'Done) ) )

Done.Initialize: (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "After much work with the robots the woman comes back with " (itmGetName (itmCreate (item gMatch 2) 1) 4) ". \"Here you go,\" she says, \"nothing to it once you know how these machines work.\""))

Default.desc: You are docked at a franchise of Thor's Wondrous Devices.

Actions.Action: (block Nil (setq gPrevScreen "Main") (setq gMargin 10) (setq gBuyCriteria "mwU -Illegal;") (setq gMaxPrice 500000) (setq gTitle Nil) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsExchangeSell;") )

StationType.name: (Xenophobe worldship)

Default.desc: You are docked at the lifeless ruins of a destroyed station. A group of refugees, huddling in the cavernous bay, tell you that the station was destroyed by Xenophobes.

You are docked at an alien stargate. These giant structures are used by the Ancient Races to move their starships across the Galaxy. Stargates are the best mode of faster-than-light travel and they are the only method known to humans.

You are docked at an alien stargate. These giant structures are used by the Ancient Races to move their starships across the Galaxy. Stargates are the best mode of faster-than-light travel and they are the only method known to humans.
